Mena! Nomwiirelha, ‘Ukiterekhelhe yolhia mii thoko, mwiichesheke rata ni ukitumikelha mii vanolhia aka ni uwuria vawo, wamalhaka uterekheke yawao.’
Chani aterekhaka nonttuna yoyo karumiya uyo wo ntheko ulheheriye awe?
Ni inyu mwaatti chiicho, mwapangaka ntheko ulheheriye inyu, mwiireke, ‘Hii niri akarumiya o uhikhulhuvelhiya, nihopanga tu thoko chilheeheriye ihu.’ ”
Yesu vaarwaa awe Uyerusalemu, ahovira mmwiinanoni mwo Usamariya ni Ugalilaya.
Vaaphiya awe iwani imoka, nkaakumaana attu khumi o makutulha eemenlhe utayi
akhuwelhachaka, “Yesu! Thithi! Nnoonelhe ikiriri!”
Yesu vonne awe nkeera, “Nrweeke mweechooniheke wa opochera ishaani.” Vaari aya mphironi arwaachaka, nkayaalhamacha.
Mmoka vonne awe wiira holhama, nkaahokolhia, anthimichaka Nlhuku wo nlhove nulhupalhe.
Nkeewulhusha vathi oopuruwaka vamietoni va Yesu ni unshukuru. Yoyo ntu uyo aari Nsamariya.
Yesu nkeera, “Yaari attu khumi alhamihiye, akina tisa ayo ari vayi etu?
Chani woonaka ulha nlheto ulha vekha awe phi wilhe unthimichani Nlhuku?”
Paahi Yesu nkaamwirelha ntu uyo, “Munkweke nrweeke, nrima inyu uhoolhamihani.”
Amafarisayo akina nkayankoha Yesu Imwene ya Nlhuku inohalha uwa iyaakhani. Aakhunlhe eeraka, “Imwene ya Nlhuku khinowa thoko chinaanyihera inyu.
Khaawo ntu nohalha wiira, ‘Alha va!’ Ama wiira, ‘Irii valhe!’, ukhalhawaya Imwene ya Nlhuku iri nhina mwinyu.”
Paahi nkaahimeria owiittucha awe, “Ikatema inoowa vanohalha inyu wunlhelha woona ikatema yo Mwaana a Ntu, nansho nhoonaka.
Ahawo anohalha uwa uwiirelhani, ‘Nkoonani, rii valhe!’ Ama ‘Nkoonani rii vaa!’ Nansho mwaatti nhirwee ummwehani.
Ukhalhawaya thoko chineera aya wo uverunya uno ni uno wiirimu, phi chiichammo Mwaana a Ntu chinohalha awe wiira nenno nihuku nno.
nansho ahinaya yayo mahuku ayo, hophwanelhiya uhuva chinene ni ukhotiya ni attu o ilha iyari ilha.
Thoko chaari aya ikatema ya Anuhu, phi nohalha aya ukhalha nihuku no Mwaana a Ntu.
Attu yaari alhiaka ni uwuria, athelhaka ni uthelhiya, mpaka nihuku Anuhu vaawelha aya isafina. Igarika nkayaawa nkayeevakacha attu onkhaye.
Inottuna ukhalha thoko mahuku a Nalutu. Attu yaari alhiaka awuriaka, athumihaka ni uthuma aalhaka imbeyu ni utheka manupa.
Nihuku Nalutu vaathama aya Usodoma, malhuku o mooro nkaarupa thoko ipulha ukhuma wiirimu ni weevakacha attu onkhaye.
Phi nohalha aya ukhalha nihuku Mwaana a Ntu vanohalha awe upatakulhiya.”
“Nenno nihuku nno, ntu riyoothe nohalha uphwanyiya vanchaarani hikhuruwe vathi uwa ukusha nhakhu awe, chiicho ntu riyoothe nohalha uphwanyiya utimani hihokolhie uwani.
Moopuwelheke ahanu a Nalutu!
Ntu nothanana woopolha ukumi awe noopoteriha, ntu nokumiha ukumi awe nowa woopolha.
Yoyo uhiyu uyo, Kinouhimeriani wiira, attu elhi anowa urupa vamoka, mmoka nowa ukushiya, nkina ahiiyaka utulhi.
Manyopani elhi anowa ushilha meelhe vamoka, amoka anowa ukushiya akina ahiiyaka utulhi.
Attu elhi anowa ulhima mmatani vamoka, amoka anowa ukushiya akina ahiiyaka.”
Owiittucha nkayankoha Yesu, “Thithi, vayi wowo?” Yesu nkaakhulha, “Vakittu variwoothe vari ntembo, phi vakittu vanothukumanacha marepo.”
Paahi, Yesu nkaahimiachera nlhikaaniho no weettuchiha wiira ikatema yonkhaye anthananiya akhalhe anlhapelhaka Nlhuku wo uhocha ntu.
Nkeera, “Iwani i naneshe ahaawo Ohukumulha mmoka ahanthimicha Nlhuku mena waalhoha attu.
Ni wowo akhalhaka anankhwelhi aawa kila ikatema uwaalhepelhani aakavihe apatte yaahuvelha aya, eeraka, ‘Nkikavihe kipatte ikekhia inohuvelha aka ukhuma wa mmalhaponi aka!’
Wo mahuku menchi Ohukumulha ayo yaari akhotaka, nansho wo umalhihera nkeera aneneru munrimani mwaya, ‘Inakhalhaka akimoovaka Nlhuku ama waalhoha attu,
nansho wo nlhatu wo uhuvihiya chinene ni anankhwelhi alha, kinowenkelha ikekhia aya. Kaahiireke chiicho anoothepa ukinyoonyiha, ni ukoocheeha!’ ”
Athithi nkayaathepa wulhumacha, “Paahi mwiiweke etu, chenre aya wo wulhumacha yayo o uhukumulha o uhilhoka ayo.
Chani etu, Nlhuku khanowa aalhakelhaka ikekhia attu athanlhiye, anomunlhelha kila nihuku uthana ni uhiyu? Chani noocherewa waavaha inonlhelha aya?
Kinouhimeriani wiira, nowaavaha ikekhia wo uhicherewa. Nansho chani, Mwaana a Ntu nowa aaphwanya attu o nrima vanohalha awe uwa?”
Yesu nkaahimiacha tho nna nlhikaaniho nna wa attu eecherumelhelha woona urera nrima ni waaveehacha attu akina.
“Ahaawo attu elhi aarweelhe u Inupa ya Nlhuku uulhapelhani, amoka yaari Afarisayo, ni akina yaari olhiviha ikhodi.

“Afarisayo nkeemelha vachereshere vo vekha aya, nkaalhapelha munrimani, ‘Kinoushukuru Nlhuku, ukhalhawaya akirii thoko akina o uhilhoka, akihiwe ntu omenyekha mena owiiya mena ntu o ishembwere thoko attu akina chiri aya. Kinooshukuru tho akirii thoko ntu olhiviha ikhodi emenlhe ulha va.
Kinoottuka mahuku melhi kila ijuma, kikumihaka ikikhumi yo nhakhu kinopatta aka.’
“Nansho olhiviha ikhodi ayo, eemenlhe utayi oochelhaka upathusha miitho wiirimu, nansho echaataka vakhakaachani onlhaka ahiyereriye, eeraka, ‘Nlhuku nkoonelhe ikiriri mii ntu o uwonya va!’ ”
Kinouhimeriani wiira, “Ntu olhiviha ikhodi ulhe aahokolheelhe uwani naalhakelhiye ikekhia. Nansho kuhiwe wa Afarisayo ayo, ukhalhawaya kila neewelhiha nookurushiya, ni kila neekurusha noowelhihiya.”
Attu nkayammwiihera Yesu ashaana ashinkani awe eesheracha miono chawe. Owiittucha vonne aya nkaachiichihacha ni waachacheracha.
Nansho Yesu nkeehanacha eeraka, “Mwaahiye ashaana ashinkani ayo we uwannyaka, mena nhaachiichihe, ukhalhawaya Imwene ya Nlhuku phi yawaya attu thoko alha.
Muupuwelheke wo ikekhiaye wiira, ntu riyoothe hinopochera Imwene ya Nlhuku thoko mwaana mwankani khanowa aakhelha mwiimweneni.”
Nholhelhi mmoka a Ayahudi nkankoha Yesu, “Owiittuchiha orera nrima, kipangeke ittu yaani kipatte ukumi wo uhimalha?”
Yesu ni uyo nkaakoha, “Chani woonaka nnokiihana orera nrima? Khaawo ri orera nrima ahikhalhe Nlhuku vekha awe.
Nhochuwelha malheheriyo, ‘Nhilhavelhave, nhiive, nhiiye, nhimwootherie ntu, mwaathimicheke athumwaninyu ni anumwaninyu.’ ”
Nholhelhi uyo nkeera, “Mii kihovara yayo meettuchiho ayo toka kinari mwanhima.”

Yesu veewilhe awe, nkaamwirelha, “Nhohalhiha nimoka nnothananiya inyu upanga. Nthumiheke chittu chinyu chonkhaye ni nchurukhu uyo mwaavaheke amashikini, ni inyu nnowiishungera nhakhu wiirimu, mwamalhaka vavawo nkittwareke.”
Nansho ntu ulhe veewilhe awe chiicho, nkaakelhiya ichuku chinene, ukhalhawaya aari ntu o nhakhu chinene.
Yesu nkoona ichuku chawe nkaamwirelha, “Vari voorikarika chinene attu o nhakhu ukelha wi Imwene ya Nlhuku!
Eiyo, khavanorikarika wa ingamiya uperetta va niitho no ntotto, kuliko wa ntu o nhakhu ukelha wi Imwene ya Nlhuku.”
Attu yeewa nkayeera, “Mpani etu, nohalha ulhama?”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Chihinooria wa nttuni, chinowooria wa Nlhuku.”
Paahi Napeturo nkayeera, “Mwooneke etu, hii nihohiya kila ittu ni uuttwarani inyuva.”
Yesu nkeerelha attu onkhaye, “Eiyo, ikekhia kinouhimeriani, ntu riyoothe hilhe inupa awe ama amwaarawe ama ashihima awe ama manyanaangoro awe ama ashaana awe wo uttwara Imwene ya Nlhuku
nowa upochera menchi wo upwaha ilha ikatema ilha ni ukumi wo uhimalha ikatema inowa.”
Yesu nkaakusha owiittucha khumi ni elhi vathetho nkeerelha, “Mwiiwelhelheke! Vano ninorwaa Uyerusalemu, wowo kila ittu ilhepiye ni anamilhohi imwaachaka Mwaana a Ntu inokootimira.
Nokoohelhiya mmathathani mwa attu ahiri Ayahudi anohalha umpangelhacha ncheche ni unruwana ni unshuwelha ishenye.
Anokoomwaata ni umwiiva, nansho nihuku no neraru noohihimmwa.”
Nansho owiittucha khayaari achuwelhaka yoyo mwaha uyo, maana aya aari anavithiye, ahichuwelhaka ittu yaahimia awe Yesu.
Yesu vaatameria awe Uyeriko, nkamphwanya ntu mmoka ohoona aakhanlhe vachereshere iphiro, avekelhaka.
Veewa awe attu enchi aviraka nkaakoha, “Anaa urini?”
Nkaakhulhiya wiira, “Yesu o Unazareti phi novira.”
Nkaakhuwelha eeraka, “Yesu! Mwaana a Adaudi ukoonelhe ikiriri!”
Attu yaaholhenlhe ayo nkayanchachera wiira amaalhe. Nansho uyo nkaathepa ukhuwelha, “Mwaana a Adaudi, ukoonelhe ikiriri!”
Yesu nkeemelha ni ulhehera wiira ehaniye. Vaawiihiye awe, Yesu nkankoha,
“Unothanana kuupangelheke ittu yaani?” Nkaakhulha, “Thithi, kinolhepelha woona.”
Yesu nkaamwirelha, “Uvahiyeke woona etu! Nrima awo uhoolhamiha.”
Yeyo ikatema, ohoona ulhe nkoona, nkanttwara Yesu uno anthimichaka Nlhuku. Attu onkhaye vonne aya, nkayanthimicha Nlhuku.
Yesu nkaaphiya Uyeriko, nkeetakacha mmaphironi.
Wowo ahaawo ntu olhiviha ikhodi mulhupalhe eehaniya Zakayo. Yoyo aari ntu o nhakhu.
Aari athananaka umwoona Yesu chiri awe, nansho aari akani o khuvia oocheelhaka umwoona Yesu rata wo nlhatu no uchara attu.
Paahi etu nkaattimakacha uholho, nkaawelha munkhuyuni amwoone Yesu rata vanohalha awe uvira.
Yesu vaaphilhe awe vavawo, nkaaweha nchulhu ni uwerelha Nazakayo, “Nazakayo, nkhuruweke mwaakuvieke, lhelho mii ki nlheto uwaninyu.”
Nazakayo nkayaakhuruwa ni umpochera Yesu athaatheelhaka.
Attu onkhaye oona nkayaachukulhacha, “Yolha ntu ulha nokelha uukhalhani wa ntu o uwonya!”
Nazakayo nkayeemelha ni wiihimia wa Athithi, “Mwiiweke Thithi! Kinookumiha inusu yo nhakhu aka waavaha amashikini, ni yakhalhaka hawo ntu kanthurunlhe aka ittu, kinonhokolhoshera vacheshe.”
Yesu nkeera, “Lelho, inupa inyu ihoopolhiya, ukhalhawaya ulha ri uwaninyu ulha ri o iyari ya Aburahimu.
Mwaana a Ntu wiilhe waathotha ni woopolha attu apotenre.”
Attu vaamwiwelhelha aya, Yesu nkaathepa nkaahimeria wo malhikaaniho. Vavawo aari aatameriaka uphiya Uyerusalemu, ni attu yaanyiheraka vano wiira Imwene ya Nlhuku waanonia chitema.
Paahi etu nkeera, “Ahaawo ntu o iyari ye Imwene aarweelhe nkwaha wo utayi apochere umwene, vanomalha awe ahokolhie.
Vaari awe hinaya uthama, nkeehanacha akarumiya awe khumi ni waavaha kila mmoka nchurukhu wo ulhikaana ni umwiirelha, ‘Mpangelheke maronda mpaka vanohokolhia aka.’
Nansho attu o uwannyawe yaari anvengaka, nkayaaruma akarumiya arwee aahimerie attu ammara nchina wiira, ‘Khaninaattuna ahivariye umwene.’
“Ntu uyo nkaavariya umwene nkaahokolhia uwani. Vaahokolhelhe awe, nkaalhehera eeraka wiira akarumiya aavanhe awe nchurukhu ayo ehaniye awe aalhakelha ifaida apantte aya.
O upacha nkaawa eeraka, ‘Pwiiya, kihopatta nchurukhu nkina mikwaha khumi wo nchurukhu mmoka mwaakivanhe inyu ulhe.’
Nkaakhulhiya, ‘Aye, anamitheko oombone inyu! Nhokhulhuvelhiya wo makani, kinouvahani vano ikuru yulhupalhe yo weemelhelha iwani khumi.’
Karumiya o nayelhi nkaawa eeraka, ‘Pwiiya, kihopatta ifaida mikwaha nthanu vachulhu nchurukhu waakivanhe inyu.’
Yoyo nkaakhulhiya eerelhiyaka, ‘Nnoweemelhelha iwani nthanu.’
“Karumiya nkina nkaawa nkeera, ‘Pwiiya, nchurukhu wo idhahabu inyu ulha va, kahovitha vanlhutoni.
Kaari kuwoovakani, ukhalhawaya inyu attu o urikarika. Nnokusha ittu ihiri yawinyu ni ukhungura vahaanlhe inyu.’
Yoyo aakhulhiye wiira, ‘Karumiya o uhilhoka uwe! Kinouhukumulhani wo nulhumo ninyu! Wahochuwelha wiira mii kiri ntu orikarika, kinokusha ittu ihiri yawaka ni ukhungura vahaanlhe aka.
Aye, woonaka khawarweehilhe unoshungiya nchurukhu? Wowo kaanopatta ifaida yo wuncherera vanohalha aka urwa uhokolhoshani.’
“Paahi etu, nkeerelha attu yeemenlhe vavawo ayo, ‘Munthurulheke nchurukhu uyo, nkusheke nrweeke mwammaheke karumiya pantte ifaida mikwaha khumi uyo.’
Nansho attu ayo nkayeera, ‘Pwiiya woonaka hopatta ifaida mikwaha khumi upwaha nchurukhu waanvanhe inyu!’
Nkayaakhulha, ‘Kinouhimeriani wiira attu arina ittu, anowunchereriya, nansho attu ahirina ittu, ata ikani irina aya iyo inookushiya
Ni vano kineera, attu anokivenga wiira kihivariye umwene ayo, mwaawiiheke vaa, eevakachiye vava koonaka kimwanene!’ ”
Yesu amalhiheke wulhumacha, nkaaholhelha urwaa Uyerusalemu.
Vaaphiya awe Ubetifage ni Ubethaniya uri Mwaako wo Mizeituni, ahaaruma owiittucha awe elhi anholhelhe
aalheheraka eeraka, “Nrweeke iwani iri uholho iyo, vanophiya inyu, nnokomphwanya mwaaphuta nattukelhelhiye hinaya weetihiya ni ntu. Mwanthaphulheke mwammwiiheke vaa.
Ntu riyoothe okohakani woonaka nnonthaphulha, mwamwiirelheke wiira, Athithi anonthanana.”
Nkayaarwaacha ni uphwanya kila ittu thoko chaahimeriye aya ni Yesu.
Vanthaphulha aya mwaaphuta uyo, ashinene nkayaakoha, “Chani woonaka mwaatti nnonthaphulha mwaaphuta uyo?”
Nkayaakhulha, “Athithi phi nonthanana.”
Nkayankusha mwaaphuta unrwehelha Yesu. Nkayaathalhacha ikuwo vanthanani ni ummwelhiha Yesu akhalhe vachulhu vawe.
Vaamweetiha awe, attu nkayaathalhacha ikuwo chaya mphironi nkaavira vachulhu ikuwo vawo.
Vaatameria awe Uyerusalemu, iphiro yaakelha uri Mwaako wo Mizeituni, nlhoko mwinchi wa owiittucha awe nkawaachokholha untotopelha Nlhuku akhuwelhaka voona aya cho ushangiha chonkhaye choona aya,
Yaari akhuwelhaka, “Nlhuku ammahe ibarakha mwene nowa wo nchina no Athithi uyo! Mpuha ukhalhe wiirimu ni nthimicho wa Nlhuku wiirimu!”
Amafarisayo akina munlhokoni mmo nkayaamwiirelha Yesu, “Owiittuchiha, mwaamaalhiheke owiittucha inyu ayo!”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Kinouhimeriani wiira, kaamaalhihaka, malhuku anoweemelha ni ukhuwelha.”
Nkaatameria iwani, ni vawo vonne awe, nkaamoriha miithori o nlhelhaka attu o Uyerusalemu,
eeraka, “Mwakaachuwenlhe lhelho chittu chimmwiiha mpuha! Nansho chihovithiya uwaninyu.
Ukhalhawaya mahuku anoowa amalhaponi inyu vanohalha aya urukurerihani ntuto, othothokelhakani kila mpatta.
Anowa uunyikalhachani inyuva vamoka ni attu inyu nlhuwanini mwinyu, ahihalhihaka ata nlhuku nimoka vachulhu nlhuku nikina, wo nlhatu noohichuwelha nihuku Nlhuku naawilhe awe uwoopolhani.”
Yesu nkaarwa ni Inupa ya Nlhuku nkaachokholha woomolha vathe attu yaapanga maronda,
eerelhaka, “Iholhepiya, Nlhuku heera, ‘Inupa aka inohalha ukhalha inupa yo lhapelha attu.’ Nansho mwaattiva nhorukunusha ukhalha nikhuku no attu o uvara makhuche!”
Kila nihuku Yesu nkeettuchiha attu upuwani u Inupa ya Nlhuku. Opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni owiittuchiha Malhehero, ni aholhelhi a attu yaari athananaka umwiiva,
nansho khayaari ni iphiro yo wiira ukhalhawaya attu onkhaye aari amwiiwelhelhaka, ahittunaka ukufia ata nlhove nimoka.
Nihuku nimoka Yesu veettuchiha awe u Inupa ya Nlhuku, ahimiachaka Malhove Orera, opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni owiittuchiha Malhehero, vamoka ni ashulhupalhe wahowiya,
nkayaamwiirelha, “Nnihimerie! Nnopanga chi chittu chi wo ikuru ya apani?”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Nkani ni mii kuukoheni nlhove. Nkakihimerieni etu,
ikuru i Nayohana yo waabatiiza attu yaakhumme wa Nlhuku wiirimu ama wa attu?”
Nkayaachokholha ukohanacha ashineneru, “Nimwaakhulheke chani? Neeraka, ‘Wa Nlhuku wiirimu’ no wiira, ‘Chani woonaka khamwaarumelhenlhe Nayohana ayo?’
Neerakaru, ‘Yaakhumme wa attu,’ alha attu onkhaye alha anoonata malhuku, ukhalhawaya attu onkhaye yanrumelhelha wiira Nayohana aari anamilhohi a Nlhuku.”
Paahi etu nkayaakhulha wiira, “Hii khanichuwenlhe waakhumme aya.”
Yesu nkeerelha, “Ata mii akinouhimeriani kimpanga chii wo ikuru yo ukhuma vayi.”
Paahi Yesu nkaahimeria attu nna nlhikaaniho nna, “Ahaawo ntu mmoka aalhimme imata yo zabibu, nkaashimiha wa anamalhima, nkaarwa nkwaha wo utayi.
Nlhaalha waayeke, nkanruma karumiya arwee apochere mahalha o izabibu. Nansho anamalhima alhe nkayaamwata karumiya uyo, nkayanhokolhosha mathatharu.
Nkayanruma karumiya nkina, nansho anamalhima ayo nkayanruwanakacha, nkaahokolhia mathatharu.
Nkanruma tho karumiya o neraru, anamalhima ayo nkayanrakalhiha ni uyo, ni umwoomolha umatani.
Yamalhekeru anene imata yo zabibu nkayeera, ‘Vano kiireke chani? Kinonruma mwaamwanaka kinonttuna aka, ulha anokonlhoha!’
Nansho anamalhima vaamwonne aya, nkayeeracha ashineneru, ‘Ulha phi mwaamwanaya nohalha uhiyeriya nhakhu. Nngwee nimwiive, nhakhu awe uyo ukhalheke wawihu!’
Paahi etu nkayankakhelha uchereshere imata yo zabibu nkayaamwiiva.” Yesu nkaakoha, “Vano anene imata ayo, anohalha weeriha chani anamalhima alhe?
Anene imata ayo anowa weeva yayo anamalhima ayo, ni uwaashimiha attu akina imata aya iyo.” Attu veewilhe aya, nkayeera, “Mena ahiniphwanye hii yayo!”
Yesu nkaaweha nkaakoha, “Haya etu alha Malhove Matakatifu alha anohimiani? ‘Nlhuku nikhotiye ni atheki wiira khaninlhoka nihokhalha vano nlhuku no nsingi no vakhoonani.’
Ntu riyoothe nohalha ukwakwathuwa nenno nlhuku nno nowunthakiacha, ni nno nammulhuwelhaka ntu, ninonhararia.”
Owiittuchiha Malhehero ni opochera ishaani olhupalhe nkayaalhikacha ummara Yesu vavawo, ukhalhawaya ahochuwelha wiira aahimiacha nenno nlhikaaniho nno aachaka, nansho nkayoova attu.
Paahi nkayaavia ikatema yoombone. Nkayaahonga attu o wiipangapanga arwee yankohache chookohiya choonria. Vavawo apatte iphiro yo ummara ni unrweeha wa attu o ikuru yo utawara o Urumi.
Yayo attu yaarumiye ayo, nkayaamwiirelha, “Owiittuchiha, nihochuwelha wiira, nri o wiiraniha. Nihochuwelha wiira, khannomova ntu, nnohimiacha ikeekhene yo iphiro ya Nlhuku.
Nnihimerieke etu, iri yo urera ama yo unanara hii waalhiva ikhodi Nakaisari?”
Nansho Yesu ahochuwelha nriankho aya uyo, nkeerelha,
“Nkakooniheni nikhobilhi no nchurukhu. Ilha ikhove ni nchina nna cha apani?” Nkayaakhulha, “Chi Nakaisari.”
Paahi Yesu nkeera, “Morera, paahi etu, mwaalhiveke Nakaisari iri ya Nakaisari, ni unlhiva Nlhuku iri ya Nlhuku.”
Nkayoochelha ummara wo nlhove niriyoothe vaattuni vawo, paahi nkayaamaalha athikhinaka chenre awe wo waakhulha.
Amasadukayo akina, attu yaakhota wiira attu akhwilhe kanhihimwa, nkayaawa wa Yesu unkohani, nkayeera,
“Owiittuchiha, ashinna Musa ahonilhehera wiira, ‘Nlhopwana akhwaakaru ni waahiya mahanu awe ahinayara, ahima awe akelheke manupa annyarelheke ashaana ntu khwilhe uyo.
Ahaawo ashilhoko saba o irukulhu imoka, olhupalhe ayo ahothelha nkaakhwa wo uhaahiya ashaana.
O nayelhi nkaakhelha manupa,
o neraru chiicho. Nkayeeriya chiichammo wa attu saba onkhaye nkayaakhwacha wo haahiya ashaana.
Wo umalhihera opani ayo nkayaakhwa.
vano etu, nihuku no uhihimushiya attu akhwilhe nno, apani anohalha ukhalha phi owannyaya athiyana alhe? Ukhalhawaya onkhaye saba ahaathelha.’ ”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Attu o ilha ilhapo ilha anoothelha ni uthelhiya,
nansho attu Nlhuku nohalha awe waahihimusha ikatema yo uhihimushiya attu, khanowa aathelha mena uthelhiya.
Anowa ukhalha thoko minepa mena khanowa aakhwa. Anowa ukhalha ashaana a Nlhuku ahihimushiye nnookhwani.

Nansho ashinna Musa ahomalha uhimiecheshani wiira attu akhwilhe anoohihimushiya nnookhwani. Vari nlhako unohimiacha mwaha wo ithuphi yaapharelha, inohimia wiira, Athithi phi, ‘Nlhuku a Aburahimu ni Nlhuku a Naisaka ni Nlhuku a Nayakhobo.’
Paahi etu ri Nlhuku a attu akumi, kahiwe a attu akhwilhe, ukhalhawaya uwannyawe khaawo nookhwa.”
Owiittuchiha akina nkayeera, “Owiittuchiha, vavawo nhaakhulha rata!”
olhumanche chiicho ukhalhawaya khayaarina chookohiya chikina tho.
Yesu nkaakoha, “Inooria chani wiira Kuristo thanlhiye ni Nlhuku, mwaana a Adaudi?
Adaudi anene nhina ichipo cho Izaburi aneera, ‘Athithi aheerelha Athithi, Nkhalheke wiimonono waka
mpaka vanohalha aka waathalha amalhaponi inyu wuuthi inyaa chinyu wiira mwaakalhelhe.’
Yakhalhaka Adaudi ehanne yayo, ‘Athithi’, vano etu, ineeria chani Moopolhi ukhalha mwaana a Adaudi?”
Attu onkhaye vaari aya amwiiwelhelhaka, Yesu nkeerelha owiittucha awe,

“Mwiichinanelheke ni owiittuchiha Malhehero, anottuna weetakacha anawanre ikuwo cho utalhiva ni uchivelhiya ukohachiya wo nthimicho vakittu vanopangachiya maronda, athanlhaka mapuro o nthimicho mmanupani mwo unlhapelha Nlhuku ni mmanupani munoterekhiya ikaramu,
anaathurulhacha anankhwelhi ni wiipanga attu o ulhapelha wo ulhapelha ikatema yinchi! Yayo anowa uhukumulhiya ntwarusho wo uweria chinene!”
Yesu nkaaweha rata, nkoona attu o nhakhu cheera aya wo ukumiha isadaka chaya mphacheni Inupa ya Nlhuku,
nkoona tho, opani ashikini amoka amorihaka isenti pilhi.
Nkeera, “Kinouhimeriani wo ikekhiaye wiira alha opani ashikini alha ahokumiha waapwaha attu onkhaye akuminhe muu.
Ukhalhawaya attu o nhakhu ayo akuminhe isadaka inokhuma mu ifaida yo munhakhuni mwaya, nansho opani alha, ni ushikini urina aya, akuminhe ittu yaakhulhuvelha aya.”
Owiittucha akina aari aarerihaka wi Inupa ya Nlhuku mwaha wo urera malhuku athekelhiye inupa ayo, vamoka ni isadaka chikumihiye wa Nlhuku. Yesu nkeera,
“Alha malhuku athekelhiye ishiri onkhaye nnona inyu alha, anoowa mahuku vanohalha aya uhihalha vaa ata nlhuku nimoka vachulhu nikina, kila ittu inoophomolhiya.”
Nkayankoha, “Owiittuchiha, yayo malhove ayo anowa ukhumelhelha iyaakhani? Ni ithikineha yaani inowa unichuwelhiha wiira ikatema ihaaya?”

Yesu nkaakhulha, “Nhiitialhe, nhiwe mwaathepiya. Attu enchi, anowa wiipanga phi mii, eeraka, ‘Miyaano phi Kuristo Moopolhi thanlhiye ni Nlhuku!’ Nkina eeraka, ‘Ikatema ihaaya!’ Nansho mwaattiva nhaatware.
Nhiwe mwoova vanohalha inyu wiiwa mwaha wo ikhoto ni uthemwathemwa, yayo ahothananiya uwa, nansho kuhiwe phi umalha wo chittu.”
Nkaahimeria tho, “Makosho anowa waatakana nimoka ni nikina, imwene chinowa chaatakana chineneru.
Ilhapo inowa utikhinyia chinene ni ikuruna ni mareta. Unowa ukhumelhelha mwaha wo woopiha attu ni ithikineha chulhupalhe chikhumaka wiirimu.
Nansho yayo ahinaya, nnoowa mwaavariya, nkamwaatwarushiya ni urweehiya mu inupa cho unlhapelha Nlhuku ni ujeerani, nnowa urweehiya wo mamwene ni attu o utawara wo nlhatu no nchina naka.
Yeyo phi ikatema inyu yo uhimiechesha Malhove Orera uwannyaya.
Mirima chinyu chihiwe chaathemwa, mena woova wiira nnohalha wiira chani wo wiivaraanga,
ukhalhawaya kinoowa koovahani malhove ni irusho chihinooria uvaanyihiya ni amalhaponi inyu.
Nnoowa mwaapangelhiya ichimwa ni manyanaangoro inyu ni ashilhoko inyu ni manyampwana inyu, ni akina munlhokoni mwinyu eeviyaka.
Kila ntu nowa uvengani wo nlhatu wo nchina naka.
nansho khiiwo ata ikharari imoka mmuruni mwinyu inohalha upotera.
Wo uvilhelha winyu, nnowiichoopolha ukumi inyu.”
“Vanohalha inyu woona iwani yo Uyerusalemu inarukureriye ni amalhaponi, vavawo mmweeke mwaachuwelha wiira uhaaya wo uphomolhiya waya.
Vavawo etu attu arii Uyudea attawelheke umiakoni, attu arii vawani athamacheke, ni ayo ahiri vawani ayo ahihokolhie uwani.
Ukhalhawaya yayo mahuku ayo phi ‘Mahuku o ntwarusho’, Malhove Matakatifu atimirihiye.

Ahothapana manyopani ari veruttuni ni ayo anaamwiha ashaana ashinkani yayo mahuku ayo! Ukhaalhawaya milhatu cho uhuva ni ntwarusho chinowa chaakhumelhelha velhaponi va, ni urushiya wa Nlhuku waawulhuwelhaka alha attu alha.

Attu akina anowa wiiviya wo uphanga, ni attu akina anowa ukushiya mateeka velhaponi vonkhaye, ni iwani yo Uyerusalemu inoowa yaanyikalhachiya ni attu ahiri Ayahudi, mpaka ikatema vanohalha aya utimira.”
“Chinowa woonia ithikineha chinchi wo nchuwa ni mweeri ni ittotwa. Velhaponi, ilhapo chonkhaye chinowa uhuva, wo nipampa no woova nkhito wo iphioo cho mbaharini.
Attu anowa ukomwaa wo nlhatu no woova, awehereraka mwaha unohalha ukhumelhelha velhaponi, ukhalhawaya machiri o wiirimu anowa utikhinyiya.
Vavawo etu, mwaana a Ntu phi nowa awe, awaaka mmahuteni wo machiri ni nthimicho mwinchi.
Yayo vanohalha aya uchokholha, mweemelheke rata ni utheesha miuru chinyu wiirimu, ukhalhawaya Moopolhi inyu ri vakhiviru.”
Yesu nkaahimeria nlhikaaniho, “Nkoopuwelhani mwiri wo nkhuyu ni miri chikina chinchi.
Vanoona inyu miri chiphuwaka, phi nochuwelha inyu wiira mmalha iyaakha vano.
Chiichammo etu vanohalha inyu woona alha onkhaye alha apangiaka, nnowa mwaachuwelha wiira, Imwene ya Nlhuku ihaatameria.”
“Wo ikekhiaye muupuwelheke wiira, ilha iyari ilha khinovira yayo ahinaya ukhumelhelha.
Irimu ni ilhapo chinoovira, nansho malhove aka khanovira mena.”
“Nkhalheke miitho! Mirima chinyu chihiwe chaalhemelhiya ni nikakata no chittu cho velhaponi ni uhapalhiya ni nipampa no iphiro cho mwiilhaponi. Mweettialhaka nenno nihuku nno ninowa
noovarakani thoko nriankho. Ukhalhawaya ninoowa naaphwanya attu onkhaye velhaponi va.
Nhiittialhe etu, nlhapelheke wo uhoochaa, mmwe mwaapatta machiri o uvira rata vanohalha aya uwa yayo malhove ayo, ni weemelha rata uholho wa Mwaana a Ntu.”
Yesu nkaalhokelha yayo mahuku ayo eettuchihaka attu Inupa ya Nlhuku, ni nchuwa veelha aya, aarwaa ulhokelhani uhiyu waari Mwaako wo Mizeituni.
Vaasha aya kila nihuku attu aari apeheriaka Inupa ya Nlhuku uumwiiwelhelhani.
Nihuku no isikuukuu yo mikatte cho uhihelhiya ihengedure yo Pasaka naari ninaatamenrie.
Opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni owiittuchiha Malhehero yaari yoovaka attu, paahi nkayaavia nipesha no unhelha Yesu mmachirini eeviye wo uhichuwania ni attu.
Nakare nkaakelha Nayuda ehaniya Isikariote, mmoka aya owiittucha khumi ni elhi a Yesu.
Paahi etu Nayuda nkayaarwaa uupangani miruku ni opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni aholhelhi yeemelhelha Inupa ya Nlhuku chinohalha aya unthumiha Yesu uwannyaya.
Nkayaateelhiya nkayeewanana ummaha nchurukhu.
Nayuda nkayaarumelhelha, nkayaakhalha yaaviaka nipesha noombone no unrweeha Yesu attu ahichuwelhaka.
Nihuku nkanaaphiya no mikatte cho uhihelhiya ihengedure mwaakhondoro o Pasaka vaakumihiya awe isadaka.
Yesu nkaaruma Napeturo ni Nayohana eeraka, “Nrweeke mwaterekheke ikaramu yo Pasaka niwe naalhia.”
Owiittucha ayo nkayankoha, “Nnothanana nirweeke naterekhelheke uuyi?”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Vanophiya inyu vawani, nnokomwoona ntu welhe mwaapu wo maashi. Mwanttwareke mpaka inupa inohalha awe ukelha,
mwamwiirelheke, ‘Owiittuchiha aneera, iri vayi ichuumba inohalha aka unlhelhia pasaka vamoka ni owiittucha aka?’
Nokowonihani ichuumba yulhupalhe iri inupa yo nchulhu, imanlhe urerihiya.”
Nkayarwaacha ni uphwanya kila ittu inari thoko chaahimmie awe Yesu, nkayaaterekhacha cholhia cho Pasaka.
Ikatema yaayeke, Yesu nkaakhalha ulhia yolhia vamoka ni akarumiya awe.
Nkeerelhacha, “Kaholhakelha chinene unlhia Pasaka ulha vamoka ni inyu mwaatti kihinaya uhuvihiya!
Kinouhimeriani wiira, Akinowa kanlhia tho mpaka nihuku vanohalha aya utimira wi Imweneni wa Nlhuku.”
Nkaawiaa ikikombe yo idivai, nkanshukuru Nlhuku, nkaavahacha eeraka, “Mmwieke nkawanacheke.
Ukhalhawaya kinohimia wiira, ukhuma nna akinowuria tho idivai yo zabibu mpaka Imwene ya Nlhuku vanohalha aya uwa.”
Nkaakusha nkatte, nkanshukuru Nlhuku, nkaamianiha, nkaavahacha, eeraka, “Ilha phi iruttu aka, nnovahiya inyu. Mpangeke chiicho wo ukuupuwelha.”
Thoko chiichammo, nkaavahacha ikikombe vaamalhinhe aya ulhia, eeraka, “Ilha ikikombe ilha phi Malhehano o Naanano anohimiecheshiya ni iphome aka, inorihiaa wo nlhatu ninyu.”
“Nansho, mwooneke! Ntu nokithumiha rii vava, nolhia vamoka ni mii!
Mwaana a Ntu nookhwa thoko Nlhuku chenre awe wo uhimia, nansho hothapana yoyo ntu nohalha unthumiha uyo!”
Paahi nkayaachokholha ukohanacha ashineneru, phi mpani yoyo nohalha wiira chommo.
Nkawaakhumelhelha uvaanyihana munlhokoni mwa owiittucha wiira mpani rii mulhupalhe aya.
Yesu nkeerelha, “Amwene o velhaponi va anaatawara attu ahiri Ayahudi wo ikuru, ehaniyaka ‘Manyampwana a attu’.
Nansho ihikhalhe chiicho uwaninyu mwaatti, ntu ri mulhupalhe munlhokoni mwinyu nophwanelhiya ukhalha mwankani waapwaha onkhaye munlhokoni mwinyu, ni nholhelhi akhalheke thoko namitheko.
Attu anaanyihera mulhupalhe phi mpani? Phi nokhalha uweherera aterekhelhiye ama naaterekhelha akina? Phi yoyo nokhalha ni uterekhelhiya. Nansho mii kiri va ukhalha namitheko inyu.”
“Nholhokelha ni mii ikatema yonkhaye yo ulhikachiya waka,
ni chiyo thoko chinre aya Athithi wo ukivaha mii Imwene, ni mii kinouvahani mwaatti Imwene iyo.
Nnowa mwaalhia ni uwuria vamoka ni mii wi Imwene aka, ni inyu nnowa ukhalhelha ihiche ye Imwene mwaahukumulhaka makosho khumi ni melhi o Uisraeli.”
“Nasimoni, Nasimoni! Nkeewani! Nakare naavia nipesha no ulhikachani onkhaye, no uveera imbeyu ni iphepuwa, thoko namalhima chinoveera awe mmuka.
Nansho mii kihoulhapelhelhani, Nasimoni, wiira nrima winyu uhiwukuwe. Ni inyu vanohalha inyu ukihokolheelha, mmwe mwaahelha nrima ashilhoko inyu.”
Napeturo nkayeera, “Thithi, Kiri tayari uttukiya ata ukhwa vamoka ni inyu!”
Yesu nkeera, “Napeturo kinouhimeriani wiira, nthupi uhinaya wiipa mapikoosha, nnowa mwaakiruna vararu wiira khankichuwenlhe mii.”
Yesu nkaakoha owiittucha awe, “Ikatema korumme akani wo hikusha nrupa wo nchurukhu mena nchako mena iraatu, chani mwahohuvelha ittu iriyoothe?” Nkayaakhulhacha, “Ata mena.”
Yesu nkeera, “Nansho vano, ntu ri ni nrupa ama nchako wo nchurukhu akusheke, ni ntu hiri ni uphanga, athumiheke nikoti nawe athumeke.
Paahi kinouhimeriani wiira, Malhove Matakatifu aneera, ‘Aheeshiya nlhoko mmoka ni attu o uwonya,’ anootimira, ukhalhawaya nlhove ninokaacha mii ninootimirihiya.”
Owiittucha nkayeeracha, “Thithi, mmweheke! Vaa ahawo maphanga melhi!” Nkaakhulha, “Haya etu.”
Yesu nkaathama ni urwaa waari Mwaako wo Mizeituni, aattukanaka owiittucha awe thoko cheera awe.
Vaaphilhe awe wowo, nkeerelhacha, “Nlhapelheke, nhiwe mwaawulhuwa muulhikachiyani.”
Nkaahiyacha, nkaarwa vatayi vakani wo ntu uwonya nlhuku, nkaakhoroma ulhapelha.
“Thithi, mwattunaka nthamiheke ilha ikikombe ilha. Nansho kuhiwe thoko chinothanana aka nansho mattunelho inyu, atimirihiye.”
Nnepa wo wiirimu nkawaawa unhelha nrima.
Ahuvaka chinene munrimani, nkaalhepelha wo machiri chinene, ntukutta thoko iphome nkanankhuma nkanaamora vathi.
Amalhiheke ulhapelha, nkaahokolhelha owiittucha awe, nkaaphwanyacha anarumpe, ukhalhawaya yaari anakelhiye ihuzuni.
Nkeerelhacha, “Chani woonaka nnorupa? Mweemelheke nlhapelheke wiira nhiwulhuwe muulhikachiyani.”
Yesu aari bado olhumachaka, mphingo wa attu vaawilhe aya, aholhelhiyaka ni Nayuda, mmoka aya owiittucha khumi ni elhi. Nkaawa ni uthanana unkumbatira Yesu.
Nansho Yesu nkeera, “Nayuda, nnothanana unthumiha Mwaana a Ntu wo unkumbatira?”
Owiittucha awe yooneke, nkayeeracha, “Thithi, chani nikumiheke mialho?”
Mmoka aya nkanthikilha karumiya a Opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni unkwatulha nnyaru no wiimonono.
Nansho Yesu nkeera, “Nhiyeke, ilha ihothosha!” Nkankwakwanya nnyaru naakhapiye nno, nkaalhamiha.

Paahi etu, Yesu nkeerelhacha opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni aholhelhi ni attu emelhelha Inupa ya Nlhuku ni ashulhupalhe yaawiilhe ummara ayo, “Chani woonaka mmweelhe mialho chulhupalhe ni indonga uwa uukivarani thoko nnowa ummara ntu o uvara makhuche?
Kaari ni inyu mwaatti kila nihuku keettuchihaka Inupa ya Nlhuku, nansho khamwakivanre. Nansho vano phi ikatema inyu yo upanga, phi ikatema yo ikuru yo mwiipiphini.”
Nkayammara Yesu ni unrweeha upuwani wa Opochera ishaani olhupalhe, Napeturo attwaraka utayiutayi.
Mooro waari unaparihelhiye variyari ipuwa, Napeturo nkayaakhalha wootta vamoka ni attu akina.
Karumiya mmoka nthiyana vonne aya anakhanlhe oottaka mooro, nkaaweha ni uhimia wiira, “Ulha ntu ulha chiicho aari vamoka ni Yesu!”
Nansho Napeturo nkayaaruna, “Uwe nthiyana, akinchuwenlhe mii yoyo ntu uyo!”
Katashi tho, ntu nkina nkoona Napeturo nkeera, “Inyu mwaari mmoka aya!” Nansho Napeturo nkaakhulha, “Uwe, mii akihiwe!”
Yavireke isaa imoka, ntu nkina nkaamindelha, “Wo ikekhiaye, khiiwo yo ukhota, wiira ulha aari vamoka ni Yesu, ukhalhawaya ni uyo nokhuma Ugalilaya!”
Nansho Napeturo nkayaakhulha, “Uwena, akichuwenlhe unhimia awo!” Vavawo vavawo, anari olhumachaka, nthupi nkaweepa.
Athithi nkayaarukunuwa ni waaweha Napeturo wiitho. Napeturo nkayoopuwelha cheerelhiye aya ni Athithi, “Nthupi uhinaya wiipa mapikoosha, nnoowa mwaakiruna mikwaha miraru wiira khankichuwenlhe.”
Napeturo nkayaakhuma vathe, nkayonlha chinene.
Attu anlhitelhelha Yesu ayo, nkayaamwata ni unheulhacha.
Nkayanttuka ikuwo wiitho ni unkoha, “Nlhamulheke mpani owatilheni!”
Nkayanruwanakacha chinene.
Washeeke, ashulhupalhe ni opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna nkayaakumaana uwaamulhani, Yesu nkaawihiya upuwani.
Nkayeeracha, “Unihimerieke, Uweva phi Kuristo Moopolhi?” Yesu nkaakhulha, “Mii kahimiaka, mwaatti khannokirumelhelha,
ni vavawo kookohakani, khannokaakhulha.
Nansho uchokholhelha nna Mwaana a Ntu nowa ukhalha wiimonono wa Athithi Nlhuku o machiri.”
Attu onkhaye nkayeera, “Paahi niireke etu, uwe phi Mwaana a Nlhuku?” Yesu nkaakhulha, “Inyu mwaatti nhohimia, wiira phi mii.”
Ni ayo nkayeeracha, “Chani uhawo uhimiechesha ukina tho! Ukhalhawaya hohimiacha wo malhaku awe mwanene ni inyu nheewacha!”
Nlhoko wonkhaye nkaweemelha ni unrweha Yesu mpaka u Napilato

waamwemenshe aya ni uchokholha uhimiacha milhatu, “Nahomwona ulha ntu ulha aapoterihaka attu o velhaponi, eerelhaka wiira ahilhive ikhodi wa Nakaisari ni wiichihana mwanene wiira, Kuristo Moopolhi thanlhiye ni Nlhuku mwene a Ayahudi.”
Napilato nkayankoha Yesu, “Inyuva phi amwene a Ayahudi?” Yesu nkaakhulha, “Thoko chinre inyu wo wulhumacha.”
Napilato nkayeerelha opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni attu wiira, “Akoonaka nlhatu uriwoothe wa ulha ntu ulha.”
Nansho attu nkayaathepa ukuruvalhelha wo machiri chinene, “Nowaachopeacha ni weettuchiha attu apange injoove ilhapo yonkhaye yo Uyudea. Aachokhonlhe Ugalilaya vano rii vaa.”
Napilato veewilhe aya, nkayaakoha, “Kwani yolha ntu ulha nokhuma Ugalilaya?”
Vaachuwenlhe aya wiira aari ntu o ilhapo yo ikuru i Naherode, nkayanhokolhosha u Naherode uwo, aari yeyo ikatema iyo Uyerusalemu.
Naherode nkayaateelhiya nrima umwoona Yesu, ukhalhawaya yaari amwiiwaka athananaka umwoona toka khalhayi. Akhulhuvelhaka umwoona Yesu apangaka cho ushangiha.
Paahi etu Naherode nkayankoha Yesu chookohiya chinchi, nansho Yesu khaakhunlhe.
Opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni owiittuchiha Malhehero yaari miholho ahimiachaka milhatu chinchi choomwootheria Yesu.
Naherode ni manyaaasikari aya nkayampangelha Yesu ncheche, nkayammwariha n'golole we imwene nkayanhokolhosha u Napilato.
Toka nenno nihuku nno, Napilato ni Naherode nkayaalhutanaacha umpwana, ukhalhawaya khalhayi vawo kila mmoka khaari ewananaka ni nkhunanawe.
Napilato nkayeehanacha opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni aholhelhi ni attu vamoka,
nkayeera, “Nhommwiiha yolha ntu ulha uwannyaka mwiiraka wiira aari aapoterihaka attu. Vano etu, kihonkohacha mwaatti mwiiwaka, ni mii akoonne nlhatu uriwoothe uhimianche inyu.
Akihiwe mii vekha mena Naherode oonne nlhatu, phi nhokolhonshe aya uwanihu. Khuuwo nlhatu wo hii umwiiva.
Paahi mii kinomwaata ikopo ni unhiyerera.”
Kila nihuku no Pasaka, Napilato aari ni malhemalhelho o unhiyerera ntu mmoka ttukiye aathananiya ni attu.
Nlhoko wonkhaye nkawaakhuwelha, “Eeviye! Munhiyerereke Baraba!”
Baraba uyo aattukiye wo nlhatu no injoove yaapangeelhe vawani ni nlhatu no weeva attu.
Napilato aari athananaka unhiyerera Yesu, paahi nkayoolhumana attu tho.
Nansho attu yaari akhuwelhachaka, “Munkhomelhelhe vansalaabani! Munkhomelhelhe vansalaabani!”
Napilato nkayeera tho vo neraru, “Nansho ttenkeni? Khuuwo nlhatu kinoona aka wo umwiiva! Kinoomwata ikopo ni unthaphulha.”
Nansho attu nkayaathepa ukhuwelhacha avekelhaka wiira Yesu akhomelhelhiye, ni nlhove naya nkanaarumelhelhiya.
Paahi etu Napilato nkayanhukumulha Yesu thoko chaalhepelha aya attu.
Nkayanthaphulha Baraba, ntu aattukiye wo nlhatu no injoove ni niiviho, nkayaavaha Yesu wiira ampangeke ittu yaathanana aya, thoko chaavekelha aya.
Manyaasikaari nkayanvelhelha Yesu, vaarwaa aya nkayankumaana ntu o Ukirene nchina nawe Simoni aawa akhumaka umatani. Nkayanchuchumiha, nkayanriaa nsalaaba, akushe anttwaraka Yesu utulhi.
Nlhoko mulhupalhe wa attu nkawanttwara, akina aya yaari manyopani onlhacha umunlhelha.
Yesu nkaarukunuwelha, nkeerelha, “Manyopani o Uyerusalemu! Nhikunlhelhe mii, nansho mwichunlhelheke mwaashinene ni achishaana inyu.
Ukhalhawaya mahuku anowa attu vanowa aya wiira, ‘Ahoreeriya manyaathiyana ahiyanre, ahaayanre ashaana mena ulhelha!’
Yeyo ikatema iyo, attu phi nowa aya wiirelha miako, ‘Nniwulhuwelheke! Nnivitheke!’
Vavawo attu aneera chiicho wo mwiri nkithi, mwiri wo wuuma inohalha wiiria chani?”
Attu akina elhi, onkhaye o uwonya, yaari ni ayo arweehiyaka wiiviya vamoka ni Yesu.
Vaaphilhe aya vakittu vaneehaniya “Nikhurukucha no muru,” nkayankhomelhelha Yesu vavawo, ni attu elhi o uwonya, mmoka wiimonono ni nkina wiimushi.
Yesu nkeera, “Thithi mwaalhevelheke! Ukhalhawaya khachuwenlhe impanga aya.” Nkayaakawanacha ikuwo chawe wo woopelha ikhura.
Attu nkayeemelhacha aawehaka Aholhelhi a Ayahudi vampangelha aya ncheche, “Ahoopolha attu akina, haya etu echopolheke mwanene yakhalhaka uyo phi Kuristo Moopolhi thanlhiye ni Nlhuku!”
Manyaasikaari ni ayo nkayampangelha ncheche chiicho, nkayaawa nkayammaha isiki,
yiiraka, “Wiichopolheke umwanene wakhalhaka uwe phi mwene a Ayahudi!”
Vachulhu nsalaaba nkayaakhomelhelha nipattu naalhempe aya malhove eera, “Ulha phi mwene a Ayahudi.”
Mmoka a attu yaakhomelhelhiye vamoka ni Yesu nkaachokholha unruwana Yesu, “Uwe kuhiwe phi Kuristo Moopolhi? Wiichoopolheke umwanene, unoopolheke ni hii!”
Nkina uyo nansho, nkanchachera nkhunanawe eeraka, “Uwe khunomoova Nlhuku? Ihukumu ipantte awo iyo phi pantte awe.
Hii, ikekhiaye ihu iyo, phi niphwanenlhe, ukhalhawaya nihopochera malhivo o mitheko chihu, nansho uyo khawonnye ittu.”
Nkaamwiirelha Yesu, “Yesu wakuupuwelheke mii, vanohalha awo uwa unari Amwene vawo!”
Yesu nkaamwirelha, “Kinoolhelha wo ikekhiaye wiira lhelho nna, unowa waakhalha ni mii Uphiooni.”
Yaari saa sita uthana nchuwa vaatiphiilhe aya, ipiphi nkayaawanelha ilhapo yonkhaye mpaka vaari aya saa tisa,
Nipaziya nulhupalhe naattukelhelhiye variyari u Inupa ya Nlhuku nkanaahuwa velhi.
Yesu nkaakhuwelha, “Thithi! Kinoweesha nnepa aka mmathathani mwinyu!” Voolhumanche awe chiicho, nkaarihiaa.
Nholhelhi a manyaasikari o Rumi nkoona cheeria, nkanthimicha Nlhuku, eeraka, “We ikekhiaye ulha aari ntu orera nrima!”
Attu aathukumanne vavawo uweha chaapangiaa ahoona chikhumelhenlhe, nkayaathuruwa mmawani, echatakachaka ikhakacha wo wooniha ihuzuni.
Attu onkhaye anchuwenlhe Yesu, ikhalhaka vamoka ni manyopani antwanre ukhuma Ugalilaya, yaari aneemenlhe utayi awehaka.
Ahokhalha attu amoka o rera nrima anenchi o Uarimathaya iwani yo Uyudea nchina naya Nayusufu.

Yayo aari ntu o Uarimathaya, aapanga thoko Nlhuku chaathanana awe attuniyaka ni attu, awehereraka uwa wo Imwene ya Nlhuku. Inakhalhaka aari ntu o Ipuwa yulhupalhe ya Ayahudi, khaari arumelhelhaka ittu ipangiye.
Yayo yahorwaa u Napilato nkayaavekelha avahiye iruttu ya Yesu.
Nkayaakurusha iruttu iyo vathi, nkaavilhikelha ikuwo yo hariri, nkayaavitha nnihiyeni mwaahemiye vamwalhani, nihiye naari bado uvithiya ntu.
Nenno naari nihuku no Ijumaa, Nihuku no Wiittuwa niwaaka meelho aya.
Manyopani yantwanre Yesu ukhuma Ugalilaya nkayarwaa ni Nayusufu uwinnuwelhani nihiye nivithiye awe Yesu. Nkayoona vavithiye aya iruttu awe.
Nkayaahokolhiacha uwani nkayaakooroshacha makhura o unukhelha o uwa uuhikani iruttu ya Yesu. Nihuku no Wiittuwa nkayeettuwa thoko Malhehero chaalhehera aya.
Mapikoosha o nihuku no Jumaapili manyopani yahorwaa unihiyeni, anakushilhe makhura o unukhelha aakoronshe aya.
Nkayaaphwanya nlhuku ninapirikishiye ni uthama vanlhakoni vawo,
paahi etu nkayaakelhacha nhina, nansho khayaaphwannye iruttu ya Athithi Yesu.
Nkayeemelha ashangachaka yoyo mwaha uyo, wo uhikhulhuvelha, nkayaakhumelhelha attu elhi aawanre ikuwo chootelha chinene, eemelhaka waatameria.
Manyopani ayo yoovaka nkayaakhoromacha vathi, attu ayo veera aya, “Yeeshiyani umwaavia ntu nkumi mwa attu akhwilhe?
Khaawo vaa, hohihimwa. Muupuwelheke chenre awe wo uhimia vaari inyu Ugalilaya,
‘Mwaana a Ntu hophwanelhiya uhelhiya mmathathani mwa attu o uwonya, akhomelhelhiye, ni nihuku no neraru ahihimmwe.’ ”
Manyopani nkayoopuwelha malhove awe,
nkayaakhuma nnihiyeni, nkayaahimiacha mwaha wonkhaye waahimiachera owiittucha khumi ni mmoka ahanlhe alhe.
Manyopani ayo yaari Amariamu Magidalena ni Nayoana ni Amariamu anumwanaya Nayakhobo, yayo ni manyopani akina phi ahimianche wa akarumiya.
Nansho akarumiya nkayoona yayo malhove ayo thoko ncheche, khayaarumelhenlhe.
Nansho Napeturo nkayaarwaa unihiyeni attimakachaka, nkayooroma, vaathurumenlhe aya nkayoona ikuworu. Paahi nkayaahokolhia uwani ashangaka mwaha ukhumelhenlhe.
Nenno nihuku, owiittucha elhi a Yesu yaari akelhaka iwani yeehaniya Uemau, imaili saba ukhuma Uyerusalemu,
arerihaka ashineneru mwaha wonkhaye upangeelhe.
Vaari aya eetaka arerihaka, Yesu mwanene nkaawa aatameriaka ni weeta vamoka ni ayo,
nkayaamwona, nansho ahinchuwelhaka.
Yesu nkeerelhacha, “Nnoopa mwaha waani mwaashineneru uno mweetaka?” Nkayeemelhacha, wiitho anachanre ihuzuni.
Mmoka aya eehaniya Nakileopa nkankoha, “Kwani inyuva alheto va Yerusalemu va, vekha nhinochuwelha chittu chipangelhe alha mahuku vakani avinre alha?”
Yesu nkaakoha, “Mwaha waani?” Nkayaamwaakhulha, “Mwaha umphwannye Yesu o Unazareti. Yoyo ntu uyo aari namilhohi a Nlhuku aari ni ikuru wa Nlhuku ni wa attu yo upanga chittu ni wiittuchiha.
Opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni aholhelhi ihu yahonkumiha wiira ahukumulhiye, nkaakhomelhelhiya.
Nansho hii nahonkhulhuvelha wiira phi nowa woopolha attu o Israeli! Upwaha vavawo, lhelho nihuku no neraru toka vaapangeelhe aya.
Tho manyopani akina munlhokoni mwihu ahonithuthusha, yahorwaa unihiyeni lhelho wichishuru,
nansho khayoonne iruttu iyo. Nkayaahokolhia eeraka wiira ahoona minepa chaahimmie wiira hohihimmwa.
Attu akina nkayaarwaa unihiyeni ni uphwanya thoko chaahimiye ni manyopani alhe, nansho khayamwonne.”
Vavawo etu Yesu nkeerelha, “Woonaka nhophupuwalha mwaatti ayi, wo mirima chimpicha urumelhelha malhove aahimiye ni anamilhohi a Nlhuku!
Chani, khawalhonke Kuristo Moopolhi thanlhiye ni Nlhuku uhuvihachiya, wiira akelhe rata munthimichoni mwawe?”
Nkaapatakulhelha chittu chonkhaye chaamwacha nhina Malhove Matakatifu uchokholha wa ashinna Musa mpaka wa anamilhohi onkhaye.
Vaatameria aya iwani yaalhukama aya, Yesu nkeepanga thoko noopwaha vavawo,
nansho yayo manyaattu ayo nkayampepecha, eeraka, “Nkhalheke ni hii, uheelha.” Paahi etu nkaarwa uwannyaya.
Nkaakhalha ulhia yolhia vamoka, nkaakusha nkatte, nkaalhapelhelha ibarakha, nkaamia, nkaavahacha.
Miitho aya nkayaapatakulhiya nkayanchuwelha, nansho nkaapotera vamiithoni waya.
Nkayeera ashineneru, “Chani mirima chihu khachaari chipharelhaka mooro volhumachawe unilhamulhelha Malhove Matakatifu mphironi mmwe?”
Yeyo ikatema nkayaathama nkayaahokolhia Uyerusalemu, nkayaaphwanyacha owiittucha khumi ni mmoka anathukumanne vamoka,
eerachaka wiira, “Wo ikekhiaye, Athithi ahohihimmwa! Ahaakhumelhelha Nasimoni!”
Owiittucha elhi nkayaahimiacha mwaha waakhumelhenlhe mphironi, ni chenre aya wo waachuwelha Athithi vaamianinhe aya nkatte wa Owiittucha aya.
Akarumiya elhi ayo vaari aya ahimiachaka yoyo mwaha uyo, wo uhiweherera, Athithi anene nkayeemelha variyari aya eeraka, “Mpuha ukhalhe ni inyu.”
Nkayaathuthuwacha, yaanyiheraka wiira ahoona nshoka.
Nansho nkeerelhacha, “Nnoovani? Nnowelhiyani nipampa mu nrimani?
Mmweheke mathatha ni mieto chaka, nkiweheke ni mii kimwanene. Nkikwakwanyeke, nnowoona wiira akiri nshoka, ukhalhawaya nshoka khanirina iruttu yo ithayi mena makhuva, thoko nnokoona inyu chi.”
Nkeera chiicho oonihachaka mathatha awe ni mieto chawe.
Akarumiya vaari aya ahirumelhelhaka ittu yoona aya, uno athepaka wuumiya uwanoni wo uteelhiya, Yesu ahaakohacha, “Nhanaa ittu yo ulhia va?”
Nkayammaha ihopa yo waaneelhiya,
nkaakusha nkaalhia amwoonaka.

Paahi nkaahimeriacha wiira, “Chilha phi chittu chaahimilhe aka ikatema vaari aka ni inyu. Ikhalhe wiira, kila ittu ilhepiye ikaachaka nhina Malhehero a ashinna Musa, chilhepiye ni anamilhohi ni Izaburi chihotimira.”
Nkaapatakulha irusho chaya wiira achuwelhe Malhove Matakatifu
nkeerelhacha, “Phinre aya wo ulhepiya, Kuristo Moopolhi nowa uhuvihiya ni uhihimmwa nnookhwani aviraka nihuku no neraru,
ni wo nchina nawe nttenga wo uhiyereriya uwonya unohimiachiya mwiilhaponi mwonkhaye, ichokholhaka Uyerusalemu.
Inyu phi o uhimiechesha chittu chonkhaye chi.
Ni mii kinommwiiha alhehiye ni Athithi uwaninyu. Nansho nnothananiya uweherera nnari iwani yuulhupalhe mpaka machiri o wiirimu vanohalha aya uwa.”
Paahi nkaaholhelha uthama vawani mpaka Ubethaniya, vaathenshe awe miono nkaavaha ibarakha.
Vaari awe aavahaka ibarakha, ahaahiya, nkaakushiya wiirimu.
Nkayanthimicha ni uhokolhia Uyerusalemu, wo mpuha mwinchi,
nkayaalhokelhacha ikatema yonkhaye akhalhaka Inupa ya Nlhuku antotopelhaka Nlhuku.
Vaachokhonlhe aya chittu chonkhaye chihinoopiya, Nlhove ahaawo, ni uyo aari ni Nlhuku, ni uyo aari Nlhuku.
Toka vaachokhonlhe aya Nlhove aari vamoka ni Nlhuku.
Nlhuku voopilhe awe chittu chonkhaye ahaawo, khiiwo iriyoothe yoopiye wo uhikhalha yoyo
Nlhove phi aari machokholhelho o ukumi ni uyo ukumi uyo nkawaawiha nthuko wa attu.
Nthuko waamwalhelha mwiipiphini, ni ipiphi khayoonrie utipiha yoyo nthuko uyo.
Nlhuku ahonruma karumiya awe, eehaniya Yohana,
aawilhe uhimiechesha wa attu mwaha wo yoyo nthuko uyo, attu eewe ni urumelhelha.
Nayohana khayaari yoyo nthuko uyo, nansho aawilhe uhimiechesha wa attu mwaha wo yoyo nthuko uyo.
Yolha phi nthuko we ikekhiaye, nthuko unowa velhaponi ni wamwalhelha attu onkhaye.
Nlhove ahaawo velhaponi, ni wo iphiro awe ilhapo yahoopiya, inakhalhaka chiicho, attu o velhaponi khayanchuwenlhe.
Aawilhe velhaponi vawe mwanene, nansho attu awawe khayampochenre.
Akina, nansho, yampochenre ni unrumelhelha, yayo ahaavaha ikuru yo ukhalha ashaana a Nlhuku phi alhe arumelhenlhe nchina nawe.
Ahikhalhaka ashaana a Nlhuku wo iphiro thoko cho uyariya ni ntu, mena mattunelho a ntu, Nlhuku mwanene phi ari athumwanaya.
Yoyo Nlhove uyo nkaakhalha ntu, nkaakhalha uwanihu. Ni hii nahoona nthimicho wawe, nthimicho wawe yoyo ri Mwaana o vekhawe a Nlhuku chanre nnema ni ikeekhene.

Nayohana nkayaahimiechesha wa attu mwaha wawe. Nkayaakhuwelha eeraka, “Yolha phi ulhe kanhimianche aka venre aka wiira, ‘Noowa ntu mmoka vatulhi waka, ri mulhupalhe ukipwaha mii, ukhalhawaya ahaawo kihinayariaa.’ ”
Wo nnema wawe mwinchi, hiyaano onkhaye nihopochera mpuha umpwaha mpuha uvinre.
Nlhuku ahonivaha Malhehero wo iphiro ya ashinna Musa, nansho nnema ni ikeekhene chihoniweelha wo iphiro ya Yesu Kuristo.
Khaawo ntu mwonne Nlhuku ikatema iriyoothe. Mwaana vekha awe, aakhalha vamoka ni Nlhuku, phi nichuwelhinhe Athithi.
Wu phi uhimiechesha u Nayohana, ikatema aholhelhi a Ayahudi o Yerusalemu vaarumme aya opochera ishaani ni Alawi u Nayohana yaakohe wiira, “Inyuva phi apani?”
Nayohana khakhonte waakhulha, nkayeera wo uhivitha wiira, “Miyaano kakihena Kuristo Moopolhi a attu.”

Vavawo nkayaakohiya tho, “Inyuva phi apani etu? Chani inyuva phi Naeliya?” Nayohana nkaakhulha, “Akihena mii.” Nkayaakohiya tho, “Chani inyuva phi anamilhohi alhe anowehereriya uwa uuromolhani nihuku no uwa Masiya?” Nkaakhulha “Akihena mii.”
Nkayaakohiya tho, “Paahi etu inyuva phi apani? Nnihimerieke mwaanene nlhove nowahimeria anirumme.”
Nayohana nkaakhulha, “Miyaano phi yolhe anamilhohi ashinna Isaya aahimmie aya yeeraka, ‘Nlhove na ntu niheewaniya muuthakoni, Chookolhiye iphiro cho uvira Athithi!’ ”
Yayo akarumiya yaarumiye ni nlhoko wa Amafarisayo ayo,
nkayaakoha Nayohana, “Yakhalhaka inyuva kanhena Kuristo, kanhena Naeliya ni vavawo kanhena anamilhohi, woonaka nnowaabatiiza attu?”
Nayohana nkayaakhulha, “Miyaano kinaabatiiza attu wo maashi, nansho hawo mmoka eemenlhe munlhokoni mwinyu mwaattiva nhinaaya unchuwelha.
Yoyo nowa utulhi waka, nansho mii kihiphwanelhiyaka inakhalhaka uthaphulha miripwe cho ikwakwata chawe.”
Yoyo mwaha uyo waakhumelhenlhe Ubethaniya, unosha nchuwa ukhopelhelhe mwolhoko wo Uyorodani, Nayohana vaari aya aabatiizaka attu.
Waashelhe waya, Nayohana ahomwoona Yesu awaaka, nkayeera, “Ulha phi Mwaana o Khondoro a Nlhuku nothamiha uwonya wa attu.
Yolha phi ulhe kanhimianche aka wiira, ‘Utulhi waka nowa ntu mmoka ri mulhupalhe ukipwaha mii, ukhalhawaya ahaawo mii kihinayariaa.’
Miyaano kimwanene akanchuwenlhe, nansho kiwiilhe uwabatiiza attu wo maashi ikhalhe wiira attu o Uisraeli anchuwelhe.”
Nayohana nkayaahimiechesha eeraka, “Kahomwoona Iphumu ya Nlhuku akhuruwaka thoko kaulha ukhuma wiirimu ni ukorelha vanikhathani vawe.

Miyaano akanchuwenlhe, nansho Nlhuku kirumme kaabatiize attu wo maashi ahokihimeria wiira, ‘Ulhe ntu nnohalha inyu umwoona akhuruwelhiyaka ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku ni unkorelha vanikhathani vawe, yoyo phi ntu naabatiiza attu wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku.’
Nayohana nkayeera, kihoona, ni mii kihimiecheshe vano wiira yolha phi Mwaana a Nlhuku.”
Waashelhe waya, Nayohana aari vavawo tho vamoka ni owiittucha aya elhi.
Vaamwonne aya Yesu aviraka nkayeera, “Mmwooneke! Ulha phi Mwaana o Khondoro a Nlhuku.”
Owiittucha aheewa Nayohana voolhumacha aya yayo malhove ayo, nkayanttwaracha Yesu.
Yesu nkaarukunuwa, nkoona owiittucha a Nayohana anttwaraka, nkaakoha, “Nnaaviani?” Ni ayo nkayaakhulhacha “Rabi, nnokhalha vayi?” Rabi maana aya, “Owiittuchiha.”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Mmweeke ni inyu nnowoona.” Vavawo waari uchechilho, paahi etu owiittucha ayo nkayaarwaa nkayoona vaakhalha awe, nkayankhalhana uwannyawe nenno nihuku nno.
Naandorea ahima aya Nasimoni Peturo yaari amoka ya attu elhi yeewilhe Nayohana voolhumacha aya, nkayanttwara Yesu.
Vahiphincheru Naandorea nkayaakumaana Nasimoni ahima aya, nkayaahimeria wiira, “Nihomwoona Masiya.” Masiya maana aya Kuristo, Moopolhi.

Nkayaavelhelha Nasimoni wa Yesu, Yesu nkaaweha Nasimoni nkeera, “Inyuva phi Nasimoni mwaana a Nayohana, nansho vano nnohalha wiihaniya Kefa.” Ukhalhawaya we Iyunani nenno nchina nno phi Peturo maana aya mwalha.
Waashelhe waya Yesu nkoona mbaya arwee Ugalilaya. Nkaaphwanya Nafilipo nkeerelha, “Nkittware!”
Nafilipo aari anenchi o Ubethsaida, iwani yaakhalha aya Naandorea ni Napeturo.

Nafilipo ni ayo nkaaphwanya Nanathanieli, nkaahimeria, “Nihomwoona ulhe ashinna Musa anromonlhe aya nhina ikitabu yo Malhehero, ni anamilhohi alhepaka nttenga wawe. Yoyo phi Yesu mwaana a Nayusufu, o Unazareti.”
Nanathanieli nkayaakoha Nafilipo, “Ittu yoombone inowooria ukhuma Unazareti?” Nafilipo nkayaakhulha, “Mmwe mwoona.”
Yesu vonne aya Nanathanieli awaaka nkeera, “Mmwooneke! Yolha phi Mwiisraeli mwanenene, khiiwo ittu innananre nhina mwawe!”
Nanathanieli nkayankoha, “Nkichuwenlhe chani?” Yesu nkaakhulha, “Vaari inyu wuthi nkhuyu Nafilipo ahinaya uwihanani kahowoonani.”
Vavawo Nanathanieli nkayaamwakhulha Yesu eeraka, “Owiittuchiha, inyuva phi Mwaana a Nlhuku! Inyuva phi Amwene o Uisraeli!”
Yesu nkeerelha, “Chani nnorumelhelha ukhalhawaya kihouhimeriani wiira kahowoonani vaari inyu wuthi nkhuyu? Nnowa mwoona moolhupalhe upwaha alha!”
Yesu nkaahimeria onkhaye wiira, “Kinouhimeriani ikekhiaye, nnowoona irimu chihulhiaka ni minepa cha Nlhuku chiwelhaka ni ukhuruwa vachulhu vawe Mwaana a Ntu.”
Nihuku no neraru ahokhalha arusi iwani yo Ukaana, ilhapo yo Ugalilaya, anumwanawe Yesu aari wowo,
ni Yesu aholhalheiya vamoka ni owiittucha awe wa arusini uwo.
Idivai yamalheke, anumwanawe nkayaamwiirelha Yesu, “Idivai ihomalha.”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Maanyi, nlhatu waani nnokiirelha chiicho. Ikatema aka khinaaya.”
Anumwane Yesu aheerelha akarumiya, “Ittu iriyoothe inohalha awe uhimeriani mpangeke.”

Ayahudi ahanaa malhemalhelho o ukhucha. Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, chahokhalha vavawo miapu cho malhuku nthanu ni mmoka. Ni kila mwaapu mmoka waahelhiya maashi wo umalhaka madumu makani makhumi melhi ama makhumi mararu.
Yesu nkeerelha akarumiya, “Nchariheke maashi mmiapuni mmo.” Ni ayo nkayaacharihacha maashi mpaka nchulhu tetetete.
Yesu nkeerelhacha akarumiya, “Vano nrikeke ni waarwehelha nankawa.” Nkayaarika ni waarwehelha nankawa,
maashi yaathathuwilhe vano ukhalha idivai, ni ayo nkayaalhawiha. Nansho khayaachuwenlhe wiira ikhumme uyi. Nansho akarumiya alhe yaari achuwelhaka ukhumelhenlhe aya. Nankawa nkeehana abwana arusi,
nkoolhumacha eerelhaka, “Attu onkhaye ampachera thoko ukawa idivai yo uchiva, yamalhaka phi nokawa aya idivai yooririya. Nansho inyuva nhoshunga idivai yo uchiva mpaka nna!”
Yesu aapannge yeyo yo ushangiha yo uchokholha iyo Ukaana ilhapo yo Ugalilaya, wowo nkooniha nthimicho wawe, ni owiittucha awe nkayanrumelhelha.
Arusi amalheke, Yesu ni anumwanawe vamoka ni ashihimawe ni owiittucha awe, nkayaarwaa Ukapenaumu ni ukhalha wowo wo mahuku vakani.
Isikuukuu yo Pasaka ya Ayahudi yaari inaatamenrie, paahi etu Yesu nkarwaa Uyerusalemu.
Wowo, u Inupa ya Nlhuku nkaaphwanya attu athumihaka ing'ope, ikhondoro, ni ikhunda, ni attu o wakakaniha nchurukhu anari anakhanlhanche mmamezani mwaya aakakhanihaka nchurukhu.
Nkaakorosha ikopo yo nttondoro, nkoomolhacha ashinama onkhaye vathe, ikhondoro vamoka ni ing'ope, nkaapitikulhacha imeza chaya, ni umwarushacha nchurukhu u Inupa ya Nlhuku mmo,
nkeerelha alhe aathumiha ikhunda alhe wiira, “Nthamihache chilha chittu chilha vaa! Nhipange inupa ya Athumwanaka ukhalha nipuro no upangelha maronda!”
Owiittucha awe nkoopuwelha iholhepiya nhina Malhove Matakatifu wiira, “Uttuna waka inupa inyu Apwiiya Nlhuku unokiiva, ukipahaka thoko mooro.”
Aholhelhi a Ayahudi nkayaamwakhulha Yesu wo unkoha, “Nnaapangeke cho ushangiha chaani wooniha wiira nhanaa ikuru yo upangacha yoyo mwaha uyo?”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Nkaphomolhani ilha inupa ya Nlhuku ilha, ni mii kinotheka tho wo mahuku mararu.”
Vavawo Ayahudi nkayeera, “Ilha inupa ya Nlhuku ilha, yaathekiye wo umalhaka iyaakha makhumi ncheshe ni sita, chani, inyuva nnottuna utheka chani wo mahuku mararu?”
Nansho inupa yaarerihelha awe Yesu yaari iruttu awe.
Paahi etu vaahihimushiye awe ukhuma nnookhwani, owiittucha awe ahoopuwelha wiira aholhohera yayo, nkayaarumelhelha Malhove Matakatifu, yaahimianche awe Yesu.
Yesu vaari awe Uyerusalemu wo isikuukuu yo Pasaka, attu enchi yahorumelhelha nchina nawe yooneke cho ushangiha cheera awe wo uhimiechesha.
Nansho Yesu khaari ni nrima ni ayo ukhalhawaya ahaachuwelhacha onkhaye.
Khaarina nlhatu wo uhimiechesha uriyoothe, ukhalhawaya ahochuwelha rata chene chittu chonkhaye chiri munrimani mwaya.
Ahaawo nholhelhi mmoka Ayahudi, o mphingo wa Amafarisayo, eehaniya Nanikodemo.

Nihuku nimoka Nanikodemo nkayaanrwelha Yesu uhiyu, ni umwiirelha, “Rabi, nihochuwelha wiira inyuva phi Owiittuchiha nrumiye ni Nlhuku. Khaawo ntu nooria upanga cho ushangiha chinopangacha inyu Nlhuku ahikhalheke vamoka ni uyo.”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, ntu khanooria woona Umwene wa Nlhuku ahiyarieke tho.”
Nanikodemo nkayaakoha, “Ntu nkumi noorieke chani ukelha munthunkwani mwa anumwanawe, ni uyariya wo nayelhi?”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, ntu ahiyarieke wo maashi ni wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku, ata veeriye chani khanooria ukelha Imwene ya Nlhuku.
Ntu noyaria wo iruttu wa athumwanawe ni anumwanawe, nansho noyaria munnepani wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku.
Nhishange ukhalhawaya kihouhimeriani wiira ihophwanelhiya mwaattiva onkhaye vaa uyaria wo nayelhi.
Iphioo inowuka ni ukelha unothanana aya, nnowiiwa vanowuka aya, nansho khannochuwelha unokhumelhelha aya mena unokelhelha aya. Phiri aya thoko ntu yarelhe wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku.”
Nanikodemo nkayankoha Yesu, “Yoyo mwaha uyo unoorieke chani?”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Chani, inyuva ngati phi owiittuchiha attu o Uisraeli nhichuwelhe yoyo mwaha uyo?
Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, hiyaano ninohimiacha ichuwenlhe ihu ni uhimiechesha yonne ihu, nansho mwaattiva khannorumelhelha nttenga wihu.
Akhalhaka kihouhimeriani mwaha wo velhaponi ni inyu khannokirumelhelha, nnorieke chani urumelhelha koohimeriakani mwaha wo wiirimu?
Khaawo ntu aapanche urwaa uchulhu wiirimu ahikhalhe Mwaana a Ntu, aakhuruwilhe ukhuma wiirimu.”
Thoko ashinna Musa vaatheshilhe aya nchulhu inwaa yo shaba vamwirini uthakoni ulhe, ni uyo Mwaana a Ntu nootheshiya nchulhu chiichammo,
wiira kila ntu nonrumelhelha akhalhe ni ukumi wo uhimalha.
Nlhuku ahaattuna attu o velhaponi chinene, wo chiichammo etu, nkankhumiha Mwaana awe o yekha, riyoothe nonrumelhelha hipotere, nansho akhalhe ni ukumi wo uhimalha.
Nlhuku khaanrumme Mwaana awe velhaponi awe aahukumulha attu, nansho oopolhe.
“Attu onkhaye anonrumelhelha Mwaana khanohukumulhiya, ahinonrumelhelha ahomalha uhukumulhiya, ukhalhawaya kharumelhenlhe nchina no Mwaana a Nlhuku o yekha awe.
Ni ihukumu ene phi ilha, nthuko uhowa velhaponi, nansho attu anothanana ipiphi ahittunaka nthuko, ukhalhawaya chittu chinopangacha aya chiri cho uhilhoka.
Attu anopanga cho uhilhoka unowarusha nthuko ni ayo khanowa voonene, ukhalhawaya khanottuniha cho uhilhoka chaya chimwalhelhiye.
Nansho anovarechesha ikeekhene anoowa unthukoni, mitheko chaya chiwe chooniya chipangiaka wo unthimicha Nlhuku.”
Yamalhekeru, Yesu nkarwaa ilhapo yo Uyudea vamoka ni owiittucha awe, nkakhalhana wowo vamoka, ni attu aawa nkaabatiiziya.
Nayohana chiicho aari aabatiizaka attu Uainoni, iwani yaatameria Usalimu, ukhalhawaya wowo ahokhalha maashi menchi. Attu nkayanrweelha, ni ayo nkaabatiizacha.
Yeyo ikatema iyo Nayohana aari ahinaya uttukiya.
Owiittucha akina a Nayohana nkayaakhulhana ni Nyahudi mmoka wo mwaha wo malhemalhelho o khucha ikatema yo unthimicha Nlhuku.

Paahi etu, owiittucha ayo nkayaarwelha Nayohana ni weerelha, “Owiittuchiha, nnomuupuwelha yolhe ntu arina inyu vamoka ukhopelhelhe wo mwoolhoko wo Uyorodani ni inyuva nkamwanhimiechesha ulhe? Vano ni uyo nobatiiza, ni attu onkhaye anonrweelha!”
Nayohana nkayaakhulha, “Ntu khanoria ukhalha ni ittu aahivahiyeke ni Nlhuku o wiirimu.
Ni inyu mwaashinene nnoworia uhimiechesha wiira kahohimia, ‘Miyaano kakihena Kuristo, nansho kirumiye wiira kinholhelhe!’

A bibi arusi phi awaya abwana arusi, nansho anlhoko aya abwana arusi, aneemelha ni wiiwelhelha, anoshangarara chinene vaneewa aya abwana arusi yuulhumachaka. Phi chiicho ni mii ushangarara waka vanotimirihiya aya.
Yoyo phi phwanenlhe athepe ukhalha ochuwania chinene, ni miyaano kiwukuwe.”
Nowa ukhuma uchulhu phi mulhupalhe waapwaha onkhaye. Nokhuma velhaponi phi o ilhapo, olhumachaka mwaha wo velhaponi, nansho nowa ukhuma wiirimu phi mulhupalhe waapwaha onkhaye.
Yoyo yonne awe ni wiiwa ayo, phi o uhimiechesha, nansho khaawo ntu nottuna nttenga awe.
Nansho ntu riyoothe nottuna nttenga awe nohimiechesha wiira Nlhuku phi nohimiechesha ikeekhene.
Ulhe rumiye ni Nlhuku nohimiacha malhove a Nlhuku, ukhalhawaya Nlhuku nommaha yoyo ntu uyo Iphumu ya Nlhuku wo uhikhalha maphimelho.
Athithi anonttuna Mwaana ni ummaha ikuru chonkhaye mmathathani mwawe.
Attu anonrumelhelha Mwaana ahanaa ukumi wo uhimalha, attu ahinomwiiwelhelha Mwaana khanokhalha ni ukumi wo uhimalha, nansho anohalha muurushiyani mwa Nlhuku.
Amafarisayo nkayeewa wiira Yesu nowaapatta owiittucha enchi ni wabatiiza waapwaha Nayohana.
Yesu mwanene khambatinze ntu, nansho owiittucha awe phi abatiiza attu.
Paahi etu Yesu veewilhe awe mwaha wolhumachiya, nkaathama Uyudea nkaahokolhia Ugalilaya.
Vaari awe munkwahani mmo, nkaavirelha iwani yo Usamariya.
Wowo Usamariya uwo nkaaphiya Usukari, iwani yaatamenrie imata i Nayakhobo yaavanhe aya anaya, Nayusufu.
Ilhushi i Nayakhobo yaari vavawo. Yeyo ikatema iyo yaari uthana variyari, ni Yesu aari noochelhe wo nkwaha, nkeettuwa vachereshere ilhushi.
Nthiyana mmoka Nsamariya nkaawa urikani maashi, Yesu nkaamwiirelha, “Nkivahe maashi kiwurie.”
Yeyo ikatema iyo, owiittucha awe yaari anakelhanche umawani uuthumani yolhia.

Nansho yoyo nthiyana uyo nkaamwiirelha Yesu, “Inyuva mwa Ayahudi, miyaano ki Nsamariya, nnooria chani ukivekelha mii maashi o wuria?” Olhumacha chiicho ukhalhawaya Ayahudi khayaari yaathanaka ni Asamariya.
Yesu nkaakhulha, ikaari nchuwelhaka izawadi ya Nlhuku inothanana awe uuvahani, ni unchuwelha mpani nowiirelhani, “ ‘Nkivahe maashi kiurie’ mwaanonvekelha ni uyo anouvahani maashi anowiiha ukumi.”
Yoyo nthiyana uyo nkeera, “Pwiiya, inyuva khanrina indowo yo urikelha maashi ni ilhushi ene inarekamme. Nnaapatteke vayi maashi ari ni ukumi?
Athumwanihu Nayakhobo ni achishaana aya ni mihuwo chaya yaawuriacha vava.” Chani etu woonaka nneepanga ukhalha olhupalhe waapwaha yayo Nayakhobo ayo?
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Onkhaye anowuria alha maashi alha anowolhiya nttona tho,

nansho ntu nohalha uwuria maashi anohalha aka ummaha mii, khanowolhiya nttona tho. Wo ikekhiaye, maashi anohalha aka ummaha, anowa ukhalha nrapo ninothekhuma maashi anowiiha ukumi. Ukumi wo mahuku o uhimalha.”
Yoyo nthiyana uyo nkeera, “Pwiiya, nkakivaheni yayo maashi ayo! Kihoone nttona tho, mena kihiwe tho uurikani maashi vaa.”
Yesu nkeera, “Nrwee mweehane owannyu mwaawane vaa.”
Nthiyana uyo nkaakhulha “Miyaano khakirina alhopwana,” Yesu nkeera, “Nhohimia ikekhiaye wiira khanrina alhopwana.
Ukhalhawaya mwahothelhiya ni manyaalhopwana athanu, ni ayo nnaakhalhana inyu vano ayo kahena owaninyu. Vavawo nhohimia ikekhiaye.”
Nthiyana uyo nkaamwiirelha Yesu, “Pwiiya, kinoona wiira inyuva phi anamilhohi.
Manyaapwiiya ihu yanthimicha Nlhuku vachulhu ulha mwaako ulha, nansho mwaattiva Ayahudi va nnoniirelha wiira nipuro no nthimicha Nlhuku phi Uyerusalemu ulhe.”
Yesu nkaamwiirelha, “Maanyi nkirumelhelheke etu, mahuku anowa vahinowa inyu waathimicha Athithi vachulhu ulha mwaako ulha, mena Uyerusalemu.
Mwaattiva Asamariya va nnonthimicha ulhe nhinonchuwelha inyu. Nansho hii Ayahudi va ninonchuwelha ninonthimicha ihu, ukhalhawaya woopolhiya unchokholhelha wa Ayahudi.
Nansho mahuku anoowa ni ayo ahomalha uphiya, wo ikuru yo Iphumu ya Nlhuku, attu anowa waathimicha Athithi wo ikeekhene, ni waathimicha wo iphiro ye ikeekhene inothanana aya.
Nlhuku phi Iphumu. Chiichammo etu, attu anonthimicha anthananiya anthimicheke wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku ni ikeekhene thoko chiri awe.”
Nthiyana uyo nkaahimia, “Kihochuwelha wiira Kuristo Moopolhi noowa. Vanohalha awe uwa, nonichuwelhiha chittu chonkhaye.”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Mii kinoolhumacha ni inyuva va, phi Yoyo.”

Yeyo ikatema iyo owiittucha awe Yesu nkayaahokolhiacha, nkayaashangacha chinene umwoona aarerihaka ni nthiyana. Nansho khaawo ntu ankonhe nthiyana ulhe, “Nnothananani?” Ama unkoha Yesu, “Nnaarerihani ni alha?”
Paahi etu nthiyana uyo nkaahiya mwaapu awe, nkaarwa umawani u waahimeriani attu,
“Nkawaani mmwe mwaamona ntu kihimenrie mwaha kipangilhe aka wonkhaye. Chani khinooria wiira yoyo phi Kuristo Moopolhi?”
Attu nkayaathamacha mmawani nkayaarwaa uumwonani Yesu.
Yeyo ikatema iyo owiittucha awe yaari ampepechaka amwirelhaka, “Owiittuchiha, nlhieke yolhia!”
Nansho Yesu nkeerelha, “Miyaano kihanaa yolhia nhinochuwelha inyu mwaattiva.”
Owiittucha awe nkayaakohanacha ashineneru, “Chani hawo ntu ammwinhenre yolhia?”
Yesu nkeerelhacha, “Yolhia yaangu iri phi uvara mitheko chaya alhe akirumme ni utimiriha chinothanana aya.
Mwaattiva nneera, ‘Chihohalha mieri micheshe, nlhaalha uphiye.’ Nansho miyaano kinouhimeriani wiira, mmweheke mmamatani chinre aya, cholhia chihaaya wo ukhunguriya!
Ntu o ukhungura noolhiviya mahalha awe, athokoreriaka cholhia wo nlhatu no ukumi wo mahuku o uhimalha. Chiichammo etu ntu naalha ni ntu nokhungura anowa aashangarara vamoka.
Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu nna nulhumo nna phi ikeekhene, ‘Mmoka phi naalha ni nkina nokhungura.’
Miyaano kuurummeni wiira mwakhungure cholhia mmamatani mwahaalhimme inyu, akina phi alhimme, nansho mwaattiva nnopuha wo ntukutta naya.”
Attu enchi o Usamariya yahonrumelhelha Yesu wo malhove aahimiechesha awe yoyo nthiyana uyo wiira, “Hokihimeria mwaha wonkhaye waapanga aka.”
Attu o Usamariya nkayanrwelha Yesu, nkayanlhepelha wiira akhalhe vavawo. Nkaalhokelha wowo wo mahuku melhi.
Attu enchi akina nkayaarumelhelha nttenga wa Yesu,
nkayerelha athiyana alhe wiira, “Vano hii ninorumelhelha kuhiwe wo nlhatu no malhove inyu. Nansho niheewa naashinene, ni uchuwelha wiira we ikeekhene yolha ntu ulha phi Moopolhi o ilhapo.”
Avireke mahuku melhi, Yesu nkaathama wowo, nkaarwa Ugalilaya.
Yesu aarwaa mwanene ukhalhawaya ahohimiechesha wiira, “Namilhohi khanothimichiya uwannyawe.”
Aphiyeke Ugalilaya, attu yahompochera, ukhalhawaya ni ayo yaari Uyerusalemu uwo unlhiani Pasaka. Nkayoona chittu chonkhaye chaapanganche awe ikatema yo Pasaka iyo.
Yesu nkaahokolhia tho Ukaana ilhapo yo Ugalilaya waathathunshe awe maashi ukhalha idivai. Wowo ahaawo nholhelhi mmoka upuwani u Naherode, aari ni mwaana mmirawo nreta iwani yo Ukapenaumu.
Yoyo veewilhe awe wiira Yesu howa Ugalilaya ukhuma Uyudea, nkanrwelha ni unlhepelha wiira anttukane Ukapernaumu anlhamihe mwaana awe mmirawo aari nreta chinene.
Yesu nkaamwirelha, “Khaawo ntu nohalha urumelhelha aahoneke ithikineha ni cho ushangiha.”
Yoyo nholhelhi uyo nkaakhulha, “Thithi, shontee, nngwee mwaana aka hinakhwa.”
Yesu nkaamwirelha, “Nrweeke etu, mwaana inyu noolhama!” Yoyo ntu uyo nkaarumelhelha malhove a Yesu nkaarwa.
Vaari awe mphironi ahokolhiaka uwani, akarumiya awe nkayaawa ni unhimeria wiira, “Mwammirawo inyu nreta uyo holhama!”
Nkaakoherera ikatema ureta vanhiilhe aya mwaana, ni ayo nkayaakhulha, “Nchana uthana, ureta phi nhiyalhe aya.”
Paahi etu athumwane mwaana ayo nkayoopuwelha wiira, yaari yelhe ikatema yaahimiye ni Yesu ilhe venre awe, “Mwaana inyu noolhama.” Vavawo etu yayo vamoka ni alhoko aya onkhaye, nkayanrumelhelha Yesu.
Ilha yaari yo ushangiha yo nayelhi yaapannge awe Yesu vaari awe akhumaka Uyudea alhukamaka Ugalilaya.
Umalha wo yayo, Yesu nkaarwa Uyerusalemu wo isikuukuu ya Ayahudi.
Wowo Uyerusalemu uwo vanaatameria nlhako uneehaniya Nlhako wo Khondoro nihawo nthapwi nineehaniya wo Iebraniya Betizata, nthotho mwaya nikhalhaka ni ipwaro nthanu.
Areta enchi yaari akhalhachaka mmapwaroni mmo, attu ohoona, oremara ni attu oririyacha iruttu.

Yayo areta ayo yaari awehereraka wiira nnepa wo wiirimu wa Athithi ukhuruwe uwa ututuwanyihani maashi. Nreta aaholhelha ukhelha munthapwini vanotutuwanyihiya aya maashi uyo, aholhama ikwerere iriyoothe yaarina awe.
Paahi ahaawo ntu mmoka vavawo awereiya ikwerere yo uririyacha iruttu iyaakha makhumi mararu ni nane.
Yesu ahomwoona yoyo ntu uyo narumpe vavawo, nkaachuwelha wiira hokhalha vavawo wo iyaakha chinchi, nkankoha, “Chani, nnoothanana ulhama?”
Nreta uyo nkaakhulha, “Thithi, khakirina ntu o ukitumbucheriha munthapwini vanotutuwanihiya aya maashi, kila vanolhikacha aka ukelha mmaashini, ntu nkina nookiholhelha.”
Yesu nkaamwiirelha ntu o uririyacha iruttu ulhe, “Wunkweke etu, ukusheke nttato nao nno weeteke, urweeke.”
Wo uhipicha yoyo ntu uyo nkaalhama, nkaakusha nttato nawe, nkeeta. Nihuku naapangelhe aya yoyo mwaha uyo, naari Nihuku no Wiittuwa,
wo chiichammo etu aholhelhi Ayahudi nkayaamwiirelha ntu aalhamihiye ulhe, “Lhelho Nihuku no Wiittuwa, Malhehero ihu anoochiichiha wiira khavanooria ukusha nttato ninyu.”
Ntu ulhe nkaakhulha eeraka, “Yoyo ntu kilhaminhe uyo phi kiirenlhe, ‘Ukusheke nttato nao, weeteke, urweeke.’ ”
Ni ayo nkayankoha, “Phi mpani o wirenlheni nkusheke ntatto ninyu mweeteke, nrweeke?”
Nansho aalhamihiye uyo khanchuwenlhe Yesu, ukhalhawaya wo nlhatu no uchara attu chinene, Yesu ahomalha ummwia nyerere.
Miholho aya, Yesu nkamphwanya ntu anlhaminhe awe u Inupa ya Nlhuku ulhe, nkeera, “Nholhama vano, nhiwonye tho, nhiwe mwaapatta yo hilhoka chinene.”
Yoyo ntu uyo nkaarwa wa aholhelhi a Ayahudi ni waahimeria wiira Yesu phi nlhaminhe.
Paahi etu Ayahudi nkayaachokholhacha umvenga Yesu, wo nlhatu no nlhamiha ntu Nihuku no Wiittuwa.
Yesu nkaakhulha eeraka, “Athumwanaka arii munthekoni, phi chiichammo ni mii kihophwanelhiya upanga mitheko.”

Nenno nlhove nno etu, nkanaathepiha aholhelhi a Ayahudi waavia iphiro yo mwiiva Yesu, kuhena wo nlhatu nohithimicha Malhehero yo Nihuku no Wiittuwa. Nansho ukhalhawaya aahowulhumacha wiira Nlhuku phi Athumwanawe, ni wilhikaaniha ni Nlhuku.
Yesu nkaakhulha Ayahudi eeraka, “Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, Mwaana khanooria upanga ittu mwanene, nopanga ilhe noona awe Athumwanawe apangaka. Inopanga aya Athumwanawe, Mwaana phi nopanga awe chiicho.
Ukhalhawaya Athithi anonttuna Mwaana, ni umwooniha chittu chonkhaye chinopanga aya anene, amwoonihaka chittu chulhupalhe upwaha chii cho nlhamiha ntu chii, ni inyu nnowa ushanga chinene.
Thoko Athithi chinaahihimusha aya attu akhwilhe ni waavaha ukumi, phi chiichammo etu Mwaana ni uyo nowaavaha ukumi anaattuna awe.
Athithi khanonhukumulha ntu riyoothe. Mwaana phi vahiye ikuru yonkhaye yo waahukumulha attu,
yiireke wiira attu onkhaye anthimicheke Mwaana thoko chinaathimicha aya Athithi. Ntu hinonthimicha Mwaana khanaathimicha Athithi anrumme.
“Ikekhiaye kinouhimeriani, aneewa malhove aka ni waarumelhelha akirumme, anoopatta ukumi wo uhimalha. Yayo khanohukumulhiya, nansho ahomalha uvira nnookhwani ni ukelha mu ukumini mwo uhimalha.
Ikekhiaye kinouhimeriani, mahuku anowa, ni ayo ahomalha uwa, akhwilhe vanowa aya wiiwacha nlhove na Mwaana a Nlhuku, ni ayo anottuna wiiwa ayo anokhalha akumi.
Thoko Athithi chiri aya machokholhelho o ukumi, phi chiichammo etu chinvahe aya Mwaana ukhalha machokholhelho o ukumi.
Tho ahommaha Mwaana ikuru yo uhukumulha, ukhalhawaya yoyo phi Mwaana a Ntu.
Nhuumiye uwanoni, mahuku anowa onkhaye ari mmahiyeni vanowa aya wiiwacha nlhove nawe
ni uhihimmwa mmahiyeni. Alhe apangilhe chorera anohihimmwa ni ukhalha akumi, ni alhe aapannge cho uhilhoka anowa uhihimmwa ni uhukumulhiya.

“Miyaano khakinooria upanga ittu wo ikuru aka kimwanene, Kinohukumulha thoko chineeraka wo uhimeriya ni Athithi, ni iyo ihukumu aka phi yo ikekhiaye, ukhalhawaya akinolhikacha upanga ittu kinothanana aka, nansho chinothanana aya akirumme.
“Keehimiecheshaka mii kimwanene, uhimiechesha waka khunooria urumelhelhiya wiira we ikeekhene.
Nansho hawo nkina nokihimiechesha mii, ni miyaano kihochuwelha wiira chonkhaye chinohimia awe akiromolhaka phi ikeekhene.
Mwahaaruma attu urweeha nttenga wo ukikoherera u Nayohana, ni ayo ahohimiechesha ikeekhene.
Uhimiechesha wa attu kuhii unokhulhuvelha aka, nansho kinohimiacha alha malhove alha wiira mwoopolhiye.
Nayohana yaari thoko nthuko waamwalhelha nkwee, ni inyu mwaatti wo mahuku vakani nkamwaattapelhelha yoyo nthuko uyo.

Nansho miyaano kihanaa malhove kinohimiechesha aka arii molhupalhe upwaha malhove a Nayohana. Ukhalhawaya mitheko kinopanga aka, phi mitheko akivanhe aya Athithi wiira kipange, ni chechiyo phi nokihimiechesha wiira Athithi phi kirumme.
Ni ayo Athithi akirumme, phi nokihimiechesha. Mwaattiva khannapacha wiiwa nlhove naya, mena woona ikhove aya,
ni inyu khannarumelhelha nlhove naya munrimani mwinyu, ukhalhawaya nhokhota unrumelhelha nrumme aya.
Mwaattiva nnooshoma Malhove Matakatifu mwaanyiheraka wiira mwommo, nnoophwanya ukumi wo uhimalha. Nansho yayo Malhove ayo phi nokihimiechesha mii!
Inakhalhaka chiicho, mpaka nna mwaattiva khannottuna uwa uwannyaka mmwe mwaapatta ukumi uhinomalha.
“Nnikwa aka khurii upatta nthimicho unokhuma wa attu.
Nansho kihoochuwelhani mwaatti wiira, unttuna Nlhuku khuuwo mu nrimani mwinyu.
Miyaano kiwiilhe wo ikuru ya Athithi, ni inyu khannakipochera, nansho attu akina yawaaka wo ikuru chaya ashinene, nnowaapochera.
Mwaattiva nnothanana upochera nthimicho winyu mwaashineneru, nhaaviaka upatta nthimicho ukhuma wa uyo ri vekha, Nlhuku, nnoorieke chani etu ukirumelhelha?
Nhaanyihere wiira miyaano phi nowa kaahimiacha milhatu chinyu wa Athithi. Ashinna Musa, mweshenre inyu nikhulhuvelho ninyu, yayo phi nowa uhimiachani milhatu chinyu.
Yakaari mwahaarumelhelha ashinna Musa, mwaanokirumelhelha ni mii, ukhalhawaya ashinna Musa yaholhepa malhove anokaacha mii.
“Nansho yakhalhaka wiira khamwaarumelhenlhe Malhehero yaalhepiye ni ashinna Musa, nnoorieke chani urumelhelha malhove aka?”
Umalhawaya, Yesu nkaalhapuwa nttiya no Ugalilaya ama nttiya no Utiberiya.
Nlhoko mulhupalhe wa attu nkawanttwara, nlhatu no woona cho ushangiha chaari awe apangaka ni waalhamiha areta.
Yesu nkaawelha umwaakoni, nkaakhalha vamoka ni owiittucha awe.
Isikuukuu ya Ayahudi yo Pasaka yaari inaatamenrie.
Yesu apathusheke miitho, nkoona nlhoko mulhupalhe wa attu ummweelhaka. Nkaakoha Nafilipo, “Ninaathumeke vayi yolhia yowaalhiha attu alha?”
Yesu olhumanche chiicho wo waalhikacha Nafilipo, ukhalhawaya ahochuwelha mwanene chowiira.
Nafilipo nkayaakhulha, “Ninathumaka mikatte cho idinari imia pilhi chirina ihu khachimmwanelha waalhiha inakhalhaka vakani alha attu enchi alha.”
Owiittucha awe mmoka, Naandorea, nhima aya Nasimoni Peturo, nkaamwiirelha,
“Hawo vaa mmirawo mmoka rina mikatte nthanu cho shayiri ni ihopa pilhi. Nansho khachinowanelha wa attu enchi thoko alha.”
Yesu nkeera, “Mwaakalhiheke etu attu ayo vathi.” Manyashi aari menchi vavawo vakittu vawo. Paahi etu attu nkayaakhalha vathi, alhopwana vekha aya aphiyelhaka attu maelufu nthanu.
Yesu nkaakusha mikatte chilhe, nkanthimicha Nlhuku, nkaakawelha attu yaakhalhanche. Ni ihopa chiyo nkeera chiicho, kila ntu nkaapatta chaathananne awe.
Attu vaawonne aya Yesu nkeerelha owiittucha awe, “Nrokottacheke mikatte chihanlhe chiyo chihipotere.”
Nkayaakhupacha mahalhahalha aahanlhe, nkayaachariha makaya khumi ni melhi.
Attu yooneke yeyo yo ushangiha yaapangilhe awe Yesu iyo, nkayeeracha, “Wo ikekhiaye yolha phi namilhohi aaphwanelhiye uwa velhaponi!”
Yesu nkaachuwelha wiira attu yaari athananaka ummara umwene, nkaathama tho, nkaarwa umwaakoni vekha awe.
Waphiyeke uchechilho owiittucha awe nkayaakhuruwa urwaa unttiyani,
nkayaawelhacha nkalhavani, alhapuwaka urwaa Ukapenaumu. Ipiphi yaari inakenlhe, ni Yesu aari hinaapiyelha.
Nttiya nkanaachokholha ututuwana nlhatu no iphioo yaawuka wo machiri.
Owiittucha vaaphilhe aya nkwaha wo maili nthanu ama sita, nkayaamoona Yesu eetaka vachulhu maashi, aatameriaka ikalhava, nkayoovacha chinene.
Yesu nkeerelha, “Phi mii, nhoovache!”
Nkayaathanana unkusha Yesu nkalhavani, ni ikalhava yaari inaphiilhe ukhopelhelhe nttiya waalhukama aya.

Waashelhe waya nlhoko wa attu yaahanlhe ukhopelhelhe nttiya nkawaachuwelha wiira ikalhava ikina yaahanlhe wowo. Ni ayo nkayoopuwelha wiira Yesu khaawenlhe nkalhavani vamoka ni owiittucha awe, owiittucha ayo yaarwachilhe vekha aya.
Tho, ikalhava chikina ukhuma Utiberiya chahowa vavawo vakittu vawo attu vaalhilhie aya mikatte, Athithi vaamanlhe aya unthimicha Nlhuku.
Attu ayo yachuwelheke wiira Yesu ni owiittucha awe khayariwo vavawo, nkayaawelhacha nkalhavani nkayaarwaa umwaaviani Ukapenaumu.
Nkayamphwanya Yesu ukhopelhelhe nttiya nkayankoha, “Owiittuchiha, mwaawiilhe yaakhani vaa?”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, khannokaavia wo nlhatu no woona yo ushangiha iyo, nansho ukhalhawaya mwaaholhia mikatte chilhe nkamwaawona.

Nhichenjeukelhe yolhia inochukumana, nchenjeukelheke yolhia ihinochukumana yo ukumi wo uhimalha. Yoyo phi Mwaana a Ntu, ukhalhawaya Athithi, Nlhuku ahonthanlha ni unhimiechesha wiira noowa uvahani yeyo yolhia iyo.”
Ni ayo nkayankohacha, “vano niireke chani etu, ni hii noorie upanga chinothanana awe Nlhuku?”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Ntheko unothanana awe Nlhuku wiira mpange, uri unrumelhelha ntu nrumilhe aya.”
Vavawo nkayankoha, “Unohalha upanga yo ushangiha yaani noone nuurumelhelhe? Unohalha upangani?
Ashulhupalhe ihu yaholhia yolhia yaakhumme wiirimu yeehaniya imana uuthakhoni ulhe, thoko Malhove Matakatifu vaneera aya wiira, ‘Ahaalhiha nkatte waakhumme wiirimu.’ ”
Yesu nkeera, “Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, ashinna Musa kahiwe ovanheni nkatte wo wiirimu, nansho Athumwanaka phi nouvahani mwaattiva nkatte we ikeekhene unokhuma wiirimu.
Ukhalhawaya nkatte wa Nlhuku nnovahiya inyu phi uyo nokhuruwa ukhuma wiirimu ni uwiiha ukumi wa attu o velhaponi.”
Paahi nkayaamwiirelha, “Thithi, nkanivaheni yoyo nkatte uyo mahuku onkhaye.”
Yesu nkeera, “Miyaano phi yolhia inouvahani ukumi. Nokiweelha khanowolhiya ithalha tho, nokirumelhelha khanowolhiya nttona tho.
Vano etu, kahouhimeriani wiira nnookona nansho khannokirumelhelha.
Ntu riyoothe anokivaha aya Athithi nookiweelha, ni mii khakinonkhota ntu nokiweelha,
ukhalhawaya khakiwiilhe ukhuma wiirimu kiwe kaapanga chinothanana aka mii, nansho chinothanana aya Athithi akirumme.
Ni iyo anothanana aya akirumme iri wiira, kihinrihe hata mmoka akivanhe aya, nansho kiwe kanhihimusha ni ummaha ukumi wo uhimalha nihuku no umalha ilhapo.
Ittu inothanana aya Athithi phi ilha, attu onkhaye anomwona Mwaana ni unrumelhelha, akhalhe ni ukumi wo uhimalha. Ni mii kinowaahihimusha nihuku no umalha ilhapo.”
Ayahudi nkayaarushiya, nlhatu Yesu aahowiira, “Miyaano phi nkatte ukhuruwilhe ukhuma wiirimu.”
Nkayeeracha, “Ana ulha ntu ulha kahiwe Yesu, mwaana a Nayusufu? Nihaachuwelha athumwanawe ni anumwanawe. Chani, vano, neera wiira khuruwilhe ukhuma wiirimu?”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Nkahiyani uchukulha mwaashineneru.
Khaawo ntu nowa uwannyaka aahiwihiyeke ni Athithi akirumme mii, ni mii kinonhihimusha nihuku no umalha ilhapo.
Anamilhohi aholhepa wiira, ‘Kila ntu nowiittuchihiya ni Nlhuku.’ Kila ntu neewelhelha Athithi, ni wiittucha uwannyaya yoyo nowa uwannyaka.
Kineera wiira, khaawo ntu riyoothe panche woona Athithi, yoyo khumme wa Nlhuku uyo vekha awe phi onne Athithi.
Kinouhimeriani ikekhiaye wiira, ntu norumelhelha, yoyo hanaa ukumi wo mahuku o uhimalha.
Mii phi nkatte ummwiha ukumi.
Manyaapwiiya inyu aholhia imana uthakoni, nansho yahokhwa.
Nansho nkatte unowa ukhuma wiirimu phi nolhikaana wiira ntu riyoothe nolhia khanokhwa.
Mii phi nkatte wo ukumi unowa ukhuma wiirimu. Ntu alhiaka yolha nkatte ulha yoyo khanokhwa, nookhalha nkumi mahuku o uhimalha. Ni uyo ukhalhaka iruttu aka, kinokumiha aka wiira ilhapo ihimalhe.”
Yoyo mwaha uyo nkawaawiha waakhulhaniya mwa Ayahudi ashineneru. Waari ukohaniyaka, “Noorieke chani ulha ntu ulha univaha iruttu awe nilhie?”
Yesu nkeerelha, “Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, mwaahilhieke iruttu ya Mwaana a Ntu ni uwuria iphome awe, khannopatta ukumi.
Onkhaye anolhia iruttu aka ni uwuria iphome aka ahana ukumi wo mahuku o uhimalha, ni mii kinowa kaahihimusha muukumini nihuku noomalha ilhapo.
Yakhalhaka wiira iruttu aka phi yolhia ye ikeekhene, ni iphome aka etu phi yo wuria ye ikeekhene.
Attu onkhaye anolhia iruttu aka ni uwuria iphome aka anookhalha nhina mwaka, ni mii kinookhalha nhina mwaya.
Athithi ari akumi ahokiruma mii, ni mii kinokhalha wo nlhatu waya. Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, ntu nokilhia mii noolhama wo nlhatu naka mii.
Vano etu, nkatte unkhuma wiirimu, khunolhikaana ni nkatte waalhilhie aya manyaapwiiya inyu uthakoni. Aholhia nkaakhwa, nansho anolhia ulha nkatte ulha khanokhwa anookhalha akumi mahuku no uhimalha.”
Yesu olhumanche yayo vaari awe eettuchihaka mu inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku Ukapenaumu.
Owiittucha awe enchi veewilhe aya nkayeera, “Alha meettuchiho alha arii orikarika chinene. Apani anohalha wiiwelhelha?”
Yesu nkaachuwelha ichuku cha owiittucha wo uhihimeriya ni ntu, paahi etu nkeera, “Chani nhokelhiya nipampa?
Inottuna ukhalha chani etu vanowa inyu umoona Mwaana a Ntu arwaaka nchulhu waari awe?
Nnepa wa Nlhuku phi nowiiha ukumi, ikuru cha ntu chihikhalhaka ittu. Malhove kuulhumachilhe aka phi nommwiiha Iphumu ya Nlhuku nowiiha ukumi.
Inakhalhaka chiicho ahawo akina inyu ahinokirumelhelha.” Yesu oolhumacha chiicho ukhalhawaya ahaachuwelha ahinonrumelhelha ni ntu nohalha unthumiha.
Nkoncherera eeraka, “Yolha phi nlhatu no uhimeriani wiira khaawo ntu nohalha uwa uwannyaka aahorihiyeke ni Athithi.”
Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, owiittucha enchi anttwarattwara Yesu, nkayaarukunuwa utulhi ni uhinttwara tho.
Paahi etu Yesu nkaakoha owiittucha awe khumi ni elhi alhe eeraka, “Ni inyu mwaatti, chani khannokittwara?”
Nasimoni Peturo nkayaakhulha, “Thithi, nirweeke wa apani tho? Inyuva phi ri ni malhove o univaha ukumi wo mahuku o uhimalha.
Ni hii vano nihorumelhelha ni uchuwelha wiira, inyu phi ntakatifu rumiye ni Nlhuku.”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Kahoothanlhani mwaatti khumi ni elhi, ngati? Nansho mmoka inyu, yoyo nakare!”
Vavawo aari amwaachaka Yuda, mwaana a Nasimoni Isikariote, ukhalhawaya Yuda phi akelha unthumiha, inakhalhaka aari mmoka aya owiittucha khumi ni elhi alhe.
Umalhawaya yayo, Yesu aari munkwahani alhukamaka Ugalilaya, khaathananne weetakacha ilhapo yo Uyudea ukhalhawaya aholhelhi Ayahudi yaari athananaka umwiiva.
Nihuku no Isikuukuu ya Ayahudi yo Marapatta naari ninaatamenrie,
Yesu nkeerelhiya ni ashihima awe wiira, “Nthameke vaa nrweeke Uyudea, owiittucha inyu yooneke mitheko chinyu.
Ntu khanovitha chinopanga awe akhalhaka wiira nothanana uchuwania mwaattuni. Ukhalhawaya nnopanga cho ushangiha, mpangeke etu ilhapo yonkhaye ichuwelheke!”
Ata ashihima awe khayanrumelhenlhe.
Yesu nkeera, “Ikatema aka kinaphiya. Nansho mwaattiva va kila ikatema inouphwanelhani.
Ilhapo khiinooria uuvengani mwaattiva, nansho miyaano inookivenga ukhalhawaya mii kinohimiechesha wiira mitheko chaya chiri cho uhilhoka.
Mwaattiva nrweeke etu u sikuukuuni uwo. Miyaano khakinorwaa, ukhalhawaya ikatema aka yo ulhoka khinaphiya.”
Nkoolhumacha yayo malhove ayo, nkaahalha Ugalilaya.
Ashihima awe yamalheke urwaa u sikuukuuni, Yesu ni uyo nkaarwa, nansho khaarweelhe wo wiichooniha, aarweelhe wo wiivitha.
Aholhelhi Ayahudi yaari amwaaviaka va sikuukuuni vawo, nkayaakoha, “Ri vayi?”
Malhove menchi o waapiya nkayeewiya mwaattuni. Attu akina nkayeera, “Ntu orera nrima.” Akina nkayeera, “Mena! Nowiiraka waathwelhelhiha attu.”
Nansho khaawo ntu aalhikanche wulhumacha mwaha wawe voonene wo woova aholhelhi Ayahudi.
Isikuukuu yaari inaphiyenlhe variyari, Yesu vaarwelhe awe u Inupa ya Nlhuku ni uchokholha weettuchiha attu.
Aholhelhi Ayahudi nkayaashanga chinene ni wiira, “Ulha ntu ulha pantte vayi irusho ni uyo khanashoma?”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Meettuchiho kineettuchiha aka kahiwe awaka, nansho awawe Nlhuku kirumme.
Ntu nopanga chinothanana awe Nlhuku, noochuwelha wiira meettuchiho aka akhumme wa Nlhuku, ama miyaano kinoolhumacha wo ikuru aka kimwanene.
Ntu noolhumacha wo ikuru awe mwanene naavia nthimicho wawe mwanene. Nansho naavia nthimicho wa ntu nrumme, yoyo ri o ikekhiaye, hinanaraka variwoothe.
