Ukhalhawaya attu anrupa, anrupa uhiyu ni attu o uhapalhiya anohapalhiya uhiyu.

Nansho hii nirii attu o uthana va niitawareke naashinene. Niwarelheke nrima ni uttunana thoko niwanre mwiinjiro wo yuuma wo wiichaakiha vakhakaachani. Nikhulhuvelho nihu no noopo nikhalheke thoko phi ikofiya yo yuuma yo wiichakiha miuru chihu.
Ukhalhawaya Nlhuku khaanithanlhe wiira nitwaruwe muurushiyani mwawe nansho niwe nampatta noopo wo iphiro ya Athithi Yesu Kuristo,
anikhwenlhe wiira naakhalhane ninari akumi ama ninakhwiilhe nihuku naya no uwa tho nno.
Paahi etu nvahaneke nrima ni uthekana mwaashineneru thoko chinopanga inyu vano.
Ashilhoko ihu, ninoushontelhani wiira, mwaalhoheke anamitheko anvara ntheko munlhokoni mwinyu, anooholhelhani ni uwiittuchihani meetelho inyu mulhutaanani ni Athithi.
Mwaalhoheke ni waattuna wo nlhatu wo mitheko chaya. Nkhalheke wo mpuha ni attu akina.
Ashilhoko ihu, ninoukurumichani wiira mwaamukeke attu o ureshi, mwaahelheke nrima attu anthemwa munrimani, mwaakaviheke attu ahineechoria ni waavilhelha attu onkhaye.
Mwiishungeke, ntu riyoothe hinhokolhoshere chittu cho uhilhoka ntu upangenlheni cho uhilhoka. Nansho kila nihuku mpangelhaneke chittu choombone mwaashineneru ni wa attu onkhaye.
Nteelhiyeke mirima ikatema chonkhaye,
munlhapelheke Nlhuku kila ikatema wo uhoochaa,
munshukuruku wo kila ittu. Chechiyo Nlhuku phi nothanana awe muukumini mwinyu wo ulhutaana ni Kuristo Yesu.
Nhichiichihe ntheko wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku,
nhiheulhe nttenga unkhuma wa Nlhuku,
nansho mphimeke kila ittu. Nchuwelheke ittu irii yoombone,
nshembaka kila mwaha wo uhilhoka.

Nlhuku mwanene nonivaha mpuha ohapihekeni wo kila iphiro ni wiinanelha minepa chinyu ni mirima ni iruttu chinyu mu uwonyani mwonkhaye. Nhiwe mwaakhalha attu o ukhuwachiya nihuku no uwa waya Athithi Yesu Kuristo.
Yoyo nowiihanani mwaatti uyo noupangelhani, ukhalhawaya phi o ukhulhuvelhiya.
Ashilhoko ihu, nnilhapelheke ni hii wa Nlhuku.
Mwaavaheke isalamu ashilhoko ihu attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo onkhaye wo nrima wo uttunana.
Kinoulheherani wo nchina na Athithi wiira mwaashomelheke ashilhoko ihu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo onkhaye ilha iwarakha ilha.
Nnema wa Athithi Yesu Kuristo ukhalhe vamoka ni inyu mwaatti.
Mii Paolo vamoka ni Nasila ni Natimotheo, ninoolhepa iwarakha wa nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo o Uthesalonike arii attu a Nlhuku Athumwanihu ni a Athithi Yesu Kuristo.
Ninoulhapelhelhani nnema ni mpuha ukhuma wa Nlhuku Athumwanihu ni Athithi Yesu Kuristo.
Ashilhoko ihu, ninonshukuru Nlhuku ikatema chonkhaye wo nlhatu winyu. Iri yo ulhoka hii wiira chiicho ukhalhawaya nrima inyu unoothepa ukhomaalha chinene ni uttunana winyu unowunchereria chinene.
Ata hii vano ninowiititihacha mmilhokoni mwa attu a Nlhuku anrumelhenlhe Kuristo wo nlhatu winyu mwaatti, chinothepa inyu urumelhelha ni uvilhelha uhuva ni uttwaruwa wonkhaye unopatta inyu.
Chechiyo chonkhaye chiyo phi nohimiechesha wiira uhukumulha wa Nlhuku uri we ikekhiaye ni wiira mmiholho mwaya nnoowa mwaaphwanelhiya ukelha mu Imwene aya unohuvelha inyu.
Nlhuku rii e ikekhiaye, noowa aatwarusha attu anoutwarushani mwaatti,
ni uvahani nipesha no wiittuwa mwaatti nnohuvihiya va. Ni hii ninoopangelhiya chiicho, Athithi Yesu vanohalha aya uwa ukhuma wiirimu vamoka ni minepa aya o wiirimu o machiri.
Vanowa aya anoowa waahukumulha ni nlhimi no mooro attu onkhaye anonkhota Nlhuku ni attu ahinrumelhelha Malhove Orera a Athithi Yesu.
Ulhakalhihiya waya unowa ukhalha wo mahuku o uhimalha, atiyelhelhiyaka wohoona Athithi wiitho ni uhoona nthimicho waya mulhupalhe.
Vanowa aya upochera nthimicho ukhuma wa attu aya ni nthimicho ukhuma wa attu anrumelhelha onkhaye, ni inyu chiicho nnowa ukhalha amoka aya, ukhalhawaya nhorumelhelha uhimiechesha wihu.

Paahi etu ikatema chonkhaye ninoulhapelhelhani Nlhuku owooriheni uphwanelhiya ukhalha makhalhelho mwiihaniye inyu. Ninonlhapelha Nlhuku wo ikuru awe, atimirihe nnikwa inyu wo upanga chittu choombone ni umalhiha ntheko inyu wo upisha nrima.
Ninolhapelha wiira nchina na Athithi Yesu nithimichiye munlhokoni mwinyu ni inyu mpochere nthimicho ukhuma uwannyaya, wo nnema wa Nlhuku ni wa Athithi Yesu Kuristo.
Paahi vano ashilhoko ihu ulha phi mwaha unaacha uwa wa Athithi Yesu Kuristo irii uthukumaanihiya wihu vamoka. Mwaatti ninoushontelhelhani chinene,

wiira nhikelhiye nipampa chitemachitema mena nkamwaahiya nrima inyu, mena nhithuthushiye wo nnepa, mena wo nlhove, mena wo iwarakha inaanyiheriya ukhalha yawihu, thoko valhe nihuku ni Athithi nihaaya.

Ntu riyoothe huuthepiacheni ittu iriyoothe, ukhalhawaya nenno nihuku nno khaninowa mpaka uweeke Uhiiwananiya wulhupalhe wo unvinga Nlhuku ni O uhilhoka ulhe oonie kaye, nohalha umalhelha wo utanganyiya lhakalhaka.

Yoyo noowa aavinga kila ittu attu anaalhakelha aya ni wiihana milhuku ama anothimicha aya. Noowa wiichiinulha mwanene vachulhu kila ittu ata noowa aakelha ni ukhalha wi Inupa ya Nlhuku ni wiichihana Nlhuku.
Chani khannoopuwelha wiira kahouhimeriani mwaatti yayo malhove onkhaye ayo vaari aka ni inyu?
Nansho nhochuwelha ittu inonchiichiha vano iyo. Ikatema yaayakaru, yoyo ntu o uwonya uyo noowa oonia.
Ukhalhawaya machiri evinthe o yoyo O uhilhoka uyo ari munthekoni. Nansho khanoonia mpaka nonchiichiha uyo vanohalha awe uthamihiya.
Vavawo Yoyo o uwonya uyo phi nohalha awe upatakulhiya. Nansho Athithi Yesu vanowa aya, anowa aamwiiva wo Iphumu yo iyano aya ni umwiiva ni nchakarimia no uwa waya.
Yoyo O uwonya uyo noowa aawa ni machiri a Nakare ni upanga cho ushangiha ni ithikineha cho woothacha cho kila iphiro,
ni waathepiacha wo iphiro chinchi ampotera ayo, wo nlhatu wo ukhota urumelhelha ni uhittuna ikeekhene wiira oopolhiye akhalhe o ulhoka.
Nlhuku heesha yayo wuuthi machiri o muupoterani, arumelhelhe wiira athepiachiye.
Paahi attu onkhaye ahinorumelhelha ikeekhene, attapelhelhaka mwaha wo chittu cho unanara, anoowa yaahukumulhiya.

Nansho vano hii ninshukuruku Nlhuku ikatema chonkhaye wo nlhatu winyu ashilhoko ihu nnottuniya ni Athithi. Ukhalhawaya toka varachi Nlhuku ahothanlhani wiira mwoopolhiye nkhalhe atakatifu wo machiri o Iphumu awe ni wo upishera nrima ikeekhene.
Nlhuku howiihanani mwaattiva wo Malhove Orera nihimianche ihu uwaninyu wiira mpatte vakittu munthimichoni mwa Athithi Yesu Kuristo.
Paahi etu, ashilhoko ihu mweemelheke rata, nhitikhinyiye, nvarechesheke meettuchiho mwiittuchihiye inyu ikhalhe wo malhove ama wo iwarakha chihu.
Ninowaalhapelha Athithi Yesu Kuristo anene ni Nlhuku Athumwanihu anittunne ni wo nnema waya ahonivaha mpuha wo mahuku o uhimalha ni nikhulhuvelho no ikeekhene,
ohelhekeni nrima ni ulhipihani ikatema chonkhaye wo machiri o upanga mitheko ni wulhumacha chittu choombone.
Ashilhoko ihu, vanomalhiha ihu, nnilhapelhelheke, wiira nttenga wa Athithi uthepeke uwanelha chitema ni uthimichiya thoko chiri aya uwaninyu.
Tho munlhapelheke Nlhuku wiira anoopolhe mwa attu o uhilhoka apotenre, ukhalhawaya kahii attu onkhaye anorumelhelha ulha nttenga ulha.
Nansho Athithi arii o ukhulhuvelhiya. anoulhipihani ni uwiinkelhani nhivariye ni O uhilhoka ulhe.
Ni hii ninaakhulhuvelha Athithi wo nlhatu winyu mwaatti, nichuwelhaka chiicho wiira, nnoothepa upanga ittu ilhenhe ihu ilhe.
Athithi aholhelheke mirima chinyu uuchuwelhani uttuna wa Nlhuku ni nrima wo uvilhelha ninovahiya ihu ni Kuristo.
Ashilhoko ihu, ninoulheherani wo nchina ni Athithi Yesu Kuristo wiira mwaashembeke ashilhoko inyu onkhaye o uhuva ni ahinotwara malhehero nilhehenre ihu.
Inyu mwaatti mwaashinene nhochuwelha rata iphiro inothananiya inyu unittwariha chipangilhe ihu. Ukhalhawaya vaari ihu uwaninyu, khanaakhanlhe wo ureshi,
mena khanaalhilhie ittu ya ntu riyoothe wo uhinlhiva. Nansho, uthana ni uhiyu nihuvaka nahovara ntheko wo uhoochaa wiira nihinrie nsigo ntu riyoothe.
Naapannge chiicho kuhii wiira khaniphwanelhiye uvahiya chittu ni inyu mwaatti, nansho naathanana uwiittuchihani wiira nnittwarihe.
Ukhalhawaya ata vaari ihu uwaninyu naari nilheheraka wiira, “Ntu riyoothe hinottuna uvara ntheko hilhie.”
Nineera chiicho ukhalhawaya niheewa wiira munlhokoni mwinyu ahaawo areeshi ahinottuna uvara ntheko uriyoothe, nansho athemwaka uhimiacha chittu cha attu akina.
Paahi etu wo nchina ni Athithi Yesu Kuristo ninowaalhehera ni uwaamuka yayo attu ayo wiira eetimarikheke, avareke ntheko ni upatta ittu yo waalhamiha.
Ni inyu mwaatti chiicho, ashilhoko ihu, nhoochee upanga moombone.
Ni vavawo yakhalhaka wowo haawo ntu hinorumelhelha nlhove no ilha iwarakha ilha, munhimiacheke vaattuni yoyo ntu uyo, mena nhivaraanane, olhiye muru.
Nansho nhimwaalhakelhe thoko mmalhaponi nansho mmwaamukeke mmwoonaka ukhalha nlhoko inyu.
Nlhuku mwanene nowiiha mpuha, ovaherekeni mpuha ikatema chonkhaye wo kila iphiro. Athithi akhalhe ni inyu mwaatti onkhaye.
Mii Paolo, kinouvahani isalamu chinolhepa aka wo moono aka kimwanene. Nenno phi nthonyero kinolhepa aka kila iwarakha. Chiichammo phi neera aka wo ulhepa.
Nnema wa Athithi Yesu Kuristo ukhalhe vamoka ni inyu mwaatti onkhaye.
Mii Paolo, karumiya a Kuristo Yesu wo ulheheriya ni Nlhuku Moopolhi ihu ni Kuristo Yesu nikhulhuvelho nihu.
Kinoolhepa iwarakha iwe uwaninyu Natimotheo anaaka e ikeekhene o munrimani. Kinoulhapelhelhani nnema, ikiriri, ni mpuha ukhuma wa Nlhuku Athumwanihu ni Kuristo Yesu Athithi.
Thoko chenre aka wo ulheherani vaarwaa aka Umakedoniya, mwakhalheke iwani yo Uefeso, mwaachiichihe attu aneettuchiha meettuchiho o woothachiya,
wiira ahiye chechiyo ithelhi chiyo ni uthanana uchuwelha mwaha wo uhimalha wo iyari cha manyaapwiiya chinowiiha mwaha wo uhiiwanana, mena ahivaraka ntheko wa Nlhuku thoko unochuwaniaa wo nrima.
Kinoulheherani chiicho ukurumicha mwaha wo uttunana unkhuma munrimani muteenlhee, nrima wo uthanana upanga chittu chorera ni nrima wo uhikhalha ni unafiki.
Attu akina ahohiya upanga yayo ni urukunuwelha miaha cho uhikhalha ni maana.
Anothananacha ukhalha o wiittuchiha Malhehero a Nlhuku nansho ahichuwelhaka ittu inoolhumacha aya ama inomindelha aya.
Nihochuwelha wiira, Malhehero a Nlhuku ari orera atwariyaka thoko chinothananiya aya.

Nansho nuupuwelheke wiira Malhehero a Nlhuku kheeshiye wo nlhatu ni attu orera nrima, nansho wa attu ahinvara ikekhiaye ni attu o uhilhoka ni attu ahinchuwenlhe Nlhuku ni attu o uwonya ni wa attu anopanga chittu cho unyalha ni attu ahinonthimicha Nlhuku ni attu aneevakacha manyanaangoro aya ni attu o niiviho.

Tho, Malhehero eeshiye wa attu o ulhavalhava ni wa attu o ishembwere yo uthelhana ni ashilhopwana nanaya ni attu anaathumiha attu nanaya ni attu o woothacha ni attu anolhupelha wo woothacha ni attu anovara meettuchiho ahirii e ikekhiaye.
Thoko chihimiye aya nhina Malhove Orera a Nlhuku nototopelhiye arumelhelhiye wiira kivahiye mii kihimiache waattuni.
Kinowaashukuru Athithi Kuristo Yesu akivanhe machiri munthekoni mwaka wo ukoona mii wiira kirii o ukhulhuvelhiya, nkayakithanlha wiira kaakavihe.
Inakhalhaka katashi vawo kahaaruwana ni waatwarusha ni kaari ntu o uhilhokalhoka. Nansho Nlhuku ahokoonelha ikiriri ukhalhawaya kaari kihinaya upisha nrima, kihichuwelhaka ittu kaapanga aka.
Nansho Athithi ahokivaha nnema waya mwinchi nkaakihelha nrima wo waarumelhelha ni uttuna urii wawihu muulhutaanani ni Kuristo Yesu.
Nna phi nulhumo no ukhulhuvelhiya, tho nikhalhaka no uverecheshiya chinene. Kuristo Yesu aawilhe velhaponi wiira oopolhe attu o uwonya ni mii kihoolhaka waapwaha akina onkhaye ayo,

nansho wo yoyo nlhatu uyo Nlhuku ahokoonelha ikiriri, wiira Kuristo Yesu akoonihe uvilhelha wawe wonkhaye mii ntu o uwonya chinene. Kikhalhe phi o utwarihiya ni attu onkhaye anohalha unrumelhelha apochere ukumi wo uhimalha.
Wo ayo arii Amwene o mahuku o uhimalha, ahinokhwa, ahinoonia arii Nlhuku o vekha aya ayo, nthimicho ukhalheke uwannyaya, mahuku o uhimalha ni uhimalha! Aye.

Anaaka Natimotheo, kinoulheherani alha malhove alha wo ulhikaana ni malhove a anamilhohi aahimiye khalhayi veehaniye inyu, wiira akhalhe ikerero inyu yo waatakanelha rata ikhoto yo winkelha Malhove Orera,
ni uvarelha nrima winyu wo nnikwa woombone. Attu akina khayaavarenlhe minikwa chaya, paahi etu aheeva nrima aya.
Akina aya phi Nahumenayo ni Naalekizanda, attu kinvanhe aka Nakare aatwarushe, ikhalhe phi iphiro yo weettuchiha ahinruwane Nlhuku.
Paahi etu, chihinaaya uchokholha chittu chikina, kinothanana wiira unlhepelha Nlhuku ni ulhapelha ni waalhapelha attu akina ni unshukuru Nlhuku chihimiyeke wo nlhatu na attu onkhaye.
Mwaalhapelheke mamwene ni attu avarenlhe ikuru wiira nikhalheke rata ni mpuha ni umwoova Nlhuku ni ukhalha makhalhelho ateelhihiye.
Ulha phi mwaha woombone unonteelhiha Nlhuku Moopolhi ihu,
nothanana attu onkhaye oopolhiye achuwelhe ikeekhene.
Ukhalhawaya Nlhuku rii mmoka ni tho haawo mmoka neewananiha attu ni Nlhuku, yoyo ntu uyo phi Kuristo Yesu,
ekuminhe mwanene wiira oopolhe attu onkhaye. Wowo phi waari uhimiechesha ikatema yaathananiya vaatiminre aya wiira Nlhuku nothanana wookholha attu onkhaye.
Ni mii wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu kihothanlhiya ukhalha karumiya keettuchihe attu ahiri Ayahudi, kihimiache nttenga wo upisha nrima ni ikeekhene. Kinoolhumacha ikeekhene, mena akinoothacha!
Paahi etu, kila vanokumaana inyu unlhapelha Nlhuku, kinothanana attu onkhaye atheesheke miono chiri chitakatifu ni ulhapelha wo uhithunalha mena wo uhitukutuwacha.

Vavawo tho, kinothanana manyopani amaalheke ni wiitimarikha ni uweha ikuwo chinowara aya, awarelheke rata kuhii wo utiva ikharari uhinophwanelha mena wiipamba wo chittu cho idhahabu ama ilulu ama ikuwo cho nhakhu mwinchi,
nansho awarelheke wo mitheko choombone thoko chilheheriye aya uwarelha manyopani anomwoova Nlhuku.
Manyopani amaalheke ni wiitimarikha vaneettuchihiya aya.
Mii akinaahiyera manyopani weettuchiha manyaalhopwana ama waatawara, amaalheke.
Ukhalhawaya Adamu phi achokhonlhe wuupiya, Ahawa nkaatwara.
Mena Adamu khayaathepiachiye nansho opani phi athepiachiye, nkaawonya Malhehero a Nlhuku.
Inakhalhaka chiicho etu, opani anowoopolhiya ukumi aya wo waayara ashaana, alhokelhaka ni upisha nrima, uttunana, utakatifu ni nrima woombone.
Nna nulhumo nna phi no ukhulhuvelhiya, ntu nothanana ushunga nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo yoyo hothanana ntheko woombone.

Paahi etu, ntu noshunga nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo akhalheke ntu o uhilhaphachiya, nlhopwana ri ni opani amoka, ntu o wiitawara, ntu o wiitimarikha, ntu o meetelho oombone, ntu naapochera attu, nooria weettuchiha attu,
ntu o uhihapalhiya ama ntu o mahuchuru nansho o ntu o ikiriri, naathana mpuha, hirii ntu o uttuna nchurukhu chinene.
Ntu noshunga inupa awe rata ni waalhelha achishaana awe ukhalha attu o umanya.
Ukhalhawaya ntu aahorieke weemelhelha inupa awe rata, nohalha wooria chani ushunga nlhoko wa attu a Nlhuku?
Ntu rumelhenlhe katashi hipangiye ukhalha nholhelhi, hiwe eefuna ni uhukumulhiya thoko chenre awe Nakare.
Tho, ahimiecheshiyeke ukhalha ntu o meetelho oombone mwa attu ahinatwara nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Nlhuku, hiwe aalhaphachiya nkaawaya nriankho wa Nakare.
Akavihi o ntheko wo ukavihera nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo akhalheke attu o meetelho oombone, aneemelhelha nulhumo naya, ahinohapalhiya utheka ama o nikakata no uttuna nchurukhu chinene,
anvarechesha ikeekhene yo nrima worera ipatakulhiye.
Yayo aphimiyeke thoko, ooniyaka wiira kharina nlhatu wo ukhuwachiya, paahi etu, avareke ntheko wo ukaviha nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo uyo.
Thothoni tho, manyaahanu aya akhalheke attu o meetelho ombone, ahinaapa akhunanaya, o wiitawara ni o ukhulhuvelhiya wo chittu chonkhaye.
Namitheko okaviha nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo nothananiya akhalheke nlhopwana o opani amoka nooria weemelhelha rata inupa awe ni waalhelha rata achishaana awe.
Ukhalhawaya akavihi anovara ntheko rata anoothimichiya rata, ni ayo anowooria uhimiacha wo uhoova mwaha unaacha nrima urina aya muulhutaanani ni Kuristo Yesu.
Kinolhepa ilha iwarakha ilha uwaninyu kikhulhuvelhaka uwa uwoonani phiyaru.

Nansho kacherewihiyaka, paahi etu ilha iwarakha ilha, inouhimeriani meetelho ninothananiya ihu ukhalhana attu o iwani ya Nlhuku, irii nlhoko wa attu anonrumelhelha Nlhuku rii nkumi, rii phi nipoto ni nsingi we ikeekhene.

Khaniwo nipampa vachulhu mwaha uvithiye unaacha meetelho ihu o munrimani, Ahoonia wo iruttu yo munttuni, Ahohimiecheshiya ni Iphumu wiira ri o uvarechesha ikekhiaye Ahoonia ni minepa o wiirimu. Ahohimiachiya mwaattuni, Ahorumelhelhiya ni attu onkhaye o velhaponi, Ahokushiya uchulhu unthimichoni.
Iphumu ya Nlhuku nohimia mwaari wiira mahuku anowa attu akina anowa uhiya nrima aya, anoowa aatwara minepa cho woothacha ni uttwara meettuchiho o mashoka o unanara.
Meettuchiho thoko yayo anowanelhihiya ni anafiki, mirima chaya cho uchuwelha moombone ama chittu cho uhilhoka chuumaka thoko chipahiye ni iyuuma yo mooro.
Yayo attu ayo anowaachiichiha attu ahiveke ama ahilhie cholhia chuupilhe awe Nlhuku wiira chipocheriye wo ushukuru ni attu o nrima anochuwelha ikeekhene.
Kila ittu yuupilhe awe Nlhuku irii yorera, khiiwo yo ukhotiya nansho kila ittu ipocheriyeke wo ushukuru,
ukhalhawaya nlhove na Nlhuku ni ulhapelha phi nopanga yeyo phi nohapiha ittu iyo ipocheriye mmiholho wa Nlhuku.

Mwaahimeriaka ashilhoko ihu alha malhehero alha, nnookhalha karumiya o ukhulhuvelhiya a Kuristo Yesu, mwiilchunnuwihaka mwaanene wo malhove o munnepani o nrima ni meettuchiho o ikeekhene nnotwara inyu mwaanene.
Nansho nhiyeke wiiwelhelha ithelhi cho irusho chihiri cho munnepani chihiri ni maana. Mweettuchiheke attu ukhalha thoko chinothanana awe Nlhuku.
Wiichookolha iruttu unoolhoka nansho makhalhelho anonteelhiha Nlhuku ukhalhawaya ahonilheha upatta ukumi wo vano ni uyo unowa.
Nenno phi nulhumo ne ikekhiaye chinene ni noolhoka chinene. Ukhalhawaya anonikhulhuvelhiha ikekhiaye imphwanelhiya upocheriya.
Hii nirii muuvarani ntheko wo machiri ukhalhawaya niheesha nikhulhuvelho nihu wa Nlhuku rii nkumi rii Moopolhi a attu onkhaye, athepaka ayo anonrumelhelha Kuristo ayo.
Yayo phi malhehero anothananiya inyu weettuchiha ni waakurumicha wiira apangeke chiicho.

Ntu riyoothe huuvehacheni wo nlhatu no ukhalha winyu amirawo. Nansho nkhalheke ntu o utwariya ni attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo wo moolhumo inyu ni meetelho inyu ni uttuna winyu ni nrima winyu ni makhalhelho orera anokhalha inyu.
Nlhokelheke nshomaka ni uhimiacha ni weettuchiha attu Malhove Matakatifu mpaka vanohalha aka uwa.
Nhihiye wooniha mahalha o Iphumu ya Nlhuku nrina inyu, mwaavahiye inyu wo malhove a anamilhohi ni wo weesheriya miono ni ashulhupalhe.
Muupuwelheke rata chonkhaye chiyo ni upanga, wiira attu onkhaye ooneke meetelho inyu orera chineera aya wo uthepa.
Mwiishungeke rata ni uweha chineera inyu wo weettuchiha attu. Nthepeke chiichammo ukhalhawaya mwapangaka chiicho, nnowiichoopolha mwaanene ni ayo anowiiwani ayo.
Nhaachacherache ashulhupalhe, nansho mwaalhoheke thoko chineera inyu wo waalhoha athumwaninyu. Mwaalhoheke ashimirawo thoko chinaalhoha inyu achihima inyu,
mwaalhoheke manyopani olhupalhe thoko chinaalhoha inyu anumwaninyu ni imialhi thoko ashirokorinyu, wo haamirelha ishenye, wo ukhalha makhalhelho orera.
Mwaalhoheke manyanankhwelhi o ikeekhene.
Nansho manyanankhwelhi ari ni iyari, ashaana ama uchuulhu, apangeke thoko Nlhuku chinothanana awe. Yeyo inokhalha phi iphiro yo waalhiva manyanaangoro ni manyaapwiiya aya inonteelhiha Nlhuku.
Anankhwelhi o ikeekhene, ahiri ni ntu o waalhelha, yayo anonkhulhuvelha Nlhuku anlhapelhaka uhiyu ni uthana wiira oopuwelhiye.
Nansho anankhwelhi anokhalha wo wiipuha, yayo anokhalha thoko ahokhwa, inakhalhaka akumi.
Mwaalhehereke attu wiira apangeke yayo, ahiwe aalhaphachiya.
Yakhalhaka ntu khanaalhoha amuchi awe, athepaka attu o uwannyawe, yoyo horuna nrima awe, ni unanara umpwaha ntu hinapisha nrima wo urumelhelha.
Nhaalhakelhe machina a anankhwelhi ariyoothe yaahikhalhe aphiyenlhe malhipa o iyaakha makhumi sita. Tho yaari opani o nlhopwana mmoka,

ni ayo ahimiecheshiye ukhalha o rera nrima, aalhenlhe achishaana aya rata, aapochenre alheto unupani waya, aavanhe maashi o ukhucha attu a Nlhuku, aakavinhe attu aahuva ni ekuminhe upanga chittu choombone.
Nhaalhakelhe machina a anankhwelhi imialhi, ukhalhawaya iruttu chaya chakelhiyaka ikhwilhu, anoothanana uthelhiya tho nkayanhiya Kuristo,
nkayeehukumulha ukhalhawaya ahohiya nrima waarumelhelha aya katashi vawo.

Anankhwelhi thoko yayo phi nochokholha weetakacha wo uhikhalha ni maana mmanupani. Wo uthepa anowiittucha waapa attu ni wiihelhahelha nkittu nhiri mwawaya, olhumachaka chittu chihaathananiya aya wulhumacha.
Paahi etu, kinoona wiira, manyanankhwelhi imialhi ahiiyeke athelhiyeke, aayareke ashaana ni ulhelha inupa chaya, ahiwe aavaha amalhaponi ihu nipesha no unulhumelha chittu cho uhilhoka.
Ukhalhawaya anankhwelhi akina ahomalha uwonya ni unttwara Nakare.

Nansho yakhalhaka opani anrumelhenlhe Kuristo ahaana alhoko aya arii anankhwelhi o ikekhiaye, yayo phi nophwanelhiya waalhelha, mena kuhiwe uhiya ntheko upangiye ni nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo, ikhalhe wiira nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo apangeke ntheko wo waalhelha manyanankhwelhi ahiri ni ittu menamena.
Ashulhupalhe anaaholhelha rata nlhoko wa attu anonrumelhelha Kuristo ahophwanelhiya uvahiya mahalha velhi, athepaka ayo amminda uhimiacha ni weettuchiha attu.
Ukhalhawaya Malhove Matakatifu aneera, “Nhinttuke mwannama uwano vanolhimihiya awe.” Ni chiichammo etu “Anamitheko ahophwanelhiya malhivo.”
Nhipochere milhatu cha ashulhupalhe anoholhelha nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo, chaahiwihiyeke ni uhimiecheshiya ni attu elhi ama araru.
Mwaamukeke vaattuni attu anowonya, attu akina ayo yooveke.

Kinoulheherani mmiholho wa Nlhuku ni wa Kuristo Yesu ni wo minepa o wiirimu chithanlhiye, wiira nvarechesheke malhehero alha, mena nhihukumulhe wo ichimwa ama ummweha wiitho ntu riyoothe wo kila nlhatu unowiiheriya inyu.
Nhaakuvihe ummaha ntu ntheko wo uholhelha nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo. Nhikavihe uwonya wa attu akina, mwiichinanelheke mwaanene nhinanarihiye.
Nhiwurie maashiru nansho mmwurieke idivai vakani wo nlhatu no nthunkwa ninyu ukhalhawaya ninouweriani venchi.
Uwonya wa attu akina unowoonia mwaari ata ahinaya uhukumulhiya. Nansho uwonya wa attu akina unowa woonia vanohalha aya uhukumulhiya.
Chiichammo etu, meetelho oombone anowoonia mwaari, ata ayo ahinoonia ayo khanooria wiivitha.
Attu onkhaye arii mpottani yaathimicheke anene ntheko aya ayo wo kila ittu, nchina na Athithi nihiwe naaruwaniya mena meettuchiho ihu.

Ipotta cha anene ntheko aarumelhenlhe Athithi, ahaanyoholhache ashinene ntheko aya wo woona ukhalha Akuristo nanaya tu. Nansho apangeke ntheko rata ukhalhawaya ayo ampatta ifaida munthekoni mwa ipotta ayo ni ayo anowaattuna. Mwiittuchiheke ni uhimiacha ulha mwaha ulha.
Ntu riyoothe neettuchiha chittu chihinlhikaana ni meettuchiho o ukhalha chinothanana awe Nlhuku ni mena hinorumelhelha malhove e ikeekhene a Athithi Yesu Kuristo,

yoyo ntu uyo hochara nikakata no wiititihacha ni mena khachuwenlhe ittu iriyoothe. Yoyo phi ntu o uttuna mwaha wo uvaanyihana ni waahimeriacha attu chittu cho uhikhalha ni maana, aanyulhachaka ihache ni indewo ni uruwanana ni wuupuwelha chittu cho uhilhoka,
ni uvaanyihana uhinomalha ukhuma wa attu o uhikhalha ni irusho, attu ahiri ni ikeekhene. Attu anaanyihera wiira uvara ntheko wa Nlhuku phi iphiro yo upatta nhakhu.
Eiyo we ikekhiaye uvara ntheko wa Nlhuku unommaha ntu nhakhu mwinchi yakhalhaka nooteelhiya wo chittu chirina awe.
Ukhalhawaya khanaawilhe ni ittu iriyoothe velhaponi va ni mena khaninokusha ittu iriyoothe nihuku nihu no uthama velhaponi va.
Paahi etu yakhalhaka nihanaa cholhia ni ikuwo, nipisheke nrima.
Nansho attu o irusho cho uthanana ukhalha ni nhakhu anoowulhuwa mu ulhikachiyani ni uwayihiya nriankho wo nikakata ninchi no uhilhoka no uhikhalha maana ninaapurulhelha uutanganyiyani lhakalhaka.

Ukhalhawaya nrima wo uthanana nchurukhu chinene phi machokholhelho o uwonya wonkhaye. Attu akina ahothanana chinene upatta nchurukhu mpaka nkayaakukuriacha, nkayaahiya nrima ni mirima chaya chihopahiya chinene wo ihuzuni.
Nansho inyuva nrii ntu a Nlhuku va, nhittware yoyo mwaha uyo. Nvarechesheke ikekhia rata ni unthimicha Nlhuku ni upisha nrima ni uttunana ni uvilhelha ni wiitimarikha.
Mwaatakaneke wo machiri ikhoto yo munrimani wiira nhilhikachiye, nvarechesheke ukumi inyu wo uhimalha mwiihanelhiye inyu mmiholho wa o uhimiechesha enchi wo unrumelhelha Kuristo.
Kinoulheherani mmiholho wa Nlhuku nokumiha ukumi wo chittu chonkhaye ni mmiholho wa Kuristo Yesu nohimiechesha ni urumelhelha ikeekhene mmiholho wa Apontio Pilato,
wiira nvarechesheke malhehero inyu, nkhalheke attu o uhikhuwachiya mpaka nihuku Athithi Yesu Kuristo vanohalha aya ukhumelhelha.
Ukhumelhelha waya unowa ukhalha ikatema vanohalha aya waaya yeeshiye ni Nlhuku o mpuha nototopelhiya, rii ntawara o vekha awe, Mwene o mamwene ni Athithi o manyaathithi.
Yoyo vekha awe phi o uhikhwa rii nokhalha munthukoni nhinaatameriya ni ntu riyoothe. Khaawo ntu pantte umwoona ama nooria umwoona. Nthimicho ni ikuru chikhalheke uwannyawe mahuku o uhimalha! Aye.
Mwaalhehereke attu o nhakhu wo velhaponi va wiira ahiifune, ahikhulhuvelhe nhakhu uhinkhulhuvelhiya. Nansho, ankhulhuvelheke Nlhuku nonivaha chittu chonkhaye wo urera wawe wiira nipuheke.
Mwaalhehereke wiira apangeke morera ni ukhalha attu o nhakhu wo upanga menchi moombone, akhalheke attu ari tayari waakawelha attu akina nhakhu aya.
Yapangaka chiichammo anowiicheeshera nikhupi ninohalha ukhalha thoko nsingi wo ulhama unowa aya ukhulhuvelha mahuku anowa. Vavawo anowa aapatta ukumi urii ukumi we ikeekhene.
Inyu Natimotheo, nshungeke rata chittu chonkhaye chivahiye inyu. Nhiihelhe malhove o uvaanyihana mwaha wo velhaponi wo uvaanyihana uhiri ni maana waachaka ittu attu ineehana aya Irusho cho ushomiya.

Ukhalhawaya attu akina aheepanga ukhalha attu o irusho cho uchuwelha thoko chechiyo. Ni wo upanga chiicho etu ahoriha nrima waya. Kinoulhepelhelhani wiira nnema wa Nlhuku ukhalheke ni inyu mwaatti onkhaye!
Mii Paolo, karumiya a Kuristo Yesu kiihaniye wo uthanana wawe Nlhuku wiira kihimiache ukumi nilhehiye ihu ulhe wo ulhutaana wihu ni Kuristo Yesu,
kinolhepa iwarakha iwe uwaninyu Natimotheo, mwaamwanaka kinonttuna aka. Kinoulhapelhelhani nnema, ikiriri ni mpuha ukhuma wa Nlhuku Athumwanihu ni wa Kuristo Yesu Athithi.
Kinonshukuru Nlhuku kinonthimicha aka wo nrima worera thoko chaapanga aya manyaapwiiya. Kinonshukuru Nlhuku kila vanowuupuwelhaakani wo uhimalha ni kila ikatema vanonlhapelha aka uthana ni uhiyu.
Vanoopuwelha aka miithori chinyu kinoothanana chinene uwoonani wiira kiteelhiye nrima.
Kinowuupuwelha nrima inyu uhirii ni unafiki, upisha nrima waarina aya apwiiya inyu Naloisi ni chiicho anumwaninyu Eunike. Ni mii kihanaa ikekhiaye wiira ni inyu nhanaa yoyo nrima uyo chiicho.
Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, kinowupushani wiira nthotherieke chinene mooro wo mahalha avahiye inyu ni Nlhuku voweshenreakani miono chaka.
Ukhalhawaya Iphumu ivahiye ihu ni Nlhuku kihii yo unoopopiha, mena, nansho Iphumu yo machiri ni yo univaha nrima wo uttunana ni wiitimarikha.
Paahi etu nhoone ishoni waahimiechesha Athithi, mena nhoone ishoni wo nlhatu waka mii kittukiye wo nlhatu waya. Nansho nvilhelheke uhuva vamoka ni mii wo nlhatu wo Malhove Orera, wo machiri a Nlhuku.

Nlhuku ahonoopolha nkaaniihana nikhalhe attu awe, kuhiwe wo nlhatu wo mitheko chihu nansho wo nlhatu wo malhakelho awe ni wo nnema waya. Yoyo nnema uyo naavahiye wo iphiro ya Kuristo Yesu mahuku toka machokholhelho.
Nansho vano nihopatakulhelhiya nnema wawe wo uwa wa Moopolhi ihu Yesu Kuristo. Yoyo hontiyelhelha nookhwa ni wo iphiro yo Malhove Orera honipatakulhelha ukumi uhiri ni nookhwa.
Ni Nlhuku hokithanlha mii kikhalhe karumiya ni owiittuchiha wo nlhatu no uhimiacha Malhove Orera,

ni wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu phi notwaruwa aka chiicho. Nansho vano akinoona ishoni ukhalhawaya kihaachuwelha kaarumelhenlhe aka ayo, tho kihanaa ikekhiaye wiira anowooria ushunga rata ilhe ikivanhe aya mpaka nenno nihuku no uwa waya nno.
Nvarechesheke rata meettuchiho e ikeekhene kuhimenrieakani, ntwariheke ni upisha nrima ni uttunana wo ulhutaana wihu ni Kuristo Yesu.
Wo machiri o Iphumu ya Nlhuku nokhalha nhina mwihu, nshungeke rata ikeekhene nvahiye inyu.
Thoko chinochuwelha inyu, attu onkhaye o ilhapo yo Uasiya ahokihiya, ata Nafigelo ni Nahemogene ni ayo ahokihiya chiicho.
Athithi aakavihereke attu o unupani u Naonesiforo, wo woonelha ikiriri, ukhalhawaya yahokiteelhiha nrima ikatema chinchi mena khayoonilhe ishoni wo nlhatu no uttukiya waka,
nansho Naonesiforo ikatema vaari aya va Rumi va, yahokaavia chinene mpaka nkayaakoona, nkayaaakihelha nrima.
Athithi aakavihereke wo ikiriri aya uholho wa Nlhuku nenno nihuku no uhukumulhiya attu nno. Ni inyu nhochuwelha rata mwaha wonkhaye ukipangenlhe aya Uefeso uwo.
Paahi etu, uwe mwaamwanaka wiilhipiheke mu nnemani ninovahiya ihu wo ulhutaana ni Kuristo Yesu.
Nkusheke meettuchiho mweewilhe inyu kiittuchihaka wa attu o uhimiechesha enchi, mweettuchiheke attu o ukhulhuvelhiya anohalha wooria weettuchiha attu akina chiicho.
Nvilhelheke uhuva vamoka ni hii, nkhalhaka thoko nsikari o ukhulhuvelhiya a Kuristo Yesu.
Nsikari vanaatakana awe ikhoto noohiya chittu chinopanga awe mahuku ene, ukhalhawaya nothanana unteelhiha nholhelhi awe.
Chiichammo ntu riyoothe nothwelha nhapo wo uttawa ni akhunanawe khanowarihiya mphumburu aahittaweke thoko chinothananiya aya.
Namalhima hunvee phi nothananiya upatta nifungu no upacha no choolhia.
Nvarelheke yayo anohimiacha aka ayo, ukhalhawaya Athithi anouvahani irusho cho uchuwelha chittu chonkhaye.
Mmuupuwelheke Yesu Kuristo o iyari ya Adaudi, aahihimushiye, thoko chinohimia aya Malhove Orera anohimiacha aka wa attu.
Ni mii wo nlhatu no uhimiacha Malhove Orera ayo kinootwarushiya ni uttukiya mittondoro thoko ntu ttekilhe. Nansho nlhove na Nlhuku khaninttukiya mittondoro.
Paahi etu kinoovilhelha kila ittu wo nlhatu no attu athanlhiye a Nlhuku, wiira ni ayo ampatte noopo nopattiya wo iphiro ya Yesu Kuristo, inowiiha nthimicho wo uhimalha.
Nna nlhove nna phi no ukhulhuvelhiya. “Nakhalhaka nahokhwa vamoka ni uyo, Ninookhalha akumi vamoka ni uyo.
Navilhelhaka, Ninootawara vamoka ni uyo. Nankhotaka, Ni uyo chiicho noonikhota.
Naahirumelhelheke, Yoyo noohalha o ukhulhuvelhiya ikatema choothe. Ukhalhawaya yoyo khaanoria wiikhota mwanene.”
Mwoopusheke attu ayo yoyo mwaha uyo uno mwaamukaka mmiholho wa Nlhuku ahiye mwaha wo uvaanyihana malhove o uhikhalha maana, anaahononacha attu aneewelhelha ayo.
Mmindeke upanga chinothanana awe Nlhuku, ukhalha namitheko hinoolhiya muru vachulhu ntheko awe, neettuchiha rata nttenga we ikeekhene.
Mwiihapusheke malhove o waakhulhana o unanara o uhikhalha maana, ukhalhawaya yayo anowaathepiha unkhalhelha Nlhuku utayi.
Meettuchiho thoko yayo anokhalha thoko nampathani. Munlhokoni mwa yayo attu ayo ahawo Nahumenayo ni Nafileto,
akufiananne ikeekhene ilhe wo uhimia wiira uhihimushiya wa attu uhomalha uwa, ata nkayaapitikusha attu akina nrima aya.

Nansho ikeekhene ya Nlhuku iheemelha chichiriki thoko nsingi wo malhuku. Vachulhu waya aholhepiya alha malhove alha, “Athithi ahaachuwelha arii awaya.” Ni “Kila neechiirelha wiira uyo a Athithi, ahiyeke uhilhoka.”
Paahi nhina inupa yuulhupalhe khachirii iyombo cho idhahabu ni cho malhuku o fedha chinolhohiya chinene vekha ayaru, nansho chihaawo chikina cho miri ni cho ulhoko, chihinolhohiya rata.
Paahi ntu ehapihaka ni wiihapusha chechiyo chittu cho uhilhoka chiyo, nookhalha ittu yo uthimichiya ukhalhawaya hotelhihiya ukhalha ittu inaachivelha Athithi ikooroshiye wo nlhatu wo ntheko woombone.
Nansho nhittware itama che imirawo ntwareke ikekhiaye ni nrima ni uttuna ni mpuha vamoka ni alhe aneehana Athithi wo nrima worera.
Nansho nshembeke waakhulhana mwaha wo uhikhalha irusho ni maana nchuwelhaka wiira yoyo phi nowiiha indewo.
Paahi etu karumiya a Athithi khanothananiya waana nansho akhalheke o umanya wa attu onkhaye, nooria wiittuchiha ni o uvilhelha,
naamuka wo wiitimarikha attu anompangelha ichimwa, ikhalhe wiira Nlhuku aavahere nipesha no ukhoroma uwonya waya ni uchuwelha ikeekhene.
Apatte tho irusho chaya ni ukhuma mu nriankhoni mwa Nakare mwaawayinhe awe wiira aapangihe chinothanana awe.
Nchuwelheke wiira mahuku o umalhelha anookhalha o uhuva.
Attu anowa ukhalha o wiittuna ashineneru, o uttuna nchurukhu chinene, o wiititihacha, o wiichoona, o unruwana Nlhuku, ahinaathimicha manyanaangoro aya, ahinoshukuru ni ahinomwoova Nlhuku.
Anowa ukhalha attu ahinttunana ni o uhittuna wiiwanana ni o waapa attu ni o umenyekha ni o uchachachacha ni o uhittuna ittu iriyoothe yoombone,
anowa ukhalha attu o uthumihana ashineneru ni attu o tiyamaru, achanre mahuchuru ni ukhalha attu o uttuna wiiphwacha kuliko unthimicha Nlhuku.
Wo vathe anowa wiipanga attu anonthimicha Nlhuku, nansho akhotaka machiri awe. Mwaashembeke yayo attu ayo.

Attu akina anookelha mmanupani mwa attu ni waakhanyereriha manyopani o mirima cho uhuperia alhemelhiye misigo cho uwonya anovariya ni uholhelhiya nikakata no uhilhoka no kila iphiro wiira yeewelhelhe,
manyopani anolhikacha kila ikatema wiittucha nansho ahoriaka mena uphiyelha chechiyo irusho cho uchuwelha ikeekhene chiyo.
Yayo phi attu anovinga ikeekhene thoko Nayane ni Nayambre chenre aya wo waakhota ashinna Musa. Yayo attu ayo kharina irusho ni o upisha nrima uhiri we ikeekhene.
Nansho khanolhokelha chinene ukhalhawaya uhikhalha ni irusho waya unowa woonia mwaari vaattuni thoko chenre aya wa Nayane ni Nayambre.
Nansho inyuva nhottwara meettuchiho aka ni meetelho aka ni chittu chinothanana aka upanga ni upisha nrima waka ni uvilhelha waka ni uttuna waka ni uweherera waka
tho ni utwarushiya waka. Mwaha waakipantte Uantiokiya ni Uikoniyo ni Ulistra. Kahovilhelha uhuva wo kila iphiro, Athithi nkayaakoopolha nhina yayo onkhaye ayo.
Wo ikekhiaye, kila ntu nothanana ukhalha amwoovaka Nlhuku wo ulhutaana Kuristo Yesu, yoyo nootwarushiya.
Nansho attu o nrima wo uhilhoka ni o thepiacha yayo anoothepa uhilhoka waya, aathepiachaka attu ni uthepiachiya ashinene.
Nansho inyuva nthepeke ukhalha thoko chiittuchihiye inyu nkamwaarumelhelha, ukhalhawaya nhochuwelha wiira mweettunche wa apani,
ni wuupuwelha wiira toka uchihima winyu nhochuwelha Malhove Matakatifu anooria uuvahani irusho ata nkamwampatta noopo wo iphiro yo unrumelhelha Kuristo Yesu.

Ukhalhawaya Malhove Matakatifu onkhaye alhepiye wo uholhelhiya ni Iphumu ni Nlhuku. Ni ayo anoolhoka wo weettuchiha attu ikeekhene ni waamuka attu, wookolha ahiye iphiro chaya cho uwonya ni waalhaka wiira avire iphiro che ikekhiaye,
ikhalhe wiira ntu a Nlhuku atimire ni ukhalha tayari oorie uvara kila ntheko uri woombone.
Kinoulheherani mmiholho wa Nlhuku ni mmiholho wa Kuristo Yesu nohalha waahukumulha attu akumi ni attu akhwilhe, wo upatakulhiya wawe ni wo Umwene awe, wiira,
mwaahimiachereke attu nttenga ni ukhalha tayari uhimiacha ikatema inolhoka ama ikatema ihinolhoka, mwaachachereke attu, mwaamukeke ni waakurumicha attu, mwaavilhelhaka chinene ni weettuchiha.

Ukhalhawaya inoowa ikatema attu vanohalha aya uhiiwelhelha meettuchiho e ikekhiaye nansho attwaraka nrima waya ashineneru ni upatta milhoko cha owiittuchiha enchi anohalha waahimeria chittu chinochiva wiiwa mmaaruni mwaya.
Anowa ukhota wiiwelhelha ikeekhene ni urukunuwelha ithelhi cho uhikhalha maana.
Nansho inyuva nkhalheke miitho wo kila iphiro, nvilhelheke vanohuva inyu, mpangeke ntheko inyu wo uhimiacha Malhove Orera, mpangeke ntheko inyu uyo rata.
Ukhalhawaya vano mii kihophiyelha ikatema aka yo uthama velhaponi ihaaya, ni iphome aka inookumihiya thoko isadaka yo idivai chinokumiiniya aya ni opochera ishaani.
Kihaatakana ikhoto rata, kihomalhiha nkwaha wonkhaye ni uvarechesha nrima.

Ittu ihalhenlhe vano phi uttuviya wo makhalhelho oombone mmiholho wa Nlhuku akhanlhe aka. Mphumburu unohalha aya ukiwariha Athithi, O uhukumulha e ikekhiaye nenno nihuku nno. Kihikhalhaka mii vekha aka nansho ni attu onkhaye attunne uweherera ukhumelhelha waya.
Mpangeke kila inooria inyu mmwe uwannyaka chitema.
Ukhalhawaya Nadema ahochivelhiya chinene chittu cho velhaponi va ahokihiya ahorwaa Uthesalonike. Nakeresike ahorwaa Ugalatiya ni Natito akenlhe Udalmatiya.
Ashinna Luka vekha aya phi hanlhe vamoka ni mii va. Vanowa inyu vawo mwaakusheke Namako, mwaawiiheke, ukhalhawaya anowa ukikaviha mitheko chaka.
Kihaaruma Natikiko Uefeso.
Vanowa inyu nkikushere mwiinjiro aka waahiyalhe aka uwannyaya Nakarpo Utroa ulhe, chiichammo tho, nkiwiihereke ikitabu chilhe, hasa chikooroshiye wo marapalha chilhe.
Ntu o uhanacha chittu neehaniya Alekizanda ulhe hokipangelha cho uhilhoka chinene, Athithi anonlhiva thoko chipangilhe awe.
Ni inyu mummweheke rata yoyo ntu uyo ukhalhawaya ahovinga chinene nttenga wihu.
Ikatema yaachokhonlhe aka wiivaraanga wo upacha khaawo ntu eemenlhe vamoka ni mii onkhaye yahokihiya. Kinonlhapelha Nlhuku wiira haalhakelhelhe wowo utteka uwo.

Nansho Athithi yaari vamoka ni mii, nkaakivaha machiri ata nkakooria uhimiacha nttenga wonkhaye, attu ahiri Ayahudi eewe. Tho, nkakoopolhiya ukhuma ihukumu yo nookhwa thoko koopolhiye ukhuma iyano yo kharamu.
Athithi anookopolha mwaha wonkhaye wo uhilhoka ni ukipiiha rata mu Imweneni waya wo wiirimu. Nthimicho ukhalhe uwannyaya mahuku o uhimalha. Aye.
Mwaavaheke isalamu chaka Aprisila ni Naakwila, vamoka ni attu o unupani wa Naonesiforo.
Ashinna Erasto ahohalha Ukorintho ni Natrofimo kihaahiya Umileto ukhalhawaya yaari areta.
Mmweeke uno chitema uhinaaya nlhaalha wo uririya. Mpochereke isalamu chi Naeubulo ni Napude ni Nalinusi ni Nakilaudiya vamoka ni manyaalhoko ihu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo akina.
Athithi akhalhe vamoka ni inyu. Ni nnema waya ukhalhe vamoka ni nrima inyu.

Mii Paolo, namitheko a Nlhuku ni karumiya a Yesu Kuristo kinoolhepa. Mii kihothanlhiya ni urumiya kirwee kaahelhe nrima attu athanlhiye ni Nlhuku ni waaholhelha attu achuwelhe ikeekhene wiira akhalhe iphiro chinothanana awe Nlhuku.
Yeyo ikeekhene iyo phi nonikhulhuvelhiha upatta ukumi wo mahuku o uhimalha, naalhehiye ihu ni Nlhuku hinoothacha toka machokholhelho ilhapo ihinaya wuupiya.
Ni ikatema yorera yaayeke ahopatakulha nttenga wawe. Nkakaarumiya wiira kivire kaahimiacha wo urumelhelhiya ni Nlhuku Moopolhi ihu.
Kinolhepa iwarakha iwe uwaninyu inyu Natito anaaka e ikekhiaye munrimani munopisha ihu. Kinoulhapelhelhani nnema ni mpuha ukhuma wa Nlhuku Athumwanihu ni Kuristo Yesu Moopolhi ihu.

Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo kahoohiyani Ukirete, wiira nrehelhelhe vakittu vawukuwilhe ni waathanlha ashulhupalhe aholhelhi o milhoko cha attu anonrumelhelha Kuristo kila iwani. Muupuwelheke thoko chenre aka wo ulheherani.

Wiira ashulhupalhe aholhelhi o nlhoko wa attu anonrumelhelha Kuristo anophwanelhiya ukhalha attu o uhikhuwachiya, akhalheke nlhopwana a nthiyana amoka ni achishaana awe akhalheke anonrumelhelha Kuristo ahikhalhe o hiiwa aamukiaka ama o tiyamaru.

Ukhalhawaya attu anoshunga nlhoko wa attu anonrumelhelha Kuristo phi o ipilhi yo weemelhelha mitheko cha Nlhuku. Paahi etu, hikhalhe ntu o ukhuwachiya ama o wiititihacha mena hikhalhe ntu o uhipicha uthunalha ama ntu o uhapalhiya ama ntu o waana indewo ama ntu o nlhulha wo uttuna nchurukhu chinene.
Nansho akhalheke ntu o waapochera alheto ni ntu o uttuna upanga chittu choombone. Akhalheke ntu o wiichaamuka, ntu e ikekhiaye, ntakatifu hinokhuwachiya ni ntu neetawara mwanene.
Akhalheke ntu novarechesha rata nttenga we ukhulhuvelhiya thoko chinre awe wo wiittuchihiya wiira oorie waahelha nrima attu wo weettuchiha meettuchiho e ikeekhene ni wookokolha attu anovaanyiha.
Ukhalhawaya ahaawo attu anovaanyiha ni waathepiacha attu akina chittu chihiri ni irusho, athepaka alhe akhumme iphiro cha attu enelhiye unyawo munrimani, Ayahudi anrumelhenlhe Kuristo alhe.

Amaalhihiyeke yayo attu ayo ukhalhawaya naahiyaka anoothepa waapitikusha nrima attu mmanupani mwonkhaye vaneettuchiha aya chittu chihinooria aya wiittuchiha. Anopangacha chiicho wiira apatte nchurukhu wo wiittuchiha chittu cho wulhiha muru.
Ata ntu mmoka mmilhokoni mwa anamilhohi aya, ahoolhumacha wiira, “Attu o Ukirete mahuku onkhaye arii attu o woothacha, ari thoko mashene, attu o ureshi ni attu o nlhulha!”
Ni uyo hohimiechesha we ikekhiaye. Ni wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, mwaachacheracheke chinene, upisha nrima waya ulhipeke.
Ahiyeke wiiwelhelha ithelhi cha Ayahudi mena ahiiwelhelhe malhehero yeeshiye ni attu akhonte ikeekhene.
Kila ittu iri yorera wa attu orera nansho khiiwo ittu iri yoombone wa attu o nyalha ni o nrima uhinrumelhelha. Ukhalhawaya mirima ni irusho chaya chihonanarihiya.
Yayo attu ayo aneera wiira anonchuwelha Nlhuku, nansho meetelho aya anowaakhota. Phi attu ahinolhoka mmiithoni mwa ashikhunanaya, o mirima cho itiyamaru, ahinolhoka wo mitheko chiriyoothe chorera.
Nansho inyuva mweettuchiheke attu malhove a Nlhuku arii phi e ikeekhene.
Mwaahimerieke ashulhupalhe wiira eethimicheke, akhalheke attu o weewelhelha ashikhunanaya, o irusho, o upisha nrima ni o waattuna attu ni o uvilhelha.
Ni chiichammo mweettuchiheke manyopani o wulhuvalha wiira amwooveke Nlhuku. Ahikhalhe attu o waapa akhunanaya ama ipotta cho uhapalhiya utheka. Eettuchiheke akhunanaya iphiro choombone,
wiira aalhake imialhi yaattune manyowannyaya ni achishaana aya,
yiitimarikheke ni vavawo ahikhalhe o unanara, anopangacha chittu chorera wo manyowannyaya, nlhove na Nlhuku nihiwe naaruwaniya.
Thothoni tho, mwaamukeke ashimirawo wiira ni ayo yiithimicheke.
Wo iphiro chonkhaye ni inyu mwaanene nkhalheke ntu o utwarihelhiya wo meetelho inyu oombone. Mwiilhipiheke wo malhove nnetuchiha inyu attu, mena nhipange thoko ncheche.
Malhove aneettuchiha inyu akhalheke o ikuru ahinoovanyihiya, amalhaponi inyu awe oona ishoni ahikhalhaka ni ittu yo unanara yo unihukumulha.
Ipotta ni ayo chiicho eetimarikheke wa manyaapwiiya aya aanaaruma ayo, yaatelhihaka wo mitheko chonkhaye chinopanga aya. Ahaanyihanaka,
mena wiiya nhakhu aya. Nansho, ooniheke nrima woombone ni ukhulhuvelhiya, echonihaka wo iphiro chonkhaye wiira meettuchiho a Nlhuku Moopolhi ihu phi o ikeekhene.
Ukhalhawaya nnema wa Nlhuku unommwiiha noopo uhopatakulhiya wa attu onkhaye.
Nnema wa Nlhuku unoniittuchiha hii ukhota nikakata no velhaponi va, nikhalhe wo uhihapalhiya, wo wiitimarikha ni wo uvarechesha ikekhiaye, uno ninthimichaka Nlhuku ninari bado velhaponi va,
niwehereraka nihuku no mpuha ninokhulhuvelha ihu, vanohalha aya upatakulhiya nthimicho wa Nlhuku mulhupalhe ni Moopolhi ihu, Yesu Kuristo.
Yoyo aheekumiha mwanene wo nlhatu wihu wiira anoopolhe mu uhilhokani mwonkhaye anihapihaka ukhalha atakatifu awe, attu anovarechesha upangacha chittu choombone.
Mwiittuchiheke chilha chittu chilha, nvarelhelhaka ikuru inyu uno mwaalheheraka ni waamuka attu anowiiwelhelhani. Ni vavawo hikhalhe ntu hinowiwelhelhani.
Mwoopusheke attu wiira yaathimicheke aholhelhi ni attu anotawara, yeewelhelheke ni ukhalha rata wo kila iphiro upangacha mitheko chonkhaye.
Mwaahimerieke wiira ahinruwane ntu riyoothe, nansho akhalheke attu o mpuha ni o wiiwanana. Ni wo mahuku onkhaye yooniheke nrima woombone wa kila ntu.

Ukhalhawaya khalhayi vawo hii naari attu o uhikhalha ni irusho, o tiyamaru, ni attu o uwonya. Naari ipotta cho nikakata no wiipuhiha no kila iphiro. Nikhalhaka mu uwonyani ni ihache, attu anivengaka ni hii nivenganaka naashineneru.
Nansho ikatema yo mpuha ni uttuna wa Nlhuku Moopolhi ihu vaapatakulhiye aya,

ahonoopolha, kuhiwe wo nlhatu uriyoothe wo ikekhiaye waapannge ihu hii, nansho wo ikiriri awe, ni wo iphiro yo Iphumu ya Nlhuku nonivahera wiira niyarie tho ni univaha ukumi wo naanano wo unihapiha mmaashini.
Nlhuku ahonivaha wo winchiva Iphumu awe wo iphiro ya Yesu Kuristo Moopolhi ihu,
wiira etu wo nnema wa Nlhuku naalhakelhiye ikekhiaye, niwe naapatta ukumi wo uhimalha unokhulhuvelha ihu.

Nna phi nulhumo no ukhulhuvelhiya. Kinouthananani inyuva nvarecheshe ulha mwaha ulha, wiira attu onkhaye anonrumelhelha Nlhuku akhalheke ni nrima wo upanga chittu choombone, chinaatelhiha attu mirima.
Nansho nshembeke malhove o uvaanyihana o uhikhalha ni maana anaacha manyaapwiiya, indewo ni uvaanyihana mwaha unaacha Malhehero. Ukhalhawaya yayo khanlhoka ni mena kharina maana ariyoothe.
Ntu naaniha attu yoyo mmwamukeke nkwaha wo upacha ni nkwaha wo nayelhi, aahiiweke mummwalhaaneke,
nchuwelhaka wiira ntu thoko yoyo hopotera ni uwonya. Ukhalhawaya uwonya wawe phi nonhukumulha wiira howonya.
Vanohalha aka waaruma Nartema ama Natikiko, mwaavieke iphiro yo uwa Unikopoli mmwe naakumaana, ukhalhawaya kiholhakelha uwa ukhalhani wowo nlhaalha wo uririya.
Mpangeke kila chinohalha inyu wooria, waakaviha ashinna Zeno owiittuchiha Malhehero ni Naapolo, wiira vaneeta aya munkwahani mwaya, ahiwukuwelhiye ittu iriyoothe.
Attu ihu ni ayo lazima vano eettucheke upanga mitheko choombone, wiira chaakavihere wimma maphepu ittu ni upatta yo waavaha attu anovekelha, ukumi waya ukhalhe wo urera.
Attu onkhaye anaakhalhana aka va, anouvahani isalamu. Ni isalamu chihu mwaapiihereke manyampwana anaattuna ihu anonrumelhelha Kuristo. Nnema wa Nlhuku ukhalhe vamoka ni inyu mwaatti.
Mii Paolo kittukiye wo nlhatu wo uvara ntheko wa Kuristo Yesu, vamoka ni munnihu Timotheo, kinoolhepa iwarakha iwe uwaninyu alhoko aka ni namitheko nkhunanihu Filimoni,
ni wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo anokumaana unupani winyu ni arokorihu Naapiya ni wa Naakipo namitheko nanihu o waatakanelha Malhove Orera.
Kinoulhapelhelhani nnema ni mpuha ukhuma wa Nlhuku Athumwanihu ni Athithi Yesu Kuristo.
Kinonshukuru Nlhuku kila ikatema vanolhapelha aka ni uwupuwelhani inyu Nafilimoni,
ukhalhawaya kinowiiwa nrima urina inyu wo waarumelhelha Athithi Yesu ni nrima wo waattuna attu a Nlhuku.
Kinonlhapelha Nlhuku wiira nthepeke upisha nrima inyu, mwoorie uchuwelha chinene kila ibarakha irina ihu wo ukhalha nlhoko mmoka ni Kuristo.
Munna, uttuna winyu uhokiteelhiha ni ukihelha nrima chinene. Ukhalhawaya nhoteelhiha mirima cha attu a Nlhuku.
Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, mii kikhalhaka munninyu wo ulhutaana ni Kuristo, kaanooria uukhanyererihani wo uhoova ittu ilheheriye inyu upanga,
nansho wo nlhatu wo uttunani, kinoulhepelhani. Kineera chiicho inakhalhaka mii Paolo ki ntu owulhuvalha, kittukiye wo nlhatu wo uvara ntheko wa Yesu Kuristo.
Paahi, kinoulhepelhani wiira munkaviheke mwaamwanaka Onesimo, aari mwaamwanaka wo ulhutaana ni Kuristo, kikhalhaka thoko athumwanawe vaari ihu mu uttukiyani.
Khalhayi vawo aari ntu o uhikhulhuvelhiya uwaninyu, nansho wo ikekhiaye vano phi o ukhulhuvelhiya kuhii uwannyaka vekha ayaru nansho ni uwaninyu chiicho.
Vano etu kinonhokolhosha tho uwaninyu waakhumme awe, ukhalhawaya vano yoyo ri thoko nrima aka.
Kahothanana wiira athepe ukhalha ni mii uttukiye aka uno, akikaviheke mitheko cho uhimiacha Malhove Orera thoko chikenre inyu munna.
Nansho akinookhanyererihani wiira nkikavihe uhuva waka. Urera nrima winyu ukhalheke wo uttuna winyu mwaanene.
Veekinaka phi nlhatu etu Onesimo aari utayi ni inyu wo mahuku vakani, wiira ahokolhiaka awe okhalhanani wowo mahuku onkhaye.

Ulha vano kahiwe ipotta tho, nansho o upwaha ipotta, vano ulha mpwana ihu. Hokiteelhiha nrima mii ni we ikekhiaye noowa uuteelhihani nrima ni inyu thoko ntu ri ipotta ni nlhoko ihu muulhutaanani ni Athithi.
Vano etu mwachuwelhaka wiira mii ki nkavihi nkhunaninyu mu ulhutaanani ni Athithi, mumpochereke etu thoko chikenre inyu wo ukipochera mii.
Yakhalhaka ahoupangelhani ittu yo uhilhoka ama ahowaashimani ittu, mii kinoulhivani.
Vaa, mii Paolo kinolhepa wo moono aka kimwanene, kinoulhivani. Nansho akinowuupushani wiira ni mii nkilhiveke ukumi inyu.
Paahi etu munna, kinoulhepelhani wiira nkipangelheke nenno nlhove nno wo nlhatu wa Athithi, nkiteelhiheke nrima thoko munninyu mu uttunanani nhina Kuristo.
Ukhalhawaya kinoukhulhuvelhani, paahi etu vanolhepa aka ilha iwarakha ilha, kihochuwelha wiira nnoopanga chilhepenlhe aka uwaninyu chiyo, tho nnoopanga wo uthepa.

Nansho vamoka ni yayo malhove ayo, nkaaverieke inupa yo uphiyelha, ukhalhawaya kiri muukhulhuvelhani wiira Nlhuku noopochera ulhapelha winyu mwaatti onkhaye ni mii kinoowa kooweetelhelhani wowo uwaninyu uwo.
Epafra ttukiye nkhunanaka wo nlhatu wo uvara ntheko wa Kuristo Yesu, nouvahani isalamu.
Chiicho anamitheko nanaka Namako ni Naaristako ni Nadema ni ashinna Luka ni ayo anouvahani isalamu.
Nnema wa Athithi Yesu Kuristo ukhalheke vamoka ni nrima inyu mwaatti onkhaye.
Khalhayi vawo Nlhuku ahoolhumacha ni manyaapwiiya ihu venchi wo iphiro chinchi ni wo iphiro ya anamilhohi awe,

nansho alha mahuku ammalhelha alha honulhumacha ni hii wo iphiro yo Mwaamwanawe, nthanlhe awe wiira chittu chonkhaye chikhalhe chawawe. Ni wo iphiro yo yoyo Nlhuku ahoopa irimu ni ilhapo ni chittu chonkhaye chiriwo.

Mwaana phi waaria wo nthimicho wa Nlhuku, alhikaanaka ni Nlhuku mwanene, avarelhaka chittu chonkhaye wo nlhove nawe no machiri. Vamalhinhe awe unihapiha uwonya wihu, hokhalha vano wiirimu wiimonono wa Nlhuku o ikuru.
Paahi etu Mwaana phiri ni ipilhi yulhupalhe waapwaha minepa o wiirimu, thoko nchina vahiye awe ni Nlhuku chiri aya nulhupalhe upwaha machina aya.

Ukhalhawaya Nlhuku khaneera mena ata wo nnepa wo wiirimu mmoka uriyoothe wiira, “Uweva phi Mwaamwanaka, Lhelho, kinoolhumacha onkhaye achuwelhe wiira, Mii phi Athumwana.” Ni vavawo khanoolhumacha wiira, “Mii kinookhalha phi Athumwanawe, Ni uyo nookhalha Mwaamwanaka.”
Ni vavawo etu Nlhuku vanonruma awe Mwaana awe o nttara velhaponi, neera, “Minepa a Nlhuku onkhaye anthimicheke yoyo.”
Nansho wo minepa o wiirimu Nlhuku enre, “Haapanga minepa awe ukhalha iphioo. Ni akarumiya awe ukhalha malhimi o mooro.”
Nansho wo Mwaamwanawe enre, “Inyu Apwiiya Nlhuku, Ihiche inyu ye Imwene, phi yo mahuku o uhimalha. Ikopo inyu phi naatawara attu inyu we ikekhiaye.

Inyuva nhottuna mitheko cho ikekhiaye, nhovenga iphiro cho uwonya. Phi wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, Nlhuku, Nlhuku inyu, ahoohikani makhura o ipilhi yuulhupalhe waapwaha akavihi ashikhunaninyu, nkamwaattapelhelha chinene.”
Tho aheera, “Inyu Thithi vaachokhonlhe inyu, mwahoupa ilhapo, Ni irimu ni iyo phi ntheko wo miono chinyu.
Chonkhaye chiyo chinoovira, nansho inyu nnoolhokelha mahuku o uhimalha. Chittu chonkhaye chinoothalha thoko ikuwo.
Nnoovilhikacha thoko ngolole, Chinoopitingushachiya thoko ngolole chiicho. Nansho inyuva phi yalhe alhe mahuku o uhimalha, Ulhokelha winyu khunomalha.”
Nlhuku khaamwirenlhe ata nnepa wo wiirimu awe mmoka wiira, “Ukhalheke wiimonono waka, Mpaka vanohalha aka waathalha amalhaponi inyu wuuthi inyaa chinyu, Wiira mwaanyikalhelhe.”
Chani minepa ayo phi apani? Yayo phi minepa anorumiya ni Nlhuku waakavihera alhe anohalha woopolhiya alhe.
Wo chiichammo etu nivarechesheke rata malhove niiwilhe ihu ayo, ahiwe vakani vakani aapotera.
Ukhalhawaya nttenga waahimiye wo iphiro yo minepa ulhe waahonia ukhalha we ikeekhene. Ntu riyoothe ahaatwanre ama ahaarumelhenlhe aholhiviya we ikekhiaye thoko champhwanenlhe awe.
Paahi etu ninohalha ukulhuphuwa chani naahinlhohehe noopo mulhupalhe thoko yolha? Athithi anene phi anhimianche yoyo noopo uyo ni alhe yeewilhe alhe ahonihimiechesha wiira yaari ikeekhene.
Nlhuku ni uyo ahohimiechesha wo mitheko cho ushangiha ni ithikineha chinchi ni waakawelha mahalha o Iphumu awe attu wo uthanana wawe.
Nlhuku khanaavaha minepa ikuru yo utawara ilhapo inowa inohimiacha ihu iyo.
Tho, Malhove Matakatifu ahohimiechesha vakittu wiira, “Ntu phi ishiyani mpaka mmupuwelhe, Ntu phi mpani mpaka munlhohe?
Nhonyeviha vakani apwahiyaka ni minepa, Nhommwariha mphumburu wo nthimicho wo utawara chittu chonkhaye chuupilhe inyu,

Nhommaha ikuru vachulhu chittu chonkhaye.” Vanohimiya aya wiira, Nlhuku hommaha ntu ikuru yo utawara chittu chonkhaye wo uhihalhiha ata ittu imoka. Nansho vano khaninoona wiira ntu hovahiya ikuru yo utawara chittu chonkhaye.
Nansho ninoomwona Yesu aayevihiye kuliko minepa wo ikatema ikani, vano athimichiyaka ni uwarihiya mphumburu ukhalhawaya wo nnema wa Nlhuku ahotwaruwa mpaka ukhwa wo nlhatu wa attu onkhaye.

Ukhalhawaya yahophwanelha wiira Nlhuku noopa ni ushunga kila ittu, anratihe Yesu wo iphiro yo utwarushiya, wiira aawiihe ashaana enchi u nthimichoni wa Nlhuku. Ukhalhawaya Yesu phi noopo a attu onkhaye.
Yoyo phi naahapiha attu uwonya waya. Ni uyo phiri vamoka ni ayo atakatifu ateelhihiye ayo, onkhaye ayo Athumwanaya amoka. Phi nlhatu etu khanoona ishoni weehana yayo attu ayo, ashilhoko awe,
thoko chineera awe, “Kinowaahimeria ashilhoko aka nchina ninyu. Kinowiipelhani ichipo cho utotopelhani vanothothokana aya attu anourumelhelhani.”
Uno eeraka tho, “Kinonrumelhelha Nlhuku.” Nkeera tho, “Mwooneke, Mii kirii va, vamoka ni attu akivanhe awe Nlhuku akhalhe achishaana aka.”
Paahi ukhalhawaya ashaana ahokaviha mu iphome ni iruttu, Yesu ni uyo chiicho ahokhalha thoko ayo. Ikhalhe wo ukhwa wawe ammulhushe Nakare nonvarelha nookhwa,
ni wewananiha alhe anomwoova nookhwa alhe, aari mpottani ukumi aya wonkhaye.
Ukhalhawaya we ikekhiaye khaawilhe waakaviha minepa mitheko chaya, nansho aawilhe waakaviha ashaana a Aburahimu.
Wo yeyo iphiro iyo etu aheelhikaaniha thoko chiri aya ashilhoko awe ayo, akhalhe Opochera ishaani olhupalhe aya, o ukhulhuvelhiya, o ikiriri munthekoni wa Nlhuku, wiira uwonya wa attu ulhevelhelhiye.
Ukhalhawaya ni uyo ahovilhelha utwarushiya ni ulhikachiya, vano etu nowooria waavaha machiri attu onkhaye anolhikachiya ni utwarushiya.
Paahi etu ashilhoko aka, attu a Nlhuku nnomiana mahalha o wiirimu, mmuupuwelheke chinene Yesu, Karumiya a Nlhuku ni Opochera ishaani olhupalhe mu nrimani nnotwara ihu.
Yoyo aari o ukhulhuvelhiya ni Nlhuku anthanlhe uvara ntheko awe, thoko ashinna Musa vaavara aya ntheko u Inupa ya Nlhuku, attu o Israeli.
Nansho, Yesu phi nophwanelhiya upatta nthimicho chinene waapwaha ashinna Musa ayo, thoko ntu notheka inupa vanohelhelhiya awe chinene upwaha inupa inene iyo.
Eiyo, ukhalhawaya kila inupa inothekiya ni ntu, nansho Nlhuku phi thenke chittu chonkhaye.
Ashinna Musa yaari karumiya o ukhulhuvelhiya mu inupa yonkhaye ya Nlhuku. Ni ntheko aya uyo wahohimiechesha chittu Nlhuku chinowa awe uhimia kaanyuma,
nansho Kuristo yoyo phi o ukhulhuvelhiya thoko Mwaana neemelhelha Inupa ya Nlhuku, irii phi hii va, nathepaka uvarelhelha chinene mirima chihu ni nikhulhuvelho nineefunelha ihu.
Paahi etu, thoko Iphumu ya Nlhuku chinohimia aya mu Malhove Matakatifu, “Mweewakaru nlhove na Nlhuku lhelho,
Nhilhipihe mirima chinyu thoko cheera aya manyaapwiiya inyu, Vaakhonte aya umwiiwelhelha Nlhuku, Nihuku nanlhikanche aya Nlhuku, vaari aya uthakoni nne.
Wowo manyaapwiiya inyu yahokiphima ni ukilhikacha, Inakhalhaka yahochuwelha chittu chonkhaye chaapangelha aka wo iyaakha makhumi ncheshe.
Ni mii kahaathunanelha yayo manyaattu ayo keeraka, ‘Mahuku onkhaye, yayo attu ayo anotwaracha iphiro chaya, Mena khachuwenlhe mirima chaya.’
Paahi kahorushiya, nkakaalhupelha kiiraka, ‘Khannophiya mena unipuroni waka wo wiittuwelha!’ ”
Paahi etu ashilhoko aka, mwiishungeke rata, hiwe aakhalha mmoka inyu o nrima wo uhilhoka wo uvaanyiha, nkaarukunuwa nkanhiya Nlhuku nkumi.

Nansho vanothepa inyu wiiwa nna nlhove nna, “Lhelho,” nishomiyaka nhina Malhove Matakatifu, mwaamukaneke kila nihuku. Hikhalhe ntu riyoothe munlhokoni mwinyu o uvaanyiha wo nlhatu no uthepiachiya nkaawulhuwa mu uwonyani.
Ukhalhawaya hii onkhaye vaa ninokavihana ni Kuristo Moopolhi, nashungereraka rata nrima nivarenlhe ihu toka machokholhelho.
Muupuwelheke Malhove Matakatifu vaneera aya, “Mweewakaru nlhove na Nlhuku lhelho, Nhilhipihe mirima chinyu thoko chenre aya manyaapwiiya inyu vaakhonte aya umwiiwelhelha Nlhuku.”
Ukhalhawaya phi apani yayo eewa nlhove na Nlhuku ni unkhota umwiiwelhelha ayo? Kahii phi alhe onkhaye aaholhelhiye na ashinna Musa ukhuma Umisri alhe?
Nlhuku aathunalhenlhe apani etu iyaakha makhumi ncheshe ayo? Kahii phi alhe aawonyilhe nkaakhwa ni iruttu chaya nkachaawanelha uthakoni alhe?
Thothoni, phi apani Nlhuku aalhupenlhe awe wiira khanowa mena aphiyaka u nipuroni waya wo wiittuwelha? Kahii phi alhe aakhonte unrumelhelha Nlhuku alhe?
Paahi etu ninoona wiira khayoonrie uphiya unipuroni wo wiittuwelha wo nlhatu wo ukhota waya urumelhelha.
Paahi ukhalhawaya nihaawo nlhove no ulhehiya wiira niphiye unipuro no wiittuwelha, niichinanelheke etu, hikhalhe mmoka inyu nohalha uhiphiya wowo.
Ukhalhawaya ni hii niheewa Malhove Orera thoko aahimeriye aya yayo manyaattu ayo. Nansho nlhove neewilhe aya nno khanaalhonke ittu, ukhalhawaya khayaapochenre nrima thoko attu yeewelhenlhe alhe.

Ni vano hii ninorumelhelhava, ninoopatta nenno nipuro no wiittuwelha nno. Nenno phi nipuro no wiittuwelha nilhenhe awe Nlhuku venre awe, “Paahi kahorushiya, nkakaalhupelha wiira, ‘Khanowa mena aaphiya unipuroni waka wo wiittuwelha!’ ” Inakhalhaka wiira mitheko chawe chaari chinamanlhe toka vo upiye aya ilhapo.
Ukhalhawaya Malhove Orera ahohimia vakittu wiira, Nlhuku aheettuwa nihuku no saba, nkaahiya uvara mitheko chawe chonkhaye.
Tho, Malhove Orera anohimia wiira, “Khanophiya unipuroni waka wo wiittuwelha weeshenre aka uwo.”

Wo chiichammo etu, nihaawo nipesha wa attu akina anohalha uphiya unipuroni wo wiittuwelha uwo. Ukhalhawaya, ayo yaachokhonlhe wiiwa Malhove Orera ayo vaahimiachiya aya, khayonrie uphiya wowo wo nlhatu wo uhirumelhelha waya.
Vavawo tho Nlhuku aheesha nihuku nikina nineehaniya “Lhelho” naahimiye toka khalhayi wo iphiro ya Adaudi wiira, “Mweewakaru nlhove na Nlhuku lhelho, Nhilhipihe mirima chinyu.”
Ukhalhawaya ikaari Nayoshua ahaavaha attu nipuro no wiittuwa nno, Nlhuku kholhumachera nihuku nikina tho.
Paahi etu nihaawo Nihuku no Wiittuwa nenshe awe Nlhuku wa attu awe, thoko Nlhuku cheettuwilhe awe nihuku no saba.
Ukhalhawaya kila ntu neettuwa wowo ulhenhe awe Nlhuku uwo homalhiha mitheko chawe thoko Nlhuku chenre awe wo wiittuwa munthekoni mwawe.
Paahi etu mwaatti niilhipiheke ni hii niwe naapatta nipuro no wiittuwelha nno, hikhalhe ata mmoka ihu nohalha woochelha thoko hummanyaattu aakhonte umwiiwelhelha Nlhuku alhe.

Ukhalhawaya Nlhove na Nlhuku nikumi, no machiri, no wiithia, ninohoma mpaka nhina minepa ni mirima chihu thoko uphanga wo wiithia unothikilha velhi uno ni uno ni umwalhaaniha vanokumaana itturi cho iruttu ni makhura. Tho ninowaalhuwa uchuwelha moopuwelho ni minikwa cho mirima cha attu.
Khiiwo ittu ihinochuwelhiya mmiholho wa Nlhuku. Chittu chonkhaye chihopatakulhiya chiri mwaari mmiholho wawe yoyo ninohalha ihu wiivaraanga uwannyawe uyo.
Paahi ukhalhawaya nihanaa Opochera ishaani olhupalhe kenlhe mpaka wiirimu, Yesu, Mwaana a Nlhuku, nivarelhelheke etu nrima unohimiacha ihu uyo.
Yoyo Opochera ishaani olhupalhe ihu uyo, honichuwelha uhiichooria wihu. Ukhalhawaya ni uyo mwanene uyo aholhikachiya wo kila iphiro thoko ni hii chineera ihu, nansho nkaakhalha wo uhiwonya.
Paahi etu, nichusherereke wo uhoova ihiche ye Imwene ya Nlhuku urii nnema, noonelhiye ikiriri nipatte nnema wo unikavihera vanokwana ihu.
Kila Opochera ishaani olhupalhe nothanlhiya ni Nlhuku munlhokoni mwa attu, ni uvahiya mitheko cha Nlhuku cho waakavihera attu. Ukumiha izawadi ni isadaka wo milhatu cho ulhevelhelhiya uwonya waya.
Ukhalhawaya ni uyo ntu, no uwonya thoko hii, nowooria waamukacha attu wo ikiriri attu, inakhalhaka khanchuwelha ittu, awonyaka. Ukhalhawaya ni uyo ri o uhiichooria thoko ashikhunanawe ayo.
Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, ni uyo mwanene uyo noothananiya kuhiwe upochera isadaka cha attu akina vekha ayaru, nansho wo nlhatu wo uwonya unowonya awe mwanene.
Khaawo ntu neethanlha mwanene ni wiivaha ipilhi yo ukhalha Opochera ishaani olhupalhe. Nlhuku phi nonthanlha kila mmoka ni umwiihana thoko chenre aya wo wiihaniya Naharuni.

Chiicho etu, Kuristo Moopolhi kheevanhe mwanene nthimicho wo ukhalha Opochera ishaani olhupalhe, nansho Nlhuku mwanene phi nvanhe ni umwiirelha, “Uweva phi mwaamwanaka, Mii lhelho kineera, Mii phi Athumwana.”
Tho, vakittu vakina nhina Malhove Matakatifu, Nlhuku ahomwiirelha, “Uweva phi opochera ishaani o mahuku o uhimalha, Thoko chaari aya wa opochera ishaani Namelkisedeki.”
Yesu vaari awe velhaponi va ahonlha ni ukhuwelha vanlhapelha awe Nlhuku, ooria umwoopolha nnookhwani. Ni ukhalhawaya aari ntu amwoova Nlhuku, Nlhuku ahomwiiwelhelha.
Nansho inakhalhaka Yesu aari Mwaana a Nlhuku, aheettucha wiitimarikha wo uttwaruwa waatwarushiye awe.
Ni vavawo vaamalhihilhe awe ntheko waavahiye awe ni Nlhuku, ahoratihiya ni ukhalha nlhatu wo machokholhelho o noopo o mahuku o uhimalha attu onkhaye anonrumelhelha.
Paahi etu Nlhuku ahonthanlha yoyo ukhalha Opochera ishaani olhupalhe mu nkutiro u Namelkisedeki.
Ahawo malhove menchi o uhimeriani anaacha yoyo mwaha uyo, nansho ahorika uhimeriani ukhalhawaya mwaatti, attu o itiamaru.

Ukhalhawaya mwaaphwanelhiye ni inyu mwaatti vano ukhalha o weettuchiha akhunaninyu, nansho ni inyu nthananiyaka wiittuchihiya tho malhove o upacha o Malhove a Nlhuku. Vano nhohokolhia tho utulhi, mwaamweke mapelhe ni uhiya ulhia yolhia yo ulhipa.
Ukhalhawaya nolhia mapelhe yoyo bado mwaana, khanonnuwa, khanachuwelha iphiro cho upanga chittu chinothanana awe Nlhuku.
Choolhia cho ulhipalhipa chinolhiya ni attu akhomanlhe, eettuchihiye nkayaachuwelha waanyulha mwoolhoka ni mu uwonyani.
Paahi etu nihiyeke meettuchiho anaacha nttenga wa Kuristo, niweheke vano meettuchiho o ukhomalha. Nihiittuchihe tho meettuchiho o upacha o uhilhokalhoka anaacha ukhoroma ni unrumelhelha Nlhuku.
Tho, meettuchiho o iphiro iphiro cho ubatiiziya ni o weesheriya miono ni uhihimushiya attu akhwilhe ni mwaha wo ihukumu yo mahuku o uhimalha.
Nlhuku anivaheraka, ninowa naapanga yayo.
Ukhalhawaya khinooria tho waahokolhosha wiira awe akhoroma attu amwalhelhiye ni ulhawiha mahalha o wiirimu yayo ni ashikhunanaya, ni upangiya akavihi o Iphumu ya Nlhuku,
ni ulhawiha uchiva wo Nlhove na Nlhuku ni machiri o ikatema inowa,

nansho nkayaawulhuwacha mirima chaya kaanyuma, ahooriaka waahokolhosha ni ukhoroma tho. Yayo phi nokhalha aya thoko anonkhomelhelha tho Mwaana a Nlhuku vansalaabani ni umuulhihachiha muru vaattuni vahinohiya aya uwonya.
Ilhapo inorupelhiya ipulha kila iyaakha ni umelhiha minyepu chinokhulhuvelha aya anamalhima, impatta ibarakha chinokhuma wa Nlhuku.
Nansho ilhapo yamelhaka miri cho miiwa ni mahichi khirina nnema, inookholhaviya ni Nlhuku. Umalhelha waya unohalha ukhalha upahiya mooro wo mahuku o uhimalha.
Ashilhoko aka, inakhalhaka ninoolhumacha chiicho etu, ninokhulhuvelha wiira mwaatti nnoottwara iphiro yoombone, iphiro inokelha unooponi.
Nlhuku khanopanga chittu cho uhilhoka, khanolhiyalha uttuna unopanga inyu wo nchina nawe. Waalhoha ni waapochera attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo ashikhunaninyu yaawilhe uwaninyu ama anowa alha mahuku.
Nnikwa ihu mulhupalhe uri umwoona kila mmoka inyu athepaka yoyo nrima wo uminda ni ikekhiaye uyo mpaka umalhelha waya, wiira ayo anokhulhuvelha ihu ayo atimire.
Paahi etu mwaatti nhikhalhe attu o uhuva, nansho mwaatwariheke attu o upisha nrima ni attu o uvilhelha, mmwe mwaapochera mahalha alhehilhe awe Nlhuku.
Nlhuku vaalhehilhe Aburahimu, aholhupelha wo nchina nawe upanga chilhenhe awe ukhalhawaya khaawo ri mulhupalhe nkina o umpwaha, paahi etu eromonlhe mwanene.
Enre, “We ikekhiaye kinouvahani ibarakha chinchi ni uvahani ashaana enchi.”
Aburahimu ahoweherera ni uvilhelha nkayaapochera nlhove naalhehiye aya ni Nlhuku.
Ukhalhawaya attu vanolhupelha aya, anolhupelha wo nchina na ntu ri mulhupalhe naapwaha ni ulhupelha waya uwo uhimiecheshaka malhove onkhaye.
Nlhuku wo wooniha wiira khanorukunusha nlhove nawe mpaka vanotimira aya, ahokhomelhelha yayo malhehano ayo.

Paahi etu, malhove ari melhi ahinorukunuwa, malhehano ni ulhupelha, chihinooria urukunuwa ni mena Nlhuku hoothachaka vachulhu chechiyo chittu chiyo. Ni hii nittimakenlhe uri mpuhava, nihovahiya nrima wo ukhulhuvelha nlhove nishungiye miholho.
Nenno phi nlhove ninovarelha ukumi ihu thoko iyuuma inovarelha ikalhava wiira ihiveverushiye. Nenno phi ichikurupi ihu yo ikekhiaye inoperetta nipaziya mpaka nipuro nitakatifu no wiirimu.
Yesu mwanene honiholhelha wowo akhalhaka opochera ishaani olhupalhe o mahuku o uhimalha, munkutironi mwa opochera ishaani mwa Namelkisedeki.

Namelkisedeki alha aari amwene o ilhapo yo Usalimu ni opochera ishaani a Nlhuku ri Mulhupalhe Chinene. Ikatema Aburahimu vaahokolhia aya ukhotoni waakottonlhe aya mamwene acheshe yahaakumaanana Namelkisedeki ayo, Aburahimu nkayaavahiya ibarakha ni ayo.

Aburahimu yahokumiha ni waavaha Namelkisedeki nifungu no khumi no nhakhu waya wonkhaye. Malhamulho o nchina Melkisedeki na amwene o Usalimu nno aari “Amwene o ikekhiaye.” Ni maana aya ikina ikhalhaka “Amwene o mpuha.”

Yayo Namelkisedeki ayo khanaromolhiya wiira athumwanaya ama anumwanaya ama manyaapwiiya aya yaari apani mena nihuku naya no uyaria ama akhwilhe iyaakhani. Nansho anolhikaanihiya thoko Mwaana a Nlhuku, nokhalha opochera ishaani nkumi o mahuku o uhimalha.
Phi mwooneke vavawo chenre aya wo ukhalha ntu mulhupalhe, mpaka Aburahimu yahokumiha ni waavaha nifungu no khumi no nhakhu waapante aya ukhotoni.
Ni iyari yonkhaye i Nalawi iri ni ntheko wo upochera ishaani yahovahiya malheheriyo o upochera nifungu no khumi mwa attu, yaani ashilhoko aya, anakhalhaka wiira ni ayo yaari o iyari ya Aburahimu.
Nansho Namelkisedeki khayaari o iyari ya Nalawi, nansho yahopochera nifungu no khumi wa Aburahimu ni waavaha ibarakha ayo aalhehiye nlhove no uweherera ibarakha ukhuma wa Nlhuku ayo.
Nansho khinthikineeha wiira, ntu naavaha ibarakha akina yoyo phi mulhupalhe waapwaha anovahiya ibarakha ayo.

Paahi etu opochera ishaani anopochera nifungu no khumi ayo attu, anookhwa, nansho Namelkisedeki anaachiya upochera nifungu no khumi ayo, akumi thoko Malhove Matakatifu chineera aya wo uhimiecheshiya wiira khanokhwa.
Nalawi yaari phi apwiiya aya ayo o iyari ya opochera nifungu no khumi. Eiyo, vavawo ninowooria etu wiira ata Alawi ni ayo ahokumiha nifungu no khumi wo iphiro ya Aburahimu,
ukhalhawaya inakhalhaka Nalawi aari bado ahinayaria, nansho aari mphomeni mwa apwiiya aya, Aburahimu, ikatema vaakumanne aya ni Namelkisedeki.

Ntheko wo opochera ishaani waari phi nsingi wo Ikekhia yaavahiye aya attu o Israeli yaacha mwaha wo upochera ishaani. Paahi etu, yakhalhaka ntheko wa Alawi uyo wahotimira, khawaakhalha nlhatu nkhwawe tho wo ukhumelhelha opochera ishaani nkina nottwara nkutiro wa Namelkisedeki kuhii ulhe wa Naharuni ulhe.
Ukhalhawaya ntheko wo upochera ishaani warukunuwaka, malhehero e Ikekhia o nlhatu wo upochera ishaani ni ayo arukunuweke.
Ni ayo Athithi, anaachiya mmalhoveni mu ayo, aari ntu o nikosho nikina, uhikhalhaka ata ntu mmoka o nikosho naya aavanre ntheko wo opochera ishaani vamadhubahuni vaakumihiya isadaka.
Ukhalhawaya ninoona we ikeekhene wiira, Athithi Yesu aakhumme nikosho ni Nayuda, nikosho naharomolhiye ni ashinna Musa voolhumacha aya mwaha wa opochera ishaani.
Ni nna nlhove nna vano phi no ikeekhene chinene, ukhalhawaya Opochera ishaani nkina o ulhikaana ni Namelkisedeki hokhumelhelha.
Yoyo khaavahiye ntheko wo upochera ishaani wo uttwara malheheriyo o attu o nikosho nikhumme awe, nansho wo ikuru yo ukumi wo mahuku o uhimalha.
Ukhalhawaya Malhove Matakatifu anohimiechesha wiira, “Inyuva phi Opochera ishaani o mahuku o uhimalha thoko chaari aya wa opochera ishaani Namelkisedeki.”
Paahi etu, malhehero o khalhayi alhe ahofutiya ukhalhawaya khayaari ni machiri, aari o uhilhoka ittu,
ukhalhawaya yayo Malhehero ayo khayaatimirinhe chittu chonkhaye. Nansho vano nihowiihiya nlhove no ukhulhuvelhiya chinene. Ni wo nenno nlhove nno ninowooria umwaatameria Nlhuku.
Ni uthepa vavawo, vaa nihaawo nlhove naalhupenlhe awe Nlhuku. Ukhalhawaya akina ayo vaavahiya aya ntheko wo upochera ishaani yaavahiya wo uhilhupelhiya,
nansho vano, Yesu hokhalha Opochera ishaani wo naapo na Nlhuku venre awe, “Athithi aholhupelha, ni ayo khanorukunuwa, ‘Inyuva phi opochera ishaani o mahuku o uhimalha.’ ”
Wo nenno naapo nno etu, Yesu hokhalha phi neelheva uvarelhelha malhehano ihu orera chinene.
Tho, yayo opochera ishaani ayo yaari enchi, ukhalhawaya kila mmoka nookhwa awe aayeke, ahokhwa wo uhimalhiha mitheko chaya.
Nansho ukhalhawaya Yesu phiri nkumi wo mahuku o uhimalha, ntheko wawe wo upochera ishaani uri wo mahuku o uhimalha uhirwaaka wa ntu nkina.
Ni uyo wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, nowooria woopolha kabisaa attu anorwaa wa Nlhuku wo iphiro awe, ukhalhawaya ri nkumi mahuku o uhimalha aalhepelhelhaka wa Nlhuku.
Ukhalhawaya hii nahonthanana opochera ishaani olhupalhe o ukhulhuvelhiya thoko yoyo ri ntakatifu, hiwonnye, hinanarihiye, enanelhiye ni iphiro cha attu o uwonya, eenulhiye uchulhu wiirimu.

Hinokhalha thoko opochera ishaani olhupalhe akina aathananiya ukumiha isadaka kila nihuku, anochokholha ukumiha isadaka cho milhatu chaya ashinene ni umalhihera wo uwonya wa attu akina. Yesu khanopanga chiicho ukhalhawaya ahomalhiha veekuminhe awe mwanene isadaka wa attu onkhaye nkwaha mmoka ithoshaka wo ikatema choothe.

Malhehero anaathanlha attu o uhuperia ukhalha opochera ishaani olhupalhe, nansho wo nlhove nilheehiye ni Nlhuku naatwanre kaanyuma baada yo Ikekhia nihommaha Mwaana timirihiye ukhalha Opochera ishaani olhupalhe wo mahuku o uhimalha.
Nlhove ninohimiacha ihu phi nna, wiira nihanaa Opochera ishaani olhupalhe o yeyo iphiro iyo, nokhalha wiimonono wo ihiche yo Nthimicho ya Nlhuku wiirimu,
novara ntheko wa Opochera ishaani Mulhupalhe va Nipuro Nitakatifu Chinene, va nihema no ikekhiaye nithekiye ni Athithi, nihithekiye ni attu.
Kila Opochera ishaani olhupalhe nothanlhiya apange ntheko wo ukumiha izawadi ni ishaani wa Nlhuku. Ni Opochera ishaani olhupalhe ihu lazima ni uyo akhalhaneke ittu yo ukumiha chiicho.
Ikaari Kuristo aari o velhaponi va, kaakhalha opochera ishaani ata vakani, ukhalhawaya ilhapo ihaana opochera ishaani anokumiha isadaka wo utwariha chilheheriye ni Malhehero a ashinna Musa.

Ntheko unopanga aya wo upochera ishaani, phi iramani yo chittu chinopangiya wiirimu. Yayo anolhikaana thoko ashinna Musa vaatameria aya utheka nihema, Nlhuku venre awe, “Mmweheke rata, mwapangeke kila ittu thoko chenre aka wo uwonihani umwaakoni ulhe.”

Nansho vano Yesu hovahiya ntheko wo ulhoka chinene upwaha wa opochera ishaani alhe, ukhalhawaya vano yoyo phi o weewananiha malhehano arenree. Uno malhove ari nhina yayo malhehano ayo emelhelhaka nlhove nirenree na Nlhuku.
Ukhalhawaya yakaari malhehano o upacha alhe khayaakhuwachiye, attu khaathananiya ukhalhana malhehano o nayelhi.
Nansho Nlhuku voonne awe attu ahotteka aamunke wo wiira, “Mahuku anoowa aneera Athithi, Vanohalha aka ulheha Malhehano o Naanano, wa attu o inupa ya Israeli ni attu o Yuda.

Yayo malhehano ayo khanowa aalhikaana ni malhehano alhehanne aka ni manyaapwiiya aya, Nihuku vaavanre aka moono ni uwoopolha ukhuma ilhapo yo Umisri. Ukhalhawaya khayaavarelhenlhe malhehano alhe, paahi ni mii akaalhohilhe, Athithi Nlhuku phi noolhumacha yayo.

Ukhalhawaya alha phi malhehano kinohalha aka upanga wa attu o inupa yo Israeli. Athithi aneera, baada yo yayo mahuku ayo, Kinowa kaavaha Malhehero aka mmamirimani mwaya, Kinowa kaahelha mmamirimani mwaya. Kinoowa kaakhalha Nlhuku aya, Ni ayo anowa ukhalha phi attu aka.
Khaawo ntu nohalha mena weettuchiha achihima we, Ama weerelha alhoko awe, Mwaachuwelheke Athithi. Ukhalhawaya attu onkhaye, ashikaani mpaka ashulhupalhe anowa aakichuwelha.
Kinoowa kaahiyerera uhilhoka waya, Mena akinowa koopuwelhaka tho uwonya waya.”
Nlhuku vaalhenhe awe Malhehano o Naanano, Malhehano o Khalhayi ayo ahothalha. Ni ittu yo khalhayi yathaalhaka, ihophiyelha vanorihiya aya.
Paahi etu ata malhehero o upacha ahaana iphiro cho uthimicha ni mapuro o unlhapelha Nlhuku cheeshiye ni attu.
Nahothekiya nihema na Nlhuku. Ichuumba aya yo upachera yeehaniya Vakittu Vatakatifu, mweeshiye ikiango yo uthomeiya ikhandiri ni imeza ni mikatte chaakumihiye isadaka wa Nlhuku.
Vatulhi nipaziya no nayelhi nnihemani mmo yahaawo ichuumba ikina yeehaniya Nipuro Nitakatifu Chinene,

mwaari imeza yo idhahabu yo ukumihiyeriya ishaani yaatutumiheriya ubani. Tho nahokhalha nsanduku no Malhehano naashiringiye idhahabu kila mpatta. Nhina nsanduku mmo mwahaawo iyoopwe yo idhahabu yaahelhiye yolhia yeehaniya mana, tho mwahaawo ntonto wa Naharuni waaphuwa mathaakhuru vachulhu ni ivibau cho malhuku chaalhepiye Malhove o Malhehano a Nlhuku.

Vachulhu nsanduku vawo ahaawo o wuupiya o mapupha elhi ooniha vari nthimicho wa Nlhuku, mapupha ayo aakhuneelha vachulhu vawo, vo woonelhiya ikiriri attu. Nansho vano kihii ikatema yo waandhandhulha chechiyo chittu chiyo.
Paahi etu chittu chiyo chamalheke weeshiya rata, opochera ishaani yahokelha kila nihuku munihema ni, va ichuumba yo upachera ilhe ni uvara ntheko waya.

Nansho opochera ishaani olhupalhe vekha aya phi aakhelha ichuumba yo nayelhi ilhe nkwaha mmoka kila iyaakha. Ni ayo aathananiya urweha mwommo iphome yo mwannama wo nlhatu wo uwonya waya ni wo milhatu cha attu aawonnye wo uhichuwelha.
Iphumu ya Nlhuku nonooniha wiira nihema no upacha nne vaari aya ninemenlhe, iphiro yo ukelha urii Nipuro Nitakatifu Chinene no wiirimu yaari bado ihinapatakulhiya.
Yayo phi malhikaanihero o ikatema yo naanano ahimiaka wiira isadaka ni ishaani chinokumihiya isadaka wa Nlhuku khachinooria waarulha attu misigo cho uwonya mmamirimani mwa attu anonthimicha Nlhuku.

Ukhalhawaya ulhia ni uwuria ni wiihapiha iruttu, chinaacha mwaha wo mwiiruttuni. Chonkhaye chiyo chinotwara iphiro cho malhehero o chittu cho vatheru. Chechiyo chinoowa chaamalha Nlhuku vanohalha awe ulhokiha chittu chonkhaye.

Nansho Kuristo wilhe ukhalha Opochera ishaani olhupalhe nowehaweha chittu choombone chipangelhe. Yoyo hokelha mu Nihema nulhupalhe no ukhulhuvelhiya chinene. Nihema nihithekiye ni attu, ukhalhawaya kanihiwe no velhaponi va.

Kuristo aakenlhe Nipuro Nitakatifu Chinene munihemani mmo nkwaha mmoka nakunshe kuhii iphome yo mwannama wiira akumihe isadaka, nansho aakunshe iphome awe mwanene nkaaniwiihera o noopolha o mahuku o uhimalha.
Ukhalhawaya isadaka yo iphome yo ipuri ni yo ing'ope vamoka ni ituura yo mwang'ope vaamicheriye aya attu ananarihiye ni milhatu chaacha iphiro cho unthimicha Nlhuku, yahaahapiha milhatu chaya.

Paahi etu, iphome ya Kuristo ihanaa machiri chinene o unihapiha! Ukhalhawaya wo machiri o Iphumu ya Nlhuku nolhokelha mahuku o uhimalha, Kuristo aheekumiha mwanene wa Nlhuku akhalhe isadaka itiminre. Ni iphome awe inoonihapiha mirima chihu cho uhilhoka chinommwiiha nookhwa, nikhalhe attu anovara ntheko wa Nlhuku ri nkumi.

Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, Kuristo phi o wiiwananiha o Malhehano o Naanano, wiira onkhaye aneehaniya apochere ibarakha cho mahuku o uhimalha. Ukhalhawaya nookhwa awe hokhalha phi noopo o woopolha attu uwonya waapannge aya ikatema yo Malhehano o Khalhayi.
Malhehano o uhiyeriya anotimira wo nlhatu wo uchuwania wiira ntu aalhenhe uyo hokhwa,
anopangia kaanyuma ntu aapannge malhehano uyo nakhwilhe, kuhiwe nari nkumi.
Chiichammo etu, malhehano o upacha ayo khayooria upanga ntheko aya wo uhikhalha isadaka yo iphome.

Ukhalhawaya, ashinna Musa aachokhonlhe wo waahimeria attu kila Malhehero yaavahiye aya ni Nlhuku. Kaanyuma nkayaakusha iphome yo mwang'ope ni yo ipuri nkayaathakaniha ni maashi. Nkayaakusha machashi o hisopo ni mapururu o ukhwiilha o ikhondoro, nkayaamichamicha vachulhu ikitabu yo Malhehero ni waamichera attu onkhaye.
Ni ayo nkayeera, “Ilha phi iphome inohimiechesha malhehano alhehanne inyu ni Nlhuku, nvarechesheke.”
Wo iphiro thoko yeyo, ashinna Musa ahomichamicha tho iphome vachulhu nihema ni vachulhu chittu cho ntheko wo unlhapelha Nlhuku.
Eiyo, nhina Malhehero ayo, kharibu chittu chonkhaye chinohapihiya wo isadaka yo iphome. Paahi etu vahirii iphome uwonya khunohiyereriya.

Chechiyo chittu chiyo phi malhikaaniho o chittu chiri wiirimu chiyo, chinothananiya uhapihiya wo iphiro yo iphome iyo. Nansho milhatu cho ikeekhene cho wiirimu chiyo chinohapihiya wo isadaka iri yoombone chinene upwaha chii.
Ukhalhawaya Kuristo khaakenlhe Vakittu Vatakatifu vaathekiye ni attu, vanolhikaanihiya ni nipuro no ikeekhene no wiirimu. Nansho aakhenlhe wiirimu unenene, uneemelha awe unilhapelhelha wa Nlhuku.
Kuristo mena khaakenlhe wiirimu wiira ekumihe isadaka mwanene kila iyaakha, thoko Opochera ishaani Olhupalhe a Ayahudi chinokelha aya u Nipuro Nitakatifu kila iyaakha anakunshe iphome ihiri yawaya,

ukhalhawaya yakeerelhe chiicho, Kuristo aanotwarushiya venchi toka wuupiya ilhapo. Nansho vano, mahuku vanaatameria aya umalha, hokhumelhelha nkwaha mmoka tu, ekumihe iruttu awe mwanene akhalhe isadaka yo uhiyerera uwonya wa attu.
Paahi etu thoko chiri aya, kila ntu nokhwa nkwaha mmoka, baada yo vavawo neemelha uuhukumulhiyani ni Nlhuku.

Chiichammo etu Kuristo aheekumiha isadaka mwanene akhwe vamoka wo nlhatu wo uhiyereriya uwonya wa attu enchi. Ni uyo noohokolhia nkwaha wo nayelhi, uhikhalhaka nkwaha wo uhiyerera uwonya nansho uwaakushani alhe anommweherera chinene alhe.

Paahi etu ukhalhawaya Malhehero a ashinna Musa phi irungu yo chittu choombone chinowa ukhumelhelha, ahilhikaanaka ni chittu chinenene, chihooriaka waaratiha attu anonthimicha Nlhuku wo isadaka chinokumihiya venchi kila iyaakha.
Yakaari chiicho etu, isadaka khacheemelha ukumihiya? Chani attu anonthimicha Nlhuku ayo akaahapihiye uwonya waya wo yeyo iphiro iyo, mirima chaya khachoona wiira kharina milhatu cho ummwonya Nlhuku?
Nansho chechiyo isadaka chiyo chinokumihiya kila iyaakha wo upusha attu wiira ahowonya.
Ukhalhawaya isadaka yo iphome cho ing'ope ni iphome yo ipuri khachinooria uhapiha milhatu cho uwonya.
Phi nlhatu etu, Kuristo vaawa awe velhaponi, ahomwiirelha Nlhuku, “Inyu khamwaattunne isadaka mena ishaani ya ashinama, Nansho nhokivaha iruttu ikhalhe isadaka.
Khamwaachivelhiye isadaka cha ashinama chinopahiya mooro mena isadaka cho uthamiha milhatu cho uwonya.
Ni mii nkakeera, ‘Mii kiri vaa, kipange mattunelho ao Uwe Nlhuku, Thoko Malhove Matakatifu chilhepilhe aya ukaacha mii.’ ”

Wo upachera Kuristo enre, “Khamwaattunne mena khamwaachivelhiye isadaka mena ishaani mena isadaka cha ashinama chinopahiya mooro mena isadaka cho uhapiha milhatu cho uwonya.” olhumacha chiicho inakhalhaka isadaka chihimiye ni Malhehero a ashinna Musa, chaari chikumihiyaka.
Nkeera tho, “Mii kiri vaa, Uwe Nlhuku, kipange mattunelho ao.” Phi chiichammo etu Nlhuku ahothamiha isadaka cho upacha ni weesha isadaka yo nayelhi, isadaka ya Kuristo mwanene.
Ukhalhawaya Yesu Kuristo ahopanga mattunelho a Nlhuku, hii vano nihohapihiya uwonya wihu wo iphiro yo ibarakha yo isadaka yo iruttu awe yaakuminhe awe nkwaha mmoka tu.
Kila opochera ishaani noovara ntheko awe kila nihuku ni ukumiha isadaka chechiyo chechiyo venchi, isadaka chihinooria inakhalhaka vakani uhapiha milhatu cho uwonya.
Nansho Kuristo ahokumiha nkwaha mmoka isadaka yo uthamiha milhatu cho uwonya, isadaka yo ukhulhuvelhiya mahuku o uhimalha, amalhiheke nkaakhalha wiimonono wa Nlhuku.
Ni toka vavawo noweherera amalhaponi awe akottolhiye awe aanyikalhelha.
Ukhalhawaya wo isadaka yeekuminhe awe nkwaha mmoka, ahaathanlha areerihiye alhe, anohapihiya milhatu chaya cho uwonya.
Ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku nohimiechesha chiicho veneera aya,
“Athithi aneera, Alha phi malhehano kinohalha aka waalhehana mahuku anowa, Kinowaahelha Malhehero aka mmamirimani mwaya, Ni ulhepa mwiirushoni mwaya.”
Ni ayo nkayoncherera wiira, “Ni mii akinoopuwelha tho uwonya waya Mena uhilhoka waya.”
Paahi etu milhatu cho uwonya vanothamihiya aya, khuuwo tho mwaha wo ukumihiya isadaka yo nlhatu wo uhiyereriya uwonya.
Haya etu ashilhoko aka, nihanaa nikhulhuvelho no ukelha uri Nipuro Nitakatifu Chinene wo iphiro yo iphome ya Yesu,
wo iphiro yo ulhoka inihulhenlhe awe, inoniholhelha urii ukumi, vari nipaziya nulhupalhe, yaani iruttu awe mwanene.
Ni ukhalhawaya nihanaa Opochera ishaani Mulhupalhe neemelhelha inupa yonkhaye ya Nlhuku,
paahi etu nimwaatamerieke Nlhuku wo nrima woombone, wo nrima wo ikekhiaye uratihiye wiira nihiye iphiro cho unanara ni wo iruttu chihapihiye wo maashi oombone.
Nithepeke etu uvarelhelha nikhulhuvelho ninorumelhelha ihu wo uhoova, ukhalhawaya Nlhuku lhehilhe ri o ukhulhuvelhiya.
Tho, nikavihaneke hii naashineneru ni wooniha nrima wo uttunana ni upanga mitheko choombone.
Nihoochee mena nihihiye mwaha wo ukumaanacha vamoka thoko chineera aya attu akina. Nithepeke uhelhana mirima uno nichuwelhaka wiira nihuku na Athithi nihaatameria.
Nichuwelheke etu wiira, nawonyaka mweni ninachuwenlhe ikeekhene, khiiwo isadaka ikina tho inohalha ukumihiya wo nlhatu wo uhiyereriya uwonya wihu.
Ittu ihanlhe vavawo iri uweherera noovaka uhukumulhiya ni upahiya mooro wo uviha unohalha waapaha attu onkhaye anonkhota Nlhuku.
Ntu riyoothe nokhota urumelhelha Malhehero a Nlhuku aavahilhe awe ashinna Musa nowiiviya wo uhoonelhiya ikiriri, yahimiecheshiyaka ni attu elhi ama araru.
